name: Jitters' Growling Gut
description: Speak with Chef Grual.

name: Bounty on Garrick Padfoot
description: Kill Garrick Padfoot and bring his head to Deputy Willem at Northshire Abbey.

name: Kobold Camp Cleanup
description: Kill 3 Kobold Vermin, then return to Marshal McBride.

name: A Rogue's Deal
description: Deliver the Nondescript Letter to Innkeeper Renee in Tirisfal Glades.

name: The Killing Fields
description: Farmer Saldean wants you to kill 5 Harvest Watchers.

name: The Scrimshank Redemption
description: Discover the fate of Junior Surveyor Scrimshank, and bring either him or his surveying equipment to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser in Gadgetzan.

name: Riverpaw Gnoll Bounty
description: Bring 3 Painted Gnoll Armbands to Deputy Rainer at the Barracks.

name: The People's Militia
description: Gryan Stoutmantle wants you to kill 3 Defias Trappers and 3 Defias Smugglers then return to him on Sentinel Hill.

name: The People's Militia
description: Gryan Stoutmantle wants you to kill 3 Defias Pillagers and 3 Defias Looters and return to him on Sentinel Hill.

name: The People's Militia
description: Gryan Stoutmantle wants you to kill 3 Defias Highwaymen, 2 Defias Pathstalkers and 2 Defias Knuckledusters then return to him on Sentinel Hill.

name: Investigate Echo Ridge
description: Kill 3 Kobold Workers, then report back to Marshal McBride.

name: Uldaman Reagent Run
description: Bring 3 Magenta Fungus Caps to Ghak Healtouch in Thelsamar.

name: Brotherhood of Thieves
description: Bring a Red Burlap Bandana to Deputy Willem outside the Northshire Abbey.

name: Tharil'zun
description: Bring Tharil'zun's Head to Marshal Marris in Redridge.

name: Blackrock Menace
description: Bring 3 Battleworn Axes to Marshal Marris in Lakeshire.

name: Skirmish at Echo Ridge
description: Kill 3 Kobold Laborers, then return to Marshal McBride at Northshire Abbey.

name: Goretusk Liver Pie
description: Salma Saldean needs 3 Goretusk livers to make a Goretusk Liver Pie.

name: Ursangous's Paw
description: Bring Ursangous's Paw to Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: Shadumbra's Head
description: Bring Shadumbra's Head to Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: Stonetalon Standstill
description: Dispatch 3 Befouled Water Elementals at Mystral Lake, due east of the Talondeep Path and southwest of Splintertree Post. After you are done, return to Mastok Wrilehiss at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: Trial of the Sea Lion
description: Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located. Form the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this. Bring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Aquatic Form
description: Return to Darnassus and show Mathrengyl Bearwalker the Pendant of the Sea Lion.

name: A Lesson to Learn
description: Speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: A Lesson to Learn
description: Speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Trial of the Lake
description: Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

name: Rise of the Silithid
description: Take the report to Zilzibin Drumlore in Orgrimmar.

name: Wolves Across the Border
description: Bring 3 pieces of Tough Wolf Meat to Eagan Peltskinner outside Northshire Abbey.

name: An Unwelcome Guest
description: Martie Jainrose of Lakeshire wants you to kill Bellygrub. Bring her his tusk as proof.

name: Further Concerns
description: Marshal Dughan wants you to speak with Guard Thomas.

name: Westfall Stew
description: Verna Furlbrow wants you to deliver her recipe for Westfall Stew to Salma Saldean.

name: Find the Lost Guards
description: Guard Thomas wants you to travel north up the river and search for the two lost guards, Rolf and Malakai.

name: Westfall Stew
description: Salma Saldean wants 3 Stringy Vulture Meat, 3 Goretusk Snouts, 2 Murloc Eyes, 2 Okra.

name: Deliver Thomas' Report
description: Report to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

name: A Fishy Peril
description: Remy "Two Times" wants you to speak with Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

name: Discover Rolf's Fate
description: Search the murloc village for Rolf, or signs of his death.

name: Bounty on Murlocs
description: Bring 3 Torn Murloc Fins to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.

name: Gold Dust Exchange
description: Bring 4 Gold Dust to Remy "Two Times" in Goldshire. Gold Dust is gathered from Kobolds in Elwynn Forest.

name: Sweet Amber
description: Bring Holy Spring Water to Grimbooze Thunderbrew.

name: Sweet Amber
description: Grimbooze Thunderbrew wants a Sack of Barley, a Sack of Rye and a Sack of Corn.

name: Sweet Amber
description: Grimbooze Thunderbrew wants Truesilver.

name: Sweet Amber
description: Bring a Sycamore Branch to Grimbooze Thunderbrew.

name: Protect the Frontier
description: Kill 8 Prowlers and 5 Young Forest Bears, and then return to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.

name: Sweet Amber
description: Bring Grimbooze Thunderbrew a bundle of Charred Oak.

name: Report to Goldshire
description: Take Marshal McBride's Documents to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

name: Morbent Fel
description: Use Morbent's Bane on Morbent Fel, kill Morbent Fel, then return Morbent's Bane to Sven at his camp.

name: The Night Watch
description: Commander Althea Ebonlocke of Darkshire wants you to kill 8 Skeletal Warriors and 6 Skeletal Mages.

name: The Night Watch
description: Commander Althea Ebonlocke of Darkshire wants you to kill 15 Skeletal Fiends and 15 Skeletal Horrors.

name: The Night Watch
description: Commander Althea Ebonlocke of Darkshire wants you to kill 20 Plague Spreaders in the eastern Raven Hill mausoleum.

name: Cloth and Leather Armor
description: Give Sara Timberlain the Stormwind Armor Marker.

name: Kobold Candles
description: Bring 8 Large Candles to William Pestle in Goldshire.

name: Shipment to Stormwind
description: Bring William's Shipment to Morgan Pestle in the Stormwind Trade District.

name: The Fargodeep Mine
description: Explore the Fargodeep Mine, then return to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

name: Call of Water (Part 6)
description: Defeat the Corrupt Manifestation of Water and place the Corrupted Manifestation's Bracers along with the Remaining Drops of Purest Water on the Brazier of Everfount in Silverpine Forest.

name: The Forgotten Heirloom
description: Farmer Furlbrow wants you to retrieve his pocket watch from the wardrobe in his farmhouse at the pumpkin farm to the West.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Gryan Stoutmantle wants you to talk to Wiley in Lakeshire.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Seek out the Clerk Daltry in the Darkshire Town Hall.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Travel to the Moonbrook Schoolhouse and bring back any updated information about Stalvan to Clerk Daltry.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Take the Dusty Unsent Letter to Clerk Daltry.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Go to The Lion's Pride Inn to see if anyone there has heard of the name Stalvan.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Retrieve Stalvan's Undelivered Letter from the chest and deliver it to the Canal District in Stormwind.

name: Report to Thomas
description: Deliver Rolf and Malakai's Medallions to Guard Thomas at the eastern Elwynn bridge.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Search through the packed up possessions for a clue.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: The Torn Journal page you discovered provides your next clue.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Marshal Haggard wants you to check the chest upstairs for the Faded Journal Page.

name: The Jasperlode Mine
description: Explore the Jasperlode Mine, then report back to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

name: A Sticky Situation
description: Recover 10 bottles of Hinterlands Honey Ripple from the crates located around the abandoned Horde base in Skulk Rock.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Take the Faded Journal Page to Tavernkeep Smitts.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Take the muddy page to Commander Ebonlocke.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Show Clerk Daltry the Bloodstained Journal Page.

name: Ripple Delivery
description: Deliver the barrel to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.

name: Noxious Lair Investigation
description: Bring five Centipaar insect parts from the Noxious Lair to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

name: Red Linen Goods
description: Bring 6 Red Linen Bandanas to Sara Timberlain at the Eastvale Logging Camp.

name: Back to Billy
description: Bring the Pork Belly Pie to Billy Maclure at the Maclure Vineyards.

name: Lost Necklace
description: Speak with Billy Maclure.

name: Pie for Billy
description: Bring 4 Chunks of Boar Meat to Auntie Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield's Farm.

name: Goldtooth
description: Bring Bernice's Necklace to "Auntie" Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.

name: Princess Must Die!
description: Kill Princess, grab her collar, then bring it back to Ma Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.

name: The Everstill Bridge
description: Bring 5 Iron Pikes and 5 Iron Rivets to Foreman Oslow in Lakeshire.

name: Seasoned Wolf Kabobs
description: Gather 10 Lean Wolf Flanks and Stormwind Seasoning Herbs and return to Chef Grual in Darkshire.

name: Solomon's Law
description: Bring 10 Shadowhide Pendants to Bailiff Conacher in the Lakeshire Town Hall.

name: Redridge Goulash
description: Chef Breanna of Lakeshire wants five pieces of Tough Condor Meat, five Great Goretusk Snouts and five helpings of Crisp Spider Meat.

name: Dusky Crab Cakes
description: Gather 6 Gooey Spider Legs and bring them to Chef Grual in Darkshire.

name: A Watchful Eye
description: Take the Glyph of Azora to the Lion Statue near the Tower of Ilgalar in Redridge.

name: Sven's Revenge
description: Go to Sven's Farm and find what was buried behind the old stump.

name: Call of Water (Part 8)
description: Bring the Shard of Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Report the news to Commander Ebonlocke.

name: The Legend of Stalvan
description: Kill Stalvan Mistmantle and show Madame Eva his family ring.

name: Arugal's Folly
description: Bring 6 Pyrewood Shackles to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: Call of Water (Part 7)
description: Speak to the Minor Manifestation of Water in Silverpine Forest.

name: The Totem of Infliction
description: Bring 10 Ghoul Fangs, 10 Skeleton Fingers and 5 Vials of Spider Venom to Madame Eva in Darkshire.

name: Patrolling Westfall
description: Bring 8 Gnoll Paws to Captain Danuvin on Sentinel Hill.

name: Keeper of the Flame
description: Bring 5 Flasks of Oil to Captain Grayson at the Westfall Lighthouse.

name: The Coastal Menace
description: Bring a scale of Old Murk-Eye to Captain Grayson at the Westfall Lighthouse.

name: Alas, Andorhal
description: Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Young Lovers
description: Give Maybell's Love Letter to Tommy Joe Stonefield.

name: Note to William
description: Take Gramma Stonefield's Note to William Pestle.

name: Report to Gryan Stoutmantle
description: Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle.  He usually can be found in the stone tower on Sentinel Hill, just off the road, in the middle of Westfall.

name: Insect Part Analysis
description: Check in Gadgetzan for Alchemist Pestlezugg and his analysis of the insect parts.

name: Speak with Gramma
description: Speak with Gramma Stonefield.

name: Collecting Kelp
description: Bring 4 Crystal Kelp Fronds to William Pestle in Goldshire.

name: Insect Part Analysis
description: Deliver the report to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser in Gadgetzan.  Be sure he gives you a copy of the report, as Alchemist Pestlezugg has requested.

name: The Escape
description: Take the Invisibility Liquor to Maybell Maclure.

name: Shadow Magic
description: Bring 3 Midnight Orbs to Marshal Marris in Lakeshire.

name: Dry Times
description: Barkeep Daniels of Lakeshire needs a keg of Thunderbrew Lager, a cask of Merlot, a bottle of Moonshine and a skin of Sweet Rum.

name: Thunderbrew Lager
description: Bring Grimbooze Thunderbrew 5 hops to complete his special brew.

name: The Price of Shoes
description: Take Verner's Note to Smith Argus in Goldshire.

name: Return to Verner
description: Return to Verner Osgood in Redridge.  Give him the Crate of Horseshoes.

name: Messenger to Stormwind
description: Magistrate Solomon has given you a report which must be delivered to General Marcus Jonathan in Stormwind.  The judge wants you to return to him as soon as the delivery has been made.

name: Messenger to Stormwind
description: Take General Marcus Jonathan's letter of response to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.

name: Underbelly Scales
description: Gather 6 Underbelly Whelp Scales from Black Dragon Whelps, and bring them to Verner Osgood in Redridge.

name: The Collector
description: Go to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire and give him The Collector's Schedule.

name: A Baying of Gnolls
description: Kill 10 Redridge Brutes and 8 Redridge Mystics, then return to Verner Osgood.

name: The Lost Tools
description: Foreman Oslow of Lakeshire wants you to retrieve his toolbox from the bottom of Lake Everstill.

name: Howling in the Hills
description: Bring Yowler's Paw to Verner Osgood in Lakeshire.

name: Selling Fish
description: Bring 10 Spotted Sunfish to Dockmaster Baren in Lakeshire.

name: Blackrock Bounty
description: Kill 15 Blackrock Champions and Guard Howe in Lakeshire will reward you.

name: A Free Lunch
description: Bring Parker's lunch to Guard Parker.  He patrols the road leading to Darkshire.

name: Visit the Herbalist
description: Speak with the Redridge Herbalist, Martie Jainrose.

name: Delivering Daffodils
description: Give Darcy the Daffodil Bouquet.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Take Wiley's Note to Gryan Stoutmantle in Westfall.

name: Ghoulish Effigy
description: Gather 7 Ghoul Ribs and bring them to Abercrombie at his shack.

name: Ogre Thieves
description: Return Abercrombie's Crate to Abercrombie.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Take Wiley's Note to Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.

name: Captain Sander's Hidden Treasure
description: Find Captain Sanders' footlocker and search it for the next clue.

name: Captain Sander's Hidden Treasure (Part 2)
description: Find the old barrel near the ruined chimney and search it for your next clue.

name: Captain Sander's Hidden Treasure (Part 3)
description: Search the empty jug next to the windmill for the next clue.

name: Captain Sander's Hidden Treasure (Part 4)
description: Locate Captain Sanders' chest and open it for your reward.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Take Shaw's report to Gryan Stoutmantle in Westfall.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Track down the Defias Messenger in Westfall and bring his message to Stoutmantle.

name: Messenger to Westfall
description: Magistrate Solomon wants you to take his written plea to Gryan Stoutmantle in Westfall.

name: Messenger to Westfall
description: Return to Magistrate Solomon with Gryan Stoutmantle's response.

name: Messenger to Darkshire
description: Magistrate Solomon wants you to take a letter to Lord Ebonlocke in Darkshire.

name: Messenger to Darkshire
description: Return to Magistrate Solomon with Lord Ebonlocke's letter of response.

name: Manhunt
description: Find and kill "the Collector"  then return to Marshal Dughan with The Collector's Ring.

name: Supplies from Darkshire
description: Speak with Madame Eva.

name: Ghost Hair Thread
description: Bring the Spectral Comb to Blind Mary.

name: Murloc Poachers
description: Bring 8 Murloc Fins to Dockmaster Baren in Lakeshire.

name: Poor Old Blanchy
description: Verna Furlbrow in Westfall wants you to bring her 8 Handfuls of Oats.

name: The Coast Isn't Clear
description: Kill 7 Tidehunters, 7 Warriors, 7 Oracles and 7 Coastrunners and return to Captain Grayson at the Westfall Lighthouse.

name: Red Leather Bandanas
description: Bring 15 Red Leather Bandanas to Scout Galiaan at Sentinel Hill.

name: Return the Comb
description: Return the Ghost Hair Comb to Madame Eva in Darkshire.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Escort the Defias Traitor to the secret hideout of the Defias Brotherhood.  Once the Defias Traitor shows you where VanCleef and his men are hiding out, return to Gryan Stoutmantle with the information.

name: Gather Rot Blossoms
description: Gather 8 Rot Blossoms and bring them to Tavernkeep Smitts in Darkshire.

name: Deliver the Thread
description: Bring the Ghost Hair Thread to Abercrombie, in his shack north of the Raven Hill Cemetery.

name: Zombie Juice
description: Speak with Tavernkeep Smitts.

name: Juice Delivery
description: Bring the Zombie Juice to Abercrombie at his shack.

name: Note to the Mayor
description: Bring Abercrombie's Letter to Ello Ebonlocke, Mayor of Darkshire.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to take the strange smelling powder to Ashlan Stonesmirk, the explosives expert in Dun Modr.

name: Rise of the Silithid
description: Take the Insect Analysis Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

name: Raven Hill
description: Find out what is haunting Raven Hill.

name: Deliveries to Sven
description: Deliver the supplies to Sven.

name: The Hermit
description: Check on the old man in the shack near Raven Hill cemetery.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
description: Kill Edwin VanCleef and bring his head to Gryan Stoutmantle.

name: Oh Brother. . .
description: Bring Foreman Thistlenettle's Explorers' League Badge to Wilder Thistlenettle in Stormwind.

name: Collecting Memories
description: Retrieve 4 Miners' Union Cards and return them to Wilder Thistlenettle in Stormwind.

name: Wanted: Gath'Ilzogg
description: Kill Gath'Ilzogg and bring his head to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire for the reward.

name: A New Threat
description: Balir Frosthammer wants you to kill 6 Rockjaw Troggs and 6 Burly Rockjaw Troggs.

name: A Warden of the Alliance
description: Return your ward to the Stormwind orphanage by handing in the Human Orphan Whistle to Orphan Matron Nightingale in the Cathedral District.

name: Children's Week
description: Use the Orcish Orphan Whistle to talk with the child you will be looking after during Children's Week.

name: Worgen in the Woods
description: Kill 6 Nightbane Shadow Weaver worgen for Calor in Darkshire.

name: Look To The Stars
description: Viktori Prism'Antras of Darkshire wants you to bring him a bronze tube.

name: Look To The Stars
description: Locate Mary and persuade her to give up a reflective surface for Viktori's project.

name: Wanted:  "Hogger"
description: Slay the gnoll Hogger and bring his Huge Gnoll Claw to Marshal Dughan.

name: Look To The Stars
description: Retrieve Blind Mary's Looking Glass from the Insane Ghoul and give it to Viktori in Darkshire.

name: Theocritus' Retrieval
description: Bring the Faded Shadowhide Pendant to Theocritus the Mage.

name: Dwarven Outfitters
description: Sten Stoutarm would like 8 pieces of Tough Wolf Meat.

name: Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
description: Kill Lieutenant Fangore and return to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire with his paw.

name: Look To The Stars
description: Locate Zzarc'Vul in the southern ogre mound in Duskwood and return his monocle to Viktori in Darkshire.

name: The Troll Cave
description: Grelin Whitebeard would like you to kill 14 Frostmane Troll Whelps.

name: The Boar Hunter
description: Talin Keeneye would like you to kill 12 Small Crag Boars.

name: Furlbrow's Deed
description: Bring Furlbrow's Deed to Farmer Furlbrow.

name: Tiger Mastery
description: Ajeck Rouack of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Young Stranglethorn Tigers.

name: Tiger Mastery
description: Ajeck Rouack of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Stranglethorn Tigers.

name: Tiger Mastery
description: Ajeck Rouack of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Elder Stranglethorn Tigers.

name: Tiger Mastery
description: Ajeck Rouack of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill Sin'Dall and return with her paw.

name: Bloodscalp Ears
description: Acquire 15 Bloodscalp Ears and return them to Kebok in Booty Bay.

name: Panther Mastery
description: Sir S. J. Erlgadin of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Young Panthers.

name: Panther Mastery
description: Sir S. J. Erlgadin of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Panthers.

name: Panther Mastery
description: Sir S. J. Erlgadin of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to kill 10 Shadowmaw Panthers.

name: Panther Mastery
description: Sir S. J. Erlgadin of Nesingwary's Expedition wants you to bring him the Fang of Bhag'thera.

name: Raptor Mastery
description: Hemet Nesingwary wants you to kill 10 Stranglethorn Raptors.

name: Raptor Mastery
description: Hemet Nesingwary wants you to kill 10 Lashtail Raptors.

name: Raptor Mastery
description: Hemet Nesingwary wants you to kill 10 Jungle Stalkers.

name: Raptor Mastery
description: Hemet Nesingwary wants you to kill Tethis, an elusive, dangerous raptor in Stranglethorn.

name: Supplies to Private Thorsen
description: Deliver the Miscellaneous Goblin Supplies to Private Thorsen.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir and show him the clue that you discovered.

name: Bookie Herod
description: Find Bookie Herod's Records.

name: Investigate the Camp
description: Find the hunters' camp and report its location to Krazek in Booty Bay.

name: Colonel Kurzen
description: Kill 6 Kurzen Elite, 4 Kurzen Subchiefs, and bring Kurzen's Head to Lieutenant Doren at the Rebel Camp.

name: The Second Rebellion
description: Kill 15 Kurzen Jungle Fighters.$B$BReturn to Sergeant Yohwa at the Rebel Camp.

name: Bad Medicine
description: Bring 7 Jungle Remedies and 1 Venom Fern Extract to Sergeant Yohwa at the Rebel Camp.

name: Troll Witchery
description: Bring 4 Skullsplitter Fetishes to Brother Nimetz at the Rebel Camp.

name: Mai'Zoth
description: Bring the Mind's Eye to Brother Nimetz at the Rebel Camp.

name: Kurzen's Mystery
description: Find the 4 tablets and bring their legends back to Brother Nimetz.

name: Big Game Hunter
description: Hemet Nesingwary wants you to bring him the head of King Bangalash, the great white tiger.

name: Skullsplitter Tusks
description: Acquire 18 Skullsplitter Tusks and return them to Kebok.

name: Krazek's Cookery
description: Bring Krazek's Crock Pot to Krazek the goblin.

name: Alas, Andorhal
description: Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: A Meal Served Cold
description: Kill a Cold Eye Basilisk, get a Chilled Basilisk Haunch, and return it to Angus Stern in the Blue Recluse.

name: Hostile Takeover
description: Retrieve 8 Tumbled Crystals and return them to Kebok in Booty Bay.

name: Red Silk Bandanas
description: Scout Riell at the Sentinel Hill Tower wants you to bring her 10 Red Silk Bandanas.

name: Jungle Secrets
description: Speak with Lieutenant Doren at the Rebel Camp.

name: Between a Rock and a Thistlefur
description: Take down 8 Thistlefur Avengers and 8 Thistlefur Shaman; most are located east of Zoram Strand in Thistlefur Village.  Once completed, return to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: In Defense of the King's Lands
description: Kill the Trogg leader, Grawmug, and his two guards, Gnasher and Brawler then report back to Captain Rugelfuss in the southern guard tower.

name: The Stolen Journal
description: Grelin Whitebeard wants you to kill Grik'nir the Cold, and retrieve his journal.

name: Missing In Action
description: Protect Corporal Keeshan on the journey back to Redridge.

name: Call of Water (Part 5)
description: Bring the Vial of Purest Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

name: Worgen in the Woods
description: Kill 12 Nightbane Dark Runner worgen for Calor in Darkshire.

name: Worgen in the Woods
description: Kill 8 Nightbane Vile Fang and 8 Nightbane Tainted One worgen for Calor in Darkshire.

name: Worgen in the Woods
description: Bring Calor's note to Jonathan Carevin.

name: In Defense of the King's Lands
description: Mountaineer Cobbleflint of the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Troggs and 10 Stonesplinter Scouts.

name: The Weathered Grave
description: Speak with Sirra Von'Indi in Darkshire.

name: Wolves at Our Heels
description: Kill 12 Starving Dire Wolves and 8 Rabid Dire Wolves, then return to Lars at Sven's Camp on the western border of Duskwood.

name: Morgan Ladimore
description: Speak with Commander Althea Ebonlocke in Darkshire.

name: Mor'Ladim
description: Kill Mor'Ladim, then return his skull to Commander Althea Ebonlocke in Darkshire.

name: The Daughter Who Lived
description: Speak with Watcher Sarah Ladimore in Darkshire.

name: Sven's Camp
description: Bring the Book from Sven's Farm to Sven.

name: A Daughter's Love
description: Take Sarah Ladimore's ring to Morgan Ladimore's grave.

name: Errand for Apothecary Zinge
description: Take the purchase order to Alessandro Luca in the Undercity.

name: Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery
description: Deliver the stack of letters to Talin Keeneye.

name: Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery
description: Deliver the letter to Grelin Whitebeard.

name: The Ashenvale Hunt
description: Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: In Defense of the King's Lands
description: Mountaineer Gravelgaw in the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Skullthumpers and 10 Stonesplinter Seers and report back to him.

name: Errand for Apothecary Zinge
description: Bring the Field Sampling Kit to Apothecary Zinge in the Undercity.

name: Westbrook Garrison Needs Help!
description: Go to the Westbrook Garrison and speak with Deputy Rainer.

name: Return to Jitters
description: Return to Jitters with the Dusky Crab Cakes.

name: Into the Field
description: Speak to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan about getting a power source for the testing kit.

name: Encroaching Gnolls
description: Report to Deputy Feldon.

name: Eight-Legged Menaces
description: Kill 15 Pygmy Venom Web Spiders, and then report back to Watcher Dodds in Duskwood.

name: Assessing the Threat
description: Kill 10 Redridge Mongrels and 6 Redridge Poachers, then report back to Deputy Feldon in Lakeshire.

name: Looking Further
description: Climb the intact watch tower beside Stonewatch Keep.$B$BFind a suitable container to place the Glyph of Azora.

name: Morganth
description: Defeat Morganth.$B$BBring his Pendant of Shadow to Theocritus at the Tower of Azora in Elwynn Forest.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Investigate the area near the eastern ramp of the Dam and bring Chief Engineer Hinderweir a clue that might reveal what the Dark Iron Dwarves are up to.

name: Translate Abercrombie's Note
description: Bring the Letter to Ello to Sirra Von'Indi.

name: Translation to Ello
description: Bring the Translated Letter to Lord Ello Ebonlocke

name: Bride of the Embalmer
description: Find Eliza's grave.  Retrieve the Embalmer's Heart from her, then return to Ello Ebonlocke.

name: Mercenaries
description: Magistrate Bluntnose of Thelsamar has hired you to kill 4 Mo'grosh Ogres, 4 Mo'grosh Brutes and 4 Mo'grosh Enforcers.

name: WANTED: Chok'sul
description: Kill Chok'sul and bring his head to Magistrate Bluntnose of Thelsamar.

name: A Hunter's Boast
description: Kill 6 Mountain Buzzards and return to Daryl the Youngling in the Farstrider Lodge within 15 minutes.

name: A Hunter's Challenge
description: Kill 5 Elder Mountain Boars and return to Daryl the Youngling in the Farstrider Lodge within 12 minutes.

name: Down the Scarlet Path
description: Destroy 30 Undead Ravagers, then return to Brother Anton at Nijel's Point.

name: The Shadowy Figure
description: Take the book you found at Sven's farm and show it to townsfolk in Darkshire.

name: In Defense of the King's Lands
description: Mountaineer Wallbang in the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Shaman and 10 Stonesplinter Bonesnappers.

name: Until Death Do Us Part
description: Place Clarice's Pendant on Yuriv's Tomb in Silverpine.

name: The Shadowy Search Continues
description: See if other townsfolk have clues about the shadowy figure.

name: Inquire at the Inn
description: Search the inn for clues about the shadowy figure.

name: The Trogg Threat
description: Bring 8 Trogg Stone Teeth to Captain Rugelfuss in the southern guard tower.

name: Return to Sven
description: Return to Sven with Jitters' completed journal.

name: Seeking Wisdom
description: Give Jitters' Completed Journal to Bishop Farthing in Stormwind.

name: The Doomed Fleet
description: Go to Menethil Harbor in the Wetlands, and speak with Glorin Steelbrow.

name: Vyrin's Revenge
description: Kill Ol' Sooty then show your handiwork to Daryl the Youngling at the Farstrider Lodge.

name: Trial of the Sea Lion
description: Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located.$B$BForm the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Trial of the Lake
description: Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

name: Aquatic Form
description: Return to Thunder Bluff and show Turak Runetotem the Pendant of the Sea Lion.

name: Resupplying the Excavation
description: Speak with Huldar.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Ashlan Stonesmirk wants you to return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir and inform him of the new discovery.

name: Blisters on The Land
description: Kill 8 Fen Creepers, then return to Rethiel the Greenwarden in the Wetlands.

name: Tramping Paws
description: Kill 15 Mosshide Gnolls and 10 Mosshide Mongrels, then return to Rethiel the Greenwarden in the Wetlands.

name: Fire Taboo
description: Bring Rethiel the Greenwarden 9 Crude Flints.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to gather Lurker Venom, a Mo'grosh Crystal, and a Crocolisk Tear.

name: Claws from the Deep
description: Kill 12 Bluegill Murlocs.$B$BSlay Gobbler and take his head.$B$BBring Gobbler's Head to Karl Boran in Menethil Harbor.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to swim down to the base of the dam, locate the powder keg and stir in the Disarming Mixture to prevent an explosion.

name: Reclaiming Goods
description: Search the crates and barrels at the coastal Murloc camps.

name: Senir's Observations
description: Speak with Mountaineer Thalos.

name: A Dark Threat Looms
description: The Disarming Mixture seemed to take effect.  Return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir to report the good news.

name: The Search Continues
description: Search for the Menethil Statuette.

name: Search More Hovels
description: Continue searching the Murloc hovels for the Menethil Statuette.

name: Return the Statuette
description: Bring Karl Boran the Menethil Statuette.

name: Frostmane Hold
description: Explore Frostmane Hold, and kill 5 Frostmane Headhunters for Senir Whitebeard in Kharanos.

name: The Third Fleet
description: Buy First Mate Fitzsimmons a Flagon of Mead.

name: The Cursed Crew
description: Kill 13 Cursed Sailors, 5 Cursed Marines and First Mate Snellig.  Bring Snellig's Snuffbox to First Mate Fitzsimmons in Menethil Harbor.

name: Lifting the Curse
description: Get the Intrepid Strongbox Key from Captain Halyndor.$B$BUse the key to open the Intrepid's Locked Strongbox.

name: The Reports
description: Deliver Senir's report to Senator Barin Redstone in Ironforge.

name: The Eye of Paleth
description: Bring the Cursed Eye of Paleth to Glorin Steelbrow.

name: Cleansing the Eye
description: Bring Archbishop Benedictus the Cursed Eye of Paleth.  Benedictus is in the Cathedral of Light, in the city of Stormwind.

name: Ormer's Revenge
description: Ormer Ironbraid at the Whelgar Excavation Site wants you to kill 10 Mottled Screechers and 10 Mottled Raptors.

name: Ormer's Revenge
description: Ormer Ironbraid wants you to kill 10 Mottled Scytheclaw raptors and 10 Mottled Razormaw raptors then return to him at the Whelgar Excavation Site.

name: Ormer's Revenge
description: Ormer Ironbraid at the Whelgar Excavation Site wants you to kill Sarltooth and return to him with one of his talons once the task is fulfilled.

name: Gathering Idols
description: Bring Magmar Fellhew 8 Carved Stone Idols.

name: Excavation Progress Report
description: Bring Ironband's Progress Report to Jern Hornhelm in Thelsamar.

name: Uncovering the Past
description: Prospector Whelgar wants you to scour the excavation site in search of the 4 missing tablet fragments: Ados, Modr, Golm and Neru.

name: Report to Ironforge
description: Take Ironband's Progress Report to Prospector Stormpike.

name: Powder to Ironband
description: Speak with Jern Hornhelm in Thelsamar.

name: The Dark Iron War
description: Motley Garmason at Dun Modr wants you to kill 10 Dark Iron Dwarves,  5 Dark Iron Tunnelers, 5 Dark Iron Saboteurs and 5 Dark Iron Demolitionists.

name: A Grim Task
description: Kill Balgaras the Foul and bring his ear to Longbraid the Grim outside of Dun Modr.

name: In Search of The Excavation Team
description: Tarrel Rockweaver wants you to travel to the Excavation Site and contact Merrin Rockweaver.

name: In Search of The Excavation Team
description: Return to Tarrel Rockweaver with Merrin's note.

name: Filthy Paws
description: Go to the Silver Stream Mine and collect 4 loads of Miners' Gear.$B$BReturn to Mountaineer Stormpike.

name: Protecting the Shipment
description: Ensure Miran and the shipment arrive at the excavation site, then inform Prospector Ironband.

name: Bitter Rivals
description: In the basement of the Thunderbrew Distillery in Kharanos, replace a barrel of Thunder Ale with a Barrel of Barleybrew Scalder.

name: Return to Marleth
description: Bring the barrel of Thunder Ale to Marleth Barleybrew at the Brewnall Village.

name: Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
description: Retrieve Tundra MacGrann's dried meats from the stolen meat locker in Old Icebeard's cave.

name: The Grizzled Den
description: Gather 8 Wendigo Manes and bring them to Pilot Stonegear.

name: Protecting the Herd
description: Rudra Amberstill wants you to slay Vagash and bring his fang to her at the Ram ranch.

name: The Perfect Stout
description: Bring 6 Shimmerweeds to Rejold Barleybrew in the Brewnall Village.

name: Stocking Jetsteam
description: Gather 4 Chunks of Boar Meat and 2 Thick Bear Furs, and deliver them to Pilot Bellowfiz at Steelgrill's Depot.

name: Evershine
description: Get a cask of Evershine from Rejold Barleybrew in Brewnall Village.

name: A Favor for Evershine
description: Kill 6 Ice Claw Bears, 8 Elder Crag Boars, and 8 Snow Leopards, and then return to Rejold Barleybrew in Brewnall Village.

name: Return to Bellowfiz
description: Give the cask of Evershine to Pilot Bellowfiz at Steelgrill's Depot.

name: Lightforge Iron
description: Search the wreckage of The Flying Osprey in the Wetlands.

name: Blessed Arm
description: Take the Crate of Lightforge Ingots to Grimand Elmore in Stormwind.

name: Proving Your Worth
description: Kill 15 Skeletal Raiders, 3 Skeletal Healers and 3 Skeletal Warders, and then return to Sven.

name: The Lost Ingots
description: Gather 5 Lightforge Ingots, then return to Glorin Steelbrow in the Wetlands.

name: Armed and Ready
description: Bring Morbent's Bane to Sven in Duskwood.

name: The Hidden Key
description: Use the Small Brass Key to open Bookie Herod's Strongbox.

name: The Spy Revealed!
description: Take the Muddy Note to Lieutenant Doren at the Rebel Camp.

name: Patrol Schedules
description: Speak with Corporal Sethman.

name: Report to Doren
description: Speak with Lieutenant Doren.

name: Wine Shop Advert
description: Go to the Gallina Winery, and bring Suzetta Gallina the Wine Ticket for a free bottle of wine.

name: Harlan Needs a Resupply
description: Go to the Canal Tailor Shop and bring Rema Schneider the Cloth Request from Harlan Bagley.

name: Package for Thurman
description: Go to the Larson Clothiers in the Stormwind Mage Quarter, and give Thurman Schneider his Sewing Kit.

name: A Noble Brew
description: Zardeth the Black Claw wants you to bring him a Tear of Tilloa from Darkshire and a Musquash Root from the Wetlands.

name: A Noble Brew
description: Take the Black Claw Stout to Lord Wishock in the Hall of Petitioners.

name: An Old History Book
description: Return the book: The History of Stormwind, to the Stormwind Library.

name: The Green Hills of Stranglethorn
description: Collect the missing pages from The Green Hills of Stranglethorn manuscript.  Once all four chapters are complete, return them to Barnil.

conditions.name: Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter I
Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter II
Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter III
Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter IV

name: Chapter I
description: Bring pages 1, 4, 6, and 8 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter I.
rewardssss: Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter I

name: Chapter II
description: Bring pages 10, 11, 14 and 16 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter II.
rewardssss: Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter II

name: Chapter III
description: Bring pages 18, 20, 21 and 24 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter III.
rewardssss: Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter III

name: Chapter IV
description: Bring pages 25, 26, and 27 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter IV.
rewardssss: Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter IV

name: Speaking of Fortitude
description: Go to the Royal Library in Stormwind Keep and speak with Milton Sheaf.  He can find for you the book on metallurgy that Brother Kristoff needs for his speech.

name: Brother Paxton
description: Speak with Brother Paxton in the Northshire Abbey.

name: Ink Supplies
description: Speak with Foreman Oslow in Lakeshire and ask him for Rethban Iron Ore.

name: Return to Kristoff
description: Return to Brother Kristoff in the Cathedral Square.  Give him the book The Stresses of Iron.

name: Rethban Ore
description: Gather 5 loads of Rethban Ore and bring it to Brother Paxton in the Northshire Library.

name: Stranglethorn Fever
description: Seek out Witch Doctor Unbagwa and have him summon Mokk the Savage.  Bring the Heart of Mokk to Fin Fizracket.

name: Look to an Old Friend
description: Speak to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

name: Find OOX-17/TN!
description: Bring the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot.

name: Stormpike's Delivery
description: Deliver the Package for Stormpike to Mountaineer Stormpike in Loch Modan.

name: Deaths in the Family
description: Bring Gregor's Remains, Nissa's Remains and Thurman's Remains to Coleman Farthing in Brill.

name: Speak with Sevren
description: Speak with Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

name: Rear Guard Patrol
description: Kill 8 Bleeding Horrors and 8 Wandering Spirits, then report back to Linnea at her camp.

name: The Lich's Identity
description: Bring the Lich's Spellbook to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

name: Graverobbers
description: Kill Rot Hide Graverobbers and Rot Hide Mongrels.  $B$BBring 8 Embalming Ichors to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

name: Forsaken Duties
description: Speak with Deathguard Linnea.

name: Return to the Magistrate
description: Return to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

name: A Letter Undelivered
description: Find Yvette Farthing, and deliver to her the letter from Thurman Agamand.

name: The Haunted Mills
description: Slay Devlin Agamand, and bring Devlin's Remains to Coleman Farthing in Brill.

name: Rude Awakening
description: Speak with Shadow Priest Sarvis.

name: The Mindless Ones
description: Shadow Priest Sarvis wants you to kill 8 Mindless Zombies and 8 Wretched Zombies.

name: Fields of Grief
description: Steal 10 pumpkins from the farm to the west, just north of Deathknell and take them to Apothecary Johaan in Brill.

name: Return the Book
description: Return Gunther's Spellbook to him, on the island of Gunther's Retreat.

name: A New Plague
description: Apothecary Johaan in the town of Brill wants you to collect 5 Vials of Darkhound Blood.

name: A New Plague
description: Apothecary Johaan of the town of Brill needs 5 Vile Fin Scales from Murlocs in Tirisfal Glades.

name: A New Plague
description: Apothecary Johaan in the town of Brill wants you to bring him 4 samples of venom from a Vicious Night Web Spider.

name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
description: Executor Zygand in Brill wants you to kill Captain Perrine, 3 Scarlet Zealots and 3 Scarlet Missionaries.

name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
description: Executor Zygand in Brill has commissioned you to slay Captain Vachon and 5 Scarlet Friars.

name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
description: Executor Zygand in the town of Brill wants you to assassinate Captain Melrache and his two bodyguards.

name: The Unsent Letter
description: Deliver the Letter to the City Architect to Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

name: Proof of Demise
description: Bring 10 Scarlet Insignia Rings to Deathguard Burgess in Brill.

name: The Chill of Death
description: Bring five Duskbat Pelts and some Coarse Thread to Gretchen Dedmar in Brill.

name: The Damned
description: Novice Elreth requires 6 Scavenger Paws and 6 Duskbat Wings.

name: Crime and Punishment
description: Councilman Millstipe of Darkshire wants you to bring him the hand of Dextren Ward.

name: The Fury Runs Deep
description: Motley Garmason wants Kam Deepfury's head brought to him at Dun Modr.

name: Slake That Thirst
description: Bring 5 Wastewander Water Pouches to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan.

name: Night Web's Hollow
description: Executor Arren wants you to kill 10 Young Night Web Spiders and 8 Night Web Spiders.

name: The Scarlet Crusade
description: Bring Executor Arren 12 Scarlet Armbands from Scarlet Converts and Scarlet Initiates.

name: The Red Messenger
description: Kill Meven Korgal, the messenger, at the Crusader camp, then return any information you find to Executor Arren.

name: Vital Intelligence
description: Deliver the Scarlet Crusade Documents to Executor Zygand in Brill.

name: Beer Basted Boar Ribs
description: Ragnar Thunderbrew in Kharanos wants 6 Crag Boar Ribs and a mug of Rhapsody Malt.

name: Crocolisk Hunting
description: Get 5 pieces of Crocolisk Meat and 6 Crocolisk Skins for Marek Ironheart at the Farstrider Lodge.

name: What Comes Around...
description: Bring the head of Targorr the Dread to Guard Berton in Lakeshire.

name: Quell The Uprising
description: Warden Thelwater of Stormwind wants you to kill 10 Defias Prisoners, 8 Defias Convicts, and 8 Defias Insurgents in The Stockade.

name: The Color of Blood
description: Nikova Raskol of Stormwind wants you to collect 10 Red Wool Bandanas.

name: Bazil Thredd
description: Speak with Warden Thelwater in the Stockade.

name: The Stockade Riots
description: Kill Bazil Thredd and bring his head back to Warden Thelwater at the Stockade.

name: The Curious Visitor
description: Bring the Sealed Description of Thredd's Visitor to Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

name: Shadow of the Past
description: Bring the Sealed Description of Thredd's Visitor to Master Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.

name: The Head of the Beast
description: Speak to Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.

name: Brotherhood's End
description: Speak with Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

name: An Audience with the King
description: Deliver Baros Alexston's report on the Defias Brotherhood to King Varian Wrynn in Stormwind Keep.

name: You Have Served Us Well
description: Speak with Zggi, the servant of Zardeth the Blackclaw, to claim your reward.

name: Wanted: Maggot Eye
description: Kill Maggot Eye and return to Executor Zygand in Brill with his paw for a reward.

name: Humble Beginnings
description: Go to Baros Alexston's house in Westfall and search for his compass, then return it to him in Cathedral Square of Stormwind.

name: Tools for Steelgrill
description: Deliver Steelgrill's Tools to Beldin Steelgrill.

name: Wait for Sirra to Finish
description: Wait a moment, then speak with Sirra Von'Indi again.

name: A Putrid Task
description: Bring 7 Putrid Claws to Deathguard Dillinger in Brill.

name: The Prodigal Lich
description: Present Sevren's Orders to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

name: Fields of Grief
description: Take the Laced Pumpkin to the Captured Scarlet Zealot who is being held in the cellar of the Gallow's End Tavern.

name: The Family Crypt
description: Kill 8 Wailing Ancestors and 8 Rotting Ancestors.$B$BKill Captain Dargol, and bring his skull to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

name: Proving Allegiance
description: Obtain a Candle of Beckoning.$B$BSummon Lillith Nefara and kill her.$B$BReturn to Gunther on his island.

name: The Prodigal Lich Returns
description: Bring the Nether Gem to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

name: Operation Recombobulation
description: Bring Razzle Sprysprocket in Kharanos 8 Restabilization Cogs and 8 Gyromechanic Gears.

name: Shimmer Stout
description: Take the Barrel of Shimmer Stout to Mountaineer Barleybrew.

name: Stout to Kadrell
description: Take the Cask of Shimmer Stout to Mountaineer Kadrell.

name: Rejold's New Brew
description: Speak with Rejold Barleybrew.

name: Rat Catching
description: Bring 12 Tunnel Rat Ears to Mountaineer Kadrell in Thelsamar.

name: A Pilot's Revenge
description: Kill Mangeclaw.$B$BBring his Mangy Claw and Hildelve's Journal to Pilot Hammerfoot.

name: Thelsamar Blood Sausages
description: Bring 3 pieces of Bear Meat, 3 Boar Intestines, and 3 Spider Ichor to Vidra Hearthstove in Thelsamar.

name: The Lost Pilot
description: Find Pilot Hildelve.

name: Senir's Observations
description: Deliver Grelin's report to Senir Whitebeard in Kharanos.

name: Prove Your Worth
description: Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher wants you to kill 5 Moonrage Whitescalps.

name: Arugal's Folly
description: Retrieve the Remedy of Arugal for Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: Arugal's Folly
description: Bring 6 Glutton Shackles and 3 Darksoul Shackles to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: Arugal's Folly
description: Kill Grimson the Pale and bring his head to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: Ivar the Foul
description: Kill Ivar the Foul, and bring Ivar's Head to Rane Yorick at the Ivar Patch.

name: The Mills Overrun
description: Gather 5 Notched Ribs and 3 Blackened Skulls, then return to Deathguard Dillinger in Brill.

name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
description: Executor Zygand of Brill wants you to kill 10 Scarlet Warriors.

name: Lost Deathstalkers
description: Find the Deathstalkers Quinn and Rane Yorick.

name: Wild Hearts
description: Gather 6 discolored worg hearts and bring them to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

name: Return to Quinn
description: Bring Quinn's potion to Quinn Yorick at the Ivar Patch, north of the Sepulcher.

name: Those Blasted Troggs!
description: Kill 6 Rockjaw Skullthumpers for Foreman Stonebrow at the Gol'Bolar quarry.

name: The Public Servant
description: Kill 10 Rockjaw Bonesnappers for Senator Mehr Stonehallow at the Gol'Bolar quarry.

name: The Attack!
description: Remain in the garden until Lord Gregor Lescovar and Marzon the Silent Blade have had their conversation. Afterwards, kill them both before returning to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

name: Escorting Erland
description: Escort Erland through the wolves, to Rane Yorick.

name: Ironband's Excavation
description: Speak with Explorer Fellhew.

name: The Dead Fields
description: Kill rot hide gnolls at the Dead Fields.$B$BWhen Nightlash appears, kill her.$B$BBring the Essence of Nightlash to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

name: The Decrepit Ferry
description: Go to the Decrepit Ferry.$B$BSearch for the reason the Scourge are there.

name: Rot Hide Clues
description: Bring Deliah's Ring to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

name: The Engraved Ring
description: Bring Deliah's Ring to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

name: Raleigh and the Undercity
description: Bring Deliah's Ring to Raleigh.

name: Assault on Fenris Isle
description: Bring Thule's Head to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

name: Rot Hide Ichor
description: Bring 8 bottles of rot hide ichor to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

name: Rot Hide Origins
description: Bring the Sample Ichor to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

name: Delivery to Silverpine Forest
description: Take Apothecary Johaan's findings to Apothecary Renferrel in Silverpine Forest.

name: Thule Ravenclaw
description: Bring Bethor's Scroll to Apothecary Renferrel at the Silverpine Sepulcher.

name: A Recipe For Death
description: Collect 6 Grizzled Bear Hearts and 6 samples of Skittering Blood and deliver them to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

name: Report to Hadrec
description: Report to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

name: The Deathstalkers' Report
description: Bring the Deathstalker Report to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

name: A Recipe For Death
description: Retrieve Apothecary Berard's journal from Pyrewood Village and take it to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

name: A Recipe For Death
description: Bring 6 samples of Lake Creeper Moss, 6 samples of Lake Skulker Moss and a Hardened Tumor to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

name: Pyrewood Ambush
description: Help Deathstalker Faerleia kill the Pyrewood Council.

name: Finding the Shadowy Figure
description: Find the Shadowy Figure.  Your clues:$B$BHe is not native to Darkshire.$B$BHe is a nervous, jittery person.$B$BHe left Darkshire and headed west.

name: After the Ambush
description: Speak with Miran.

name: The Algaz Gauntlet
description: Traverse Dun Algaz.$B$BKill 8 Dragonmaw Scouts and 6 Dragonmaw Grunts.$B$BReport to Valstag Ironjaw in Menethil Harbor.

name: The Balance of Nature
description: Kill 7 Young Nightsabers and 4 Young Thistle Boars and return to Conservator Ilthalaine.

name: The Balance of Nature
description: Conservator Ilthalaine needs you to kill 7 Mangy Nightsabers and 7 Thistle Boars.

name: The Woodland Protector
description: Seek out the dryad known as Tarindrella.

name: The Woodland Protector
description: Collect 8 Fel Moss and bring them to Tarindrella.

name: Resting in Pieces
description: Bring Alaric's Head to his grave.

name: The Hidden Niche
description: Take Alaric to the hidden alcove.

name: The Greenwarden
description: Find the Greenwarden.

name: War Banners
description: Bring 8 Dragonmaw War Banners to Captain Stoutfist.

name: Nek'rosh's Gambit
description: Destroy the Dragonmaw catapults.

name: Search for Incendicite
description: Bring 6 loads of Incendicite Ore to Pilot Stonegear in Dun Morogh.

name: Stonegear's Search
description: Speak with Pilot Stonegear.

name: Report to Mountaineer Rockgar
description: Speak with Mountaineer Rockgar.

name: Daily Delivery
description: Deliver the Bundle of Crocolisk Skins to James Halloran, the tanner, in Menethil Harbor.

name: Digging Through the Ooze
description: One of the oozes at Ironbeard's Tomb has Sida's bag, retrieve it and bring it back to her in Menethil Harbor.

name: Apprentice's Duties
description: Collect 6 Giant Crocolisk Skins and bring them to James Halloran in Menethil Harbor.

name: Fall of Dun Modr
description: Search for Longbraid near the town of Dun Modr.

name: Report to Captain Stoutfist
description: Speak with Captain Stoutfist.

name: Defeat Nek'rosh
description: Kill Chieftain Nek'rosh$B$BBring Nek'rosh's Head to Captain Stoutfist.

name: A Troubling Breeze
description: Seek out Gaerolas Talvethren in Starbreeze Village.

name: Gnarlpine Corruption
description: Return to Athridas Bearmantle in Dolanaar.

name: Border Crossings
description: Retrieve the contents of one of the Dalaran wizards' crates. You will find Pyrewood Village to the south.

name: Maps and Runes
description: Bring the strange pendant to Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

name: Ambermill Investigations
description: Obtain 8 Dalaran Pendants for Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

name: The Weaver
description: Kill the Dalaran archmage, then retrieve his staff for Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

name: Dalar's Analysis
description: Take the rune-inscribed pendant to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: Dalaran's Intentions
description: Speak with Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

name: The Relics of Wakening
description: Retrieve the Relics of Wakening and bring them to Athridas Bearmantle in Dolanaar.

name: Young Crocolisk Skins
description: Obtain 4 Young Crocolisk Skins for James Halloran in Menethil Harbor.

name: Find OOX-09/HL!
description: Take the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot at the head of the river in the Hinterlands, near Skulk Rock.

name: Ursal the Mauler
description: Kill Ursal the Mauler and return to Athridas Bearmantle in Dolanaar.

name: The Road to Darnassus
description: Slay 6 Gnarlpine Ambushers and return to Sentinel Amara Nightwalker outside of Dolanaar.

name: Zenn's Bidding
description: Bring Zenn Foulhoof outside of Dolanaar 3 Nightsaber Fangs, 3 Strigid Owl Feathers and 3 swatches of Webwood Spider Silk.

name: Seek Redemption!
description: Collect 3 Fel Cones and give them to Zenn Foulhoof outside of Dolanaar.

name: Wand to Bethor
description: Take the Woven Wand to Bethor Iceshard in the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

name: A New Plague
description: Bring Johaan's Special Drink to the Captured Mountaineer.

name: Journey to Hillsbrad Foothills
description: Deliver Apothecary Renferrel's findings to Apothecary Lydon in the town of Tarren Mill in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

name: Time To Strike
description: Travel to Tarren Mill to deliver Deathstalker Lesh's message to High Executor Darthalia.

name: The Crown of Will
description: Report to Melisara at Tarren Mill in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

name: Elixir of Suffering
description: Apothecary Lydon of Tarren Mill wants 10 Gray Bear Tongues and some Creeper Ichor.

name: The Rescue
description: Krusk in Tarren Mill needs you to free Drull and Tog'thar from Durnholde Keep.

name: Elixir of Suffering
description: Give Umpi the Elixir of Suffering.

name: Crushridge Bounty
description: Gather 9 Dirty Knucklebones from Crushridge ogres in the Alterac Mountains.  Bring them to Marshal Redpath in Southshore.

name: Elixir of Pain
description: Bring 10 vials of Mountain Lion Blood to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

name: Elixir of Pain
description: Feed the Elixir of Pain to Stanley.

name: Gol'dir
description: Free Gol'dir then return to Krusk in Tarren Mill.

name: Crushridge Warmongers
description: Slay 15 Crushridge Warmongers, then return to Marshal Redpath in Southshore.

name: Syndicate Assassins

description: Grull Hawkwind in Camp Narache wants you to bring him 10 Mountain Cougar Pelts.
