description: Return the Venture Co. Documents to Morin Cloudstalker near Bloodhoof Village.

name: A Humble Task
description: Chief Hawkwind wants you to search for his mother near the water well to the southeast of Camp Narache.

name: A Humble Task
description: Take a Water Pitcher from the water well.$b$bReturn the pitcher to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache which is northwest from the water well.

name: Winterhoof Cleansing
description: Use the Winterhoof Cleansing Totem at the Winterhoof Water Well, then return to Mull Thunderhorn.

name: Rites of the Earthmother
description: Travel to Seer Graytongue who lives in the hills directly south of Camp Narache.

name: Thunderhorn Totem
description: Bring 6 Stalker Claws and 6 Cougar Claws to Mull Thunderhorn.

name: Rite of Strength
description: Kill Bristlebacks in Brambleblade Ravine and bring 12 Bristleback Belts to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache.

name: Thunderhorn Cleansing
description: Use the Thunderhorn Cleansing Totem at the Thunderhorn Water Well, then return to Mull.

name: Wildmane Totem
description: Bring 8 Prairie Alpha Teeth to Mull Thunderhorn in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Wildmane Cleansing
description: Use the Wildmane Cleansing Totem at the Wildmane Water Well, then return to Mull Thunderhorn.

name: Swoop Hunting
description: Bring 8 Trophy Swoop Quills to Harken Windtotem in Bloodhoof Village.

name: An Ambassador of Evil
description: Kill Ambassador Infernus in Angor Fortress and bring proof of his death to Advisor Belgrum in Ironforge.

name: Rites of the Earthmother
description: Take the Totem of Hawkwind to Baine Bloodhoof in Bloodhoof Village. Follow the road out of Camp Narache.

name: The Venture Co.
description: Kill 14 Venture Co. Workers and 6 Venture Co. Supervisors for Morin Cloudstalker at Bloodhoof Village.

name: Supervisor Fizsprocket
description: Kill Supervisor Fizsprocket and return his clipboard to Morin Cloudstalker at Bloodhoof Village.

name: Mazzranache
description: Bring a Prairie Wolf Heart, Flatland Cougar Femur, Plainstrider Scale and Swoop Gizzard to Maur Raincaller at Bloodhoof Village.

name: Rite of Vision
description: Speak with Zarlman Two-Moons in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Gathering Leather
description: Bring 12 pieces of Light Leather to Veren Tallstrider in Thunder Bluff.

name: Kodo Hide Bag
description: Bring 4 Light Leather and 4 Coarse Thread to Veren Tallstrider in Thunder Bluff.

name: The Demon Scarred Cloak
description: Find someone who knows of Ghost Howl.

name: Rite of Vision
description: Collect 2 Well Stones and 2 Ambercorn and bring them back to Zarlman Two-Moons in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Rite of Vision
description: Consume the Water of the Seers in front of the tribal fire in Bloodhoof Village and follow the vision once it appears.

name: Rite of Wisdom
description: Travel to Red Rocks east of Thunder Bluff and speak with the Ancestral Spirit.

name: Journey into Thunder Bluff
description: Speak with Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: Rites of the Earthmother
description: Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff wants you to bring him the Horn of Arra'chea.

name: This Is Going to Be Hard
description: Bring Cog #5 to Lotwil Veriatus.

name: This Is Going to Be Hard
description: Defeat the Fam'retor Guardian and bring Lotwil's Shackles of Elemental Binding back to Lotwil Veriatus.

name: The Battleboars
description: Grull Hawkwind in Camp Narache wants you to kill Battleboars and bring back 8 Battleboar Snouts and 8 Battleboar Flanks.

name: Attack on Camp Narache
description: Bring the Bristleback Attack Plans to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache.

name: Broken Alliances
description: Kill Boss Tho'grun and bring the Sign of the Earth to Gorn in Kargath.

name: A Threat Within
description: Speak with Marshal McBride.

name: Vanquish the Betrayers
description: Kill 2 Kul Tiras Sailors, 2 Kul Tiras Marines and Lieutenant Benedict and return to Gar'Thok in Razor Hill.

name: Thwarting Kolkar Aggression
description: Lar Prowltusk outside of Sen'jin Village wants you to destroy the 3 sets of Attack Plans held within Kolkar Crag.

name: The New Horde
description: Report to Gornek in the Den.

name: Cutting Teeth
description: Kill 3 Mottled Boars then return to Gornek at the Den.

name: Sting of the Scorpid
description: Get 3 Scorpid Worker Tails for Gornek in the Den.

name: Sarkoth
description: Kill Sarkoth and bring his claw back to Hana'zua.

name: Carry Your Weight
description: Furl Scornbrow in the Razor Hill watchtower wants 3 Canvas Scraps.

name: Vile Familiars
description: Kill 3 Vile Familiars. Return to Zureetha Fargaze outside the Den.

name: Broken Alliances
description: Use the Sign of the Earth to activate the Pillars of Diamond, Opal, and Amethyst and obtain the Runestones.$b$bPlace the runestones in the Seal of the Earth to free Blacklash and Hematus.$b$bSlay them and return Blacklash's Bindings, the Chains of Hematus, and the Sign of the Earth to Gorn.

name: Burning Blade Medallion
description: Bring the Burning Blade Medallion to Zureetha Fargaze, outside The Den.

name: Sarkoth
description: Bring the news of Hana'zua's plight to Gornek at the Den.

name: Report to Sen'jin Village
description: Speak with Master Gadrin in Sen'jin Village.

name: Dark Storms
description: Bring Fizzle's Claw to Orgnil Soulscar in Razor Hill.

name: Minshina's Skull
description: Retrieve Minshina's skull from the circle of power on the Echo Isles. Bring it to Master Gadrin in Sen'jin Village.

name: Ak'Zeloth
description: Speak with Ak'Zeloth in the Barrens.

name: Need for a Cure
description: Find Kor'ghan in Orgrimmar and get the Venomtail Antidote. Then bring the antidote to Rhinag near the northwestern border of Durotar.

name: Finding the Antidote
description: Bring 4 Venomtail Poison Sacs to Kor'ghan in Orgrimmar.

name: Break a Few Eggs
description: Bring 3 Taillasher Eggs to Cook Torka in Razor Hill.

name: Lost But Not Forgotten
description: Bring a sign of Kron's fate to Misha Tor'kren at the farmstead northwest of Razor Hill.

name: Practical Prey
description: Bring 3 Durotar Tiger Furs to Vel'rin Fang in Sen'jin Village.

name: A Solvent Spirit
description: Bring 2 Intact Makrura Eyes and 3 vials of Crawler Mucus to Master Vornal in Sen'jin Village.

name: Chen's Empty Keg
description: Find someone who knows about Chen's Empty Keg.

name: Chen's Empty Keg
description: Bring 2 Savannah Lion Tusks, 2 Plainstrider Kidneys, and 1 Thunder Lizard Horn to Brewmaster Drohn in Ratchet.

name: Chen's Empty Keg
description: Bring 2 Lightning Glands, 1 Thunderhawk Saliva Gland and 1 Kodo Liver to Brewmaster Drohn in Ratchet.

name: Report to Orgnil
description: Speak with Orgnil Soulscar in Razor Hill.

name: Je'neu of the Earthen Ring
description: Bring the Befouled Water Globe to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: From The Wreckage....
description: Gar'Thok of Razor Hill wants you to retrieve 3 Gnomish Tools from the wreckage off the coast.

name: Zalazane
description: Defeat Zalazane.$B$BKill 8 Voodoo Trolls and 8 Hexed Trolls.$B$BBring Zalazane's Head to Gadrin.

name: Skull Rock
description: Gather Searing Collars from the cultists in Skull Rock.$B$BBring them to Margoz at his camp.

name: Margoz
description: Speak with Margoz.

name: Neeru Fireblade
description: Bring an Example Collar to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

name: The Admiral's Orders
description: Take Admiral Proudmoore's Orders to Gar'Thok in Razor Hill.

name: The Admiral's Orders
description: Deliver Admiral Proudmoore's Orders to Nazgrel in Thrall's chamber in Orgrimmar.

name: Burning Shadows
description: Take this eye to Neeru Fireblade.

name: A Sacred Burial
description: Lorekeeper Raintotem wants you to kill 8 Bristleback Interlopers at Red Rocks.

name: Winds in the Desert
description: Retrieve 5 Sacks of Supplies and return them to Rezlak near Orgrimmar.

name: Securing the Lines
description: Kill 12 Dustwind Savages and 8 Dustwind Storm Witches for Rezlak near Drygulch Ravine.

name: Rescue OOX-09/HL!
description: Escort OOX-09/HL to the shoreline beyond Overlook Cliff, then report to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

name: Encroachment
description: Kill 4 Razormane Quilboars, 4 Razormane Scouts, 4 Razormane Dustrunners and 4 Razormane Battleguards for Gar'Thok at Razor Hill.

name: Scholomance
description: Speak with Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Conscript of the Horde
description: Follow the western road from Razor Hill to the Barrens over a bridge.$B$BStop at the orc outpost across the bridge.$B$BGive Kargal Battlescar at the Barrens outpost your recruitment letter.

name: Another Power Source?
description: Bring 10 Wastewander Water Pouches to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan in exchange for another power source.

name: Crossroads Conscription
description: Follow the western road from Kargal's Far Watch Outpost.$B$BAt the T intersection, turn left and follow the road south. $B$BFind Sergra Darkthorn at the crossing of roads within the Crossroads.

name: Gann's Reclamation
description: Gann Stonespire wants you to kill 15 Bael'dun Excavators and 5 Bael'dun Foremen.$b$bBring Khazgorm's Journal to Gann Stonespire.

name: Plainstrider Menace
description: Collect 7 Plainstrider Beaks and return them to Sergra Darkthorn in the Crossroads.

name: The Zhevra
description: Slay Zhevra Runners to collect 4 Zhevra Hooves for Sergra Darkthorn in the Crossroads.

name: Revenge of Gann
description: Gann Stonespire wants you to bring him 6 vials of Nitroglycerin, 6 bundles of Wood Pulp, and 6 samples of Sodium Nitrate.

name: Guile of the Raptor
description: Speak with Tor'gan.

name: Fungal Spores
description: Bring 4 Fungal Spores to Apothecary Helbrim at the Crossroads.

name: Revenge of Gann
description: Destroy the flying machine at Bael Modan and return to Gann Stonespire.

name: Kolkar Leaders
description: Bring Barak's Head to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

name: Verog the Dervish
description: Bring Verog's Head to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

name: Hezrul Bloodmark
description: Bring Hezrul's Head to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

name: Apothecary Zamah
description: Bring the Rendered Spores to Apothecary Zamah in Thunder Bluff, before the time limit is up.

name: Journey to the Crossroads
description: Speak with Thork at the Crossroads in the Barrens.

name: Centaur Bracers
description: Bring 15 Centaur Bracers to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

name: The Tear of the Moons
description: Feegly the Exiled wants you to retrieve for him the Tear of the Moons.

name: Ignition
description: Get the Ignition Key and bring it to Wizzlecrank.

name: Sergra Darkthorn
description: Speak with Sergra Darkthorn at the Crossroads.

name: The Hunter's Way
description: Bring 4 Flatland Prowler Claws to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: Dig Rat Stew
description: Bring 8 Dig Rats to Grub east of the Crossroads.

name: The Escape
description: Protect Wizzlecrank and the stolen goblin shredder on the way to Sputtervalve in Ratchet.

name: Return to Apothecary Zinge
description: Bring the Sealed Field Testing Kit to Apothecary Zinge in the Undercity.

name: Raptor Horns
description: Gather 5 Intact Raptor Horns from Sunscale Scytheclaws, and bring them to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

name: Root Samples
description: Bring 8 Root Samples to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

name: Harpy Raiders
description: Collect 8 Witchwing talons.$B$BReturn them to Darsok Swiftdagger at the Crossroads.

name: Egg Hunt
description: Bring 12 Silithid Eggs and the Digging Claw to Korran at the Crossroads.

name: Raptor Thieves
description: Bring 12 Raptor Heads to Gazrog at the Crossroads.

name: The Forgotten Pools
description: Report back to Tonga Runetotem with your findings.

name: Disrupt the Attacks
description: Of the Razormane tribe, kill 8 Water Seekers, 8 Thornweavers and 3 Hunters, and then return to Thork in the Crossroads.

name: The Disruption Ends
description: Kill 8 Razormane Geomancers, 8 Razormane Defenders, and Kreenig Snarlsnout.$B$BThen bring Kreenig Snarlsnout's Tusk to Thork at the Crossroads.

name: Isha Awak
description: Bring the Heart of Isha Awak to Mahren Skyseer.

name: Mahren Skyseer
description: Speak with Mahren Skyseer.

name: Harpy Lieutenants
description: Collect 6 Harpy Lieutenant Rings from Witchwing Slayers and return them to Darsok Swiftdagger at the Crossroads.

name: Serena Bloodfeather
description: Slay Serena Bloodfeather and return her head to Darsok Swiftdagger at the Crossroads.

name: The Stagnant Oasis
description: Return to Tonga at The Crossroads, after investigating the Stagnant Oasis.

name: Tribes at War
description: Kill 6 Bristleback Water Seekers, 12 Bristleback Thornweavers and 12 Bristleback Geomancers and return to Mangletooth at Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.

name: Betrayal from Within
description: Kill Nak, Kuz, and Lok Orcbane and bring their skulls to Mangletooth at Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.

name: Altered Beings
description: Bring 8 Altered Snapjaw Shells to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads.

name: Echeyakee
description: Bring Echeyakee's Hide to Sergra Darkthorn at the Crossroads.

name: Ishamuhale
description: Bring Ishamuhale's Fang to Jorn at Camp Taurajo.

name: Lakota'mani
description: Bring the Hoof of Lakota'mani to Jorn at Camp Taurajo.

name: Owatanka
description: Bring Owatanka's Tailspike to Jorn at Camp Taurajo.

name: Washte Pawne
description: Bring Washte Pawne's Feather to Jorn Skyseer at Camp Taurajo.

name: The Barrens Oases
description: Speak with Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads.

name: Southsea Freebooters
description: Kill 12 Southsea Brigands and 6 Southsea Cannoneers for Gazlowe in Ratchet.

name: Stolen Booty
description: Retrieve the Shipment of Boots and Telescopic Lens for Gazlowe in Ratchet.

name: The Missing Shipment
description: Bring Gazlowe's Ledger to Wharfmaster Dizzywig.

name: The Guns of Northwatch
description: Captain Thalo'thas Brightsun of Ratchet wants you to collect 10 Theramore Medals and slay Captain Fairmount, Cannoneer Whessan and Cannoneer Smythe.

name: The Missing Shipment
description: Return Gazlowe's Ledger to Gazlowe in Ratchet.

name: Weapons of Choice
description: Bring a Razormane Backstabber, a Charred Razormane Wand and a Razormane War Shield to Tatternack Steelforge at Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.

name: Samophlange
description: Access the control console at the Venture Company research site.

name: WANTED: Baron Longshore
description: Bring the head of Baron Longshore to Gazlowe in Ratchet.

name: Miner's Fortune
description: Retrieve the Cats Eye Emerald from one of the Venture Co. Overseers or Enforcers for Wharfmaster Dizzywig at Ratchet.

name: The Harvester
description: Bring the Harvester's Head to Jorn Skyseer.

name: Free From the Hold
description: Safely escort Gilthares Firebough back to Captain Brightsun in Ratchet.

name: Consumed by Hatred
description: Bring 60 Bristleback Quilboar Tusks to Mankrik at the Crossroads.

name: Samophlange
description: Close off the Fuel Control Valve, the Regulator Valve and the Main Control Valve then use the control console again.

name: Samophlange
description: Get the Console Key from Tinkerer Sniggles to use on the control console.

name: Samophlange
description: Return the Samophlange to Sputtervalve in Ratchet.

name: Prowlers of the Barrens
description: Collect 7 Prowler Claws from Savannah Prowlers for Sergra Darkthorn in the Crossroads.

name: The Angry Scytheclaws
description: Kill Sunscale raptors and collect their feathers. Use the feathers on the 3 Scytheclaw nests. Return to Sergra Darkthorn in the Crossroads.

name: Betrayal from Within
description: Bring Lok's Skull to Thork at the Crossroads in the Barrens.

name: Enraged Thunder Lizards
description: Bring 3 Thunder Lizard Blood to Jorn Skyseer at Camp Taurajo.

name: Amongst the Ruins
description: Bring the Fathom Core to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: Baron Aquanis
description: Bring the Strange Water Globe to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: Down at the Docks
description: Take your ward to the docks of Ratchet in the Barrens.

name: Gateway to the Frontier
description: Take your ward to the Mor'shan Rampart in the northern part of the Barrens, just before entering Ashenvale.

name: Cry of the Thunderhawk
description: Find and slay a Thunderhawk, return its wings to Jorn Skyseer at Camp Taurajo.

name: Leaders of the Fang
description: Bring the Gems of Cobrahn, Anacondra, Pythas and Serpentis to Nara Wildmane in Thunder Bluff.

name: You Scream, I Scream...
description: Get some Strawberry Ice Cream for your ward.  The lad seems to prefer Tigule and Foror's brand ice cream.

conditions.name: Tigule and Foror's Strawberry Ice Cream

name: Webwood Venom
description: Bring 10 Webwood Venom Sacs to Gilshalan Windwalker at Aldrassil.

name: Webwood Egg
description: Bring a Webwood Egg to Gilshalan in Aldrassil.

name: Timberling Seeds
description: Bring 8 Timberling Seeds to Denelan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: Timberling Sprouts
description: Bring 12 Timberling Sprouts to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: Tenaron's Summons
description: Speak with Tenaron Stormgrip atop Aldrassil in Shadowglen.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Fill the Crystal Phial and bring it back to Tenaron Stormgrip atop Aldrassil.

name: Rellian Greenspyre
description: Bring a Timberling Seed to Rellian Greenspyre in Darnassus.

name: Tumors
description: Bring 5 Mossy Tumors to Rellian Greenspyre in Darnassus.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Cairne's Hoofprint
description: Travel to Thunder Bluff to see about getting Cairne Bloodhoof's hoofprint for your ward.

name: The Moss-twined Heart
description: Bring the Moss-twined Heart to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Bring the Partially Filled Vessel to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Fill the Jade Phial and bring it back to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

name: The Glowing Fruit
description: Bring the glowing fruit to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: The Shimmering Frond
description: Bring a Shimmering Frond to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth

name: Twisted Hatred
description: Kill Lord Melenas and bring his head to Tallonkai Swiftroot in Dolanaar.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Fill the Tourmaline Phial and bring it back to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Fill the Amethyst Phial and bring it back to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Bring the Filled Vessel to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: The Enchanted Glade
description: Acquire 6 Bloodfeather Belts and bring them to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak in the Oracle Glade.

name: Mist
description: Escort Mist to Sentinel Arynia Cloudsbreak at the moon well near the Oracle Tree.

name: Flute of Xavaric
description: Bring the Flute of Xavaric and 5 Jadefire Felbind samples to Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.

name: Teldrassil
description: Deliver the Oracle Tree's report to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Planting the Heart
description: Plant the Tainted Heart in Denalan's Planter.

name: The Absent Minded Prospector
description: Take the mysterious fossil to Archaeologist Flagongut in Menethil Harbor.

name: The Absent Minded Prospector
description: Archaeologist Flagongut in Menethil Harbor wants you to bring him the Stone of Relu and Flagongut's Fossil.

name: The Master's Glaive
description: Gather information, then use the Phial of Scrying to create a Scrying Bowl.  Use the bowl to speak with Onu.

name: Therylune's Escape
description: Help Therylune escape, then tell Therysil at the Shrine of Aessina that her sister is safe.

name: Cave Mushrooms
description: Bring 5 Scaber Stalks and 1 Death Cap to Barithras Moonshade in Auberdine.

name: Onu
description: Speak with Onu at the Grove of the Ancients.

name: The Twilight Camp
description: Find a clue in the Twilight's Hammer camp at the Master's Glaive.

name: Return to Onu
description: Bring Onu the recovered Insane Scribbles.

name: Mathystra Relics
description: Bring 6 Mathystra Relics to Onu at the Grove of the Ancients.

name: Grove of the Ancients
description: Deliver Fandral's message to Onu in the Grove of the Ancients in Darkshore, south of Auberdine.

name: The Fall of Ameth'Aran
description: Study the tablets which tell of Ameth'Aran and of its fall, then return to Sentinel Tysha Moonblade in Darkshore.

name: Bashal'Aran
description: Find the source of the strange blue aura in the ruins of Bashal'Aran.

name: Bashal'Aran
description: Acquire 8 Grell Earrings for Asterion in Bashal'Aran.

name: Bashal'Aran
description: Obtain the Ancient Moonstone Seal and bring it to Asterion in Bashal'Aran.

name: Bashal'Aran
description: Destroy the Ancient Moonstone Seal at the ancient flame in Ameth'Aran, then return to Asterion in Bashal'Aran.

name: Tools of the Highborne
description: Retrieve 7 Highborne Relics for Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine.

name: Trouble at the Docks
description: Crane Operator Bigglefuzz in Ratchet wants you to retrieve the bottle of 99-Year-Old Port from Mad Magglish who is hiding in the Wailing Caverns.

name: Serpentbloom
description: Apothecary Zamah in Thunder Bluff wants you to collect 10 Serpentbloom.

name: For Love Eternal
description: Free the spirit of Anaya Dawnrunner and bring her pendant back to Cerellean Whiteclaw in Auberdine.

name: Skeletal Fragments
description: Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Find Balthule Shadowstrike near the Tower of Althalaxx in Darkshore.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Collect 4 Worn Parchments for Balthule Shadowstrike near the Tower of Althalaxx.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Deliver Balthule's letter to Delgren the Purifier in Ashenvale Forest.

name: The Powers Below
description: Bring the Book: The Powers Below to Gerrig Bonegrip in the Forlorn Cavern, Ironforge.

name: Luck Be With You
description: Collect 10 Frostmaul Shards for Witch Doctor Mau'ari in Everlook.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Collect a Glowing Soul Gem and return it to Delgren the Purifier at Maestra's Post.

name: Knowledge in the Deeps
description: Bring the Lorgalis Manuscript to Gerrig Bonegrip in the Forlorn Cavern in Ironforge.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Bring Ilkrud Magthrull's Tome to Delgren the Purifier at Maestra's Post.

name: Finding the Source
description: Krakle in Un'Goro Crater wants you to find the hottest area of Fire Plume Ridge.$B$BWhenever you find a hot spot, right click the thermometer to check the temperature. Keep looking until you find the hottest one.

name: Cache of Mau'ari
description: Speak to Witch Doctor Mau'ari again in a moment to receive the lucky charm.

name: Supplies to Auberdine
description: Speak with Delgren the Purifier at Maestra's Post after seeing Feero safely through Ashenvale Forest.

name: Are We There, Yeti?
description: Collect 2 Pristine Yeti Horns for Umi Rumplesnicker in Everlook.

name: Moontouched Wildkin
description: Collect 10 Moontouched Feathers from Winterspring, then return to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.

name: Find Ranshalla
description: Find Ranshalla in eastern Winterspring.

name: The New Springs
description: Travel to Winterspring and speak with Donova Snowden.

name: The Tower of Althalaxx
description: Talk to Delgren the Purifier at Maestra's Post.

name: Deep Ocean, Vast Sea
description: Recover the Silver Dawning's Lockbox and the Mist Veil's Lockbox for Gorbold Steelhand in Auberdine.  Both items should be found aboard the wreckage of the ships to the north of the village.

name: Buzzbox 827
description: Collect 6 Crawler Legs and place them in Buzzbox 827.

name: How Big a Threat?
description: Find a corrupt furbolg camp in Darkshore and return to Terenthis in Auberdine.

name: How Big a Threat?
description: Kill 8 Blackwood Pathfinders and 5 Windtalkers and return to Terenthis in Auberdine.

name: A Lost Master
description: Find 5 Fine Moonstalker Pelts and return them to Terenthis in Auberdine.

name: Trek to Ashenvale
description: Find Raene Wolfrunner in Ashenvale.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find Teronis in Ashenvale.

name: Gadgetzan Water Survey
description: Use the untapped dowsing widget near the pool of water by Sandsorrow Watch.  Once you have collected the sample, return the tapped dowsing widget to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser in Gadgetzan.

name: Escape Through Force
description: Protect Volcor until you reach the road, then speak to Terenthis in Auberdine.

name: Escape Through Stealth
description: Escape the Furbolg cave and meet Terenthis in Auberdine.

name: Denalan's Earth
description: Bring the package of Rare Earth to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: Buzzbox 411
description: Collect 3 Thresher Eyes from Darkshore Threshers in the deep sea near Buzzbox 411.

name: Buzzbox 323
description: Collect 6 Moonstalker Fangs and place them in Buzzbox 323.

name: Buzzbox 525
description: Collect 4 Grizzled Scalps from Grizzled Thistle Bears to the south of Auberdine and place them in Buzzbox 525.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: The Ancient Statuette
description: Bring the Ancient Statuette to Talen, in his camp near the Zoram Strand.

name: The Zoram Strand
description: Bring 20 Wrathtail Heads to Shindrell Swiftfire in Astranaar.

name: Ruuzel
description: Bring the Ring of Zoram to Talen near the Zoram Strand.

name: Bathran's Hair
description: Bring 5 Bathran's Hair to Orendil Broadleaf in Ashenvale.

name: Forsaken Diseases
description: Bring a Bottle of Disease to Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song.

name: Insane Druids
description: Kill the druids: Taneel Darkwood, Uthil Mooncall, Mavoris Cloudsbreak; then return to Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song.

name: The Book of Ur
description: Bring the Book of Ur to Keeper Bel'dugur at the Apothecarium in the Undercity.

name: Arugal Must Die
description: Kill Arugal and bring his head to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: Elemental Bracers
description: Collect 5 Intact Elemental Bracers and use the Divining Scroll on them. Afterwards, bring the Divined Scroll to Sentinel Velene Starstrike at the Silverwind Refuge.

name: Mage Summoner
description: Slay Sarilus Foulborne and bring his head to Sentinel Velene Starstrike in Silverwind Refuge.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: Orendil's Cure
description: Bring Orendil's Cure to Pelturas Whitemoon in Astranaar.

name: Vile Satyr! Dryads in Danger!
description: Find Anilia in Xavian.

name: The Howling Vale
description: Go to the Howling Vale and study the Tome of Mel'Thandris, then return to Sentinel Melyria Frostshadow at Forest Song.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find the Glowing Gem and return to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar with Teronis' Journal.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find Shael'dryn at the moonwell to the northeast.

name: An Aggressive Defense
description: Kill 1 Den Watcher, 2 Ursas, 10 Totemics, and 12 Warriors of the Foulweald tribe, and then return to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find the Wooden Key and a piece of Dartol's Rod before returning to Shael'dryn at the moonwell.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find the final piece of Dartol's Rod and return to Shael'dryn at the moonwell.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find the hidden shrine and re-enchant Dartol's Rod.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Return to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Find an uncorrupted furbolg, and using the power of Dartol's Rod of Transformation, speak to him.

name: The Branch of Cenarius
description: Kill Geltharis and return the Branch of Cenarius to Illiyana at Forest Song.

name: Satyr Slaying!
description: Bring 16 Satyr Horns to Illiyana in Forest Song.

name: Elune's Tear
description: Bring Elune's Tear to Pelturas in Astranaar.

name: The Ruins of Stardust
description: Bring 5 Handfuls of Stardust to Pelturas in Astranaar.

name: Fallen Sky Lake
description: Retrieve a Fallen Moonstone from the Shadethicket Oracle, then bring it to Pelturas in Astranaar.

name: Avast Ye, Scallywag
description: Speak with Fleet Master Firallon aboard the Crimson Vale off the coast of Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Velinde Starsong
description: Speak with Thyn'tel Bladeweaver at the Warrior's Terrace in Darnassus.

name: Velinde's Effects
description: Search through Velinde's chest for her journal, then return it along with the key to Thyn'tel Bladeweaver in Darnassus.

name: The Barrens Port
description: Speak with Wharfmaster Dizzywig in Ratchet.

name: Passage to Booty Bay
description: Take a boat to Booty Bay and speak with Caravaneer Ruzzgot.

name: The Caravan Road
description: Speak with Clerk Daltry in Darkshire.

name: The Carevin Family
description: Speak with Jonathan Carevin in Darkshire.

name: The Scythe of Elune
description: Look for signs of the Scythe of Elune then return to Jonathan Carevin in Darkshire.

name: Answered Questions
description: Return to Thyn'tel Bladeweaver in Darnassus.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Kill Ran Bloodtooth and 4 Bloodtooth Guards and return to Krolg near Lake Mystral.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Bring Ran Bloodtooth's Skull and Dartol's Rod of Transformation to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

name: Into The Scarlet Monastery
description: Kill High Inquisitor Whitemane, Scarlet Commander Mograine, Herod, the Scarlet Champion and Houndmaster Loksey and then report back to Varimathras in the Undercity.

name: Compendium of the Fallen
description: Retrieve the Compendium of the Fallen from the Monastery in Tirisfal Glades and return to Sage Truthseeker in Thunder Bluff.

name: Mythology of the Titans
description: Retrieve Mythology of the Titans from the Monastery and bring it to Librarian Mae Paledust in Ironforge.

name: Vorrel's Revenge
description: Return Vorrel Sengutz's wedding ring to Monika Sengutz in Tarren Mill.

name: Down the Scarlet Path
description: Take Brother Anton's Letter of Commendation to Raleigh the Devout in Southshore.

name: In the Name of the Light
description: Kill High Inquisitor Whitemane, Scarlet Commander Mograine,  Herod, the Scarlet Champion and Houndmaster Loksey and then report back to Raleigh the Devout in Southshore.

name: Culling the Threat
description: Bring Dal Bloodclaw's Skull to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

name: Raene's Cleansing
description: Return to Shael'dryn at the moonwell.

name: Journey to Stonetalon Peak
description: Travel to Keeper Albagorm on Stonetalon Peak.

name: Reclaiming the Charred Vale
description: Keeper Albagorm on Stonetalon Peak wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

name: Jin'Zil's Forest Magic
description: Witch Doctor Jin'Zil at Malaka'jin wants 5 portions of Stonetalon Sap, 5 Twilight Whiskers, 30 Courser Eyes and a Fey Dragon Scale.

name: Reclaiming the Charred Vale
description: Travel to Falfindel Waywarder on the border of Thousand Needles and Feralas.

name: Letter to Jin'Zil
description: Deliver Darsok's letter to Jin'Zil within his cave in Malaka'Jin, in Stonetalon.

name: The Spirits of Stonetalon
description: Speak with Seereth Stonebreak in the Stonetalon Mountains.

name: Goblin Invaders
description: Kill 15 Venture Co. Loggers, then return to Seereth Stonebreak on the border of Stonetalon and the Barrens.

name: The Elder Crone
description: Speak with Magatha in Thunder Bluff.

name: Forsaken Aid
description: Speak with Apothecary Zamah in the Pools of Vision in Thunder Bluff.

name: Journey to Tarren Mill
description: Bring Zamah's Note to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

name: Blood of Innocents
description: Bring 5 Vials of Innocent Blood to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

name: Return to Thunder Bluff
description: Bring Lydon's Toxin to Apothecary Zamah in Thunder Bluff.

name: Shredding Machines
description: Kill the shredders XT:4 and XT:9, then return to Seereth Stonebreak at the border of the Stonetalon Mountains and the Barrens.

name: Deepmoss Spider Eggs
description: Bring 15 Deepmoss Eggs to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

name: On Guard in Stonetalon

name: An Old Colleague
description: Speak to Lomac Gearstrip in Ironforge.

name: Ineptitude + Chemicals = Fun
description: Bring 4 Minor Mana Potions and 2 Elixirs of Minor Fortitude to Lomac Gearstrip in Ironforge.

name: Ineptitude + Chemicals = Fun
description: Bring the Nitromirglyceronium back to Gaxim Rustfizzle in Stonetalon.

name: A Scroll from Mauren
description: Find Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

name: Devils in Westfall
description: Bring Dust Devil Debris to Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

description: Bring the Scroll of Messaging to Gaxim Rustfizzle in Stonetalon.

name: Retrieval for Mauren
description: Bring 8 Crystalized Scales to Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

description: Retrieve the Venture Co.'s Engineering Plans from the lumber mill in Windshear Crag.

description: Retrieve the Venture Co. Letters from Windshear Mine at the east end of Windshear Crag.

description: Find Tyrande Whisperwind in Darnassus.

name: Update for Sentinel Thenysil
description: Return to Sentinel Thenysil in Ashenvale.

name: Enraged Spirits
description: Bring 8 Smoldering Embers from any of the fire elementals in the Charred Vale to Kaela Shadowspear in Stonetalon.

name: On Guard in Stonetalon
description: Speak to Gaxim.

name: The Flying Machine Airport
description: Bring the Toxic Fogger to the Venture Co. sky port, then return to Apothecary Zamah.

description: Bring Ordanus' head to Braelyn Firehand near Sun Rock Retreat.

name: The Den

name: Kaela's Update

name: Gerenzo's Orders
description: Deliver the Unidentified Ore to Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

description: Deliver the Sealed Envelope to Sputtervalve in the Barrens.

name: Further Instructions
description: Bring the new orders to Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

name: Gerenzo Wrenchwhistle

description: Speak with Grimand Elmore.

description: Bring Razorflank's Medallion to Falfindel Waywarder in Thalanaar.

name: Indurium
description: Bring 10 Indurium Flakes to Martek the Exiled in the Badlands.

description: Bring Kravel's Parts Order to Wharfmaster Dizzywig in Ratchet.

description: Bring the Delicate Car Parts to Fizzle Brassbolts in Shimmering Flats.

description: Talk to Krazek in Booty Bay.

description: Bring the Fool's Stout to the Gnome Pit Boss.

description: Bring the Fool's Stout to the Goblin Pit Boss.

description: Bring the Fool's Stout report to Crank Fizzlebub in Booty Bay.

name: Fool's Stout
description: Bring 12 of Zanzil's Mixture to Crank Fizzlebub in Booty Bay.

description: Speak with Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: Steelsnap
description: Bring Steelsnap's Rib to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

description: Bring 12 Pridewing Venom Sacs to Shindrell Swiftfire in Astranaar.

description: Free the trapped Highborne souls in Night Run and Satyrnaar, then return to Delgren the Purifier at Maestra's Post.

description: Catch 6 Darkshore Grouper for Gubber Blump in Auberdine.

name: Willix the Importer
description: Escort Willix the Importer out of Razorfen Kraul.

description: Deliver Korran's Sealed Note to Belgrom Rockmaul in Orgrimmar.

name: Test of Lore
description: Find Braug Dimspirit near the entrance to Talondeep Path in Stonetalon Mountains.

name: Test of Lore
description: Find the Legacy of the Aspects and return it to Braug Dimspirit near the entrance to Talondeep Path in Stonetalon Mountains.

name: Test of Lore
description: Find Parqual Fintallas in Undercity.

name: Test of Lore
description: Find The Beginnings of the Undead Threat, and return it to Parqual Fintallas in Undercity.

description: Speak with Draz'Zilb in Brackenwall Village.

description: Draz'Zilb in Brackenwall Village wants you to destroy 5 Eggs of Onyxia.

description: Defeat Mok'Morokk and report the news to Draz'Zilb in Brackenwall Village.

description: Get 10 Hollow Vulture Bones for Pozzik in the Shimmering Flats.

description: Speak to Gazlowe in Ratchet.

description: Bring the crate of crash helmets to Wizzle Brassbolts in the Shimmering Flats.

description: Speak with Wharfmaster Lozgil in Booty Bay.

description: Speak with Baron Revilgaz in Booty Bay.

name: Goblin Sponsorship

name: Goblin Sponsorship
description: Deliver the Fuel Regulator Blueprints to Pozzik on the Shimmering Flats.

name: Parts of the Swarm

description: Return the Modified Seaforium Booster to Razzeric on the Shimmering Flats.

description: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Dawnwatcher Selgorm in Darnassus.

description: Grab a Crate with Holes.$BGrab a Snufflenose Command Stick.$BGrab and read the Snufflenose Owner's Manual.$B$BIn Razorfen Kraul, use the Crate with Holes to summon a Snufflenose Gopher, and use the Command Stick on the gopher to make it search for Tubers.$B$BBring 6 Blueleaf Tubers, the Snufflenose Command Stick and the Crate with Holes to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

description: Speak to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

description: Speak to Mikhail in the Wetlands.

description: Speak to Mikhail in the Wetlands.

description: Search Sentry Point for any sign of Private Hendel.

name: Unfinished Gordok Business
description: Find the Gauntlet of Gordok Might and return it to Captain Kromcrush in Dire Maul.$B$BAccording to Kromcrush, the "old timey story" says that Tortheldrin - a "creepy" elf who called himself a prince - stole it from one of the Gordok kings.

name: The Black Shield
description: Show the Blackened Iron Shield to Caz Twosprocket in Theramore.

description: Speak with Captain Garran Vimes in Theramore.

description: Bring Andron's Ledger to Mennet Carkad in the Rogues' Quarter of Undercity.

name: The Befouled Element
description: Bring the Befouled Water Globe to Mastok Wrilehiss at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: Report to Jennea
description: Speak with Jennea Cannon in Stormwind.

name: Investigate the Blue Recluse
description: Obtain a Cantation of Manifestation and a Chest of Containment coffers from behind Jennea Cannon.  Bring 3 Filled Containment Coffers to Jennea at the Wizard's Sanctum.

name: Gathering Materials
description: Bring 10 Linen Cloth and the 6 Charged Rift Gems to Wynne Larson in Stormwind.

name: Ur's Treatise on Shadow Magic
description: Bring Ur's Treatise on Shadow Magic to High Sorcerer Andromath in Stormwind.

name: High Sorcerer Andromath
description: Speak with High Sorcerer Andromath.

name: Pristine Spider Silk
description: Bring 8 Pristine Spider Silk to Wynne Larson in Stormwind.

name: Speak with Deino
description: Speak with Deino.

name: Waters of Xavian
description: Bring the Xavian Water Sample to Deino in Orgrimmar.

name: Laughing Sisters
description: Bring 12 Laughing Sister's Hairs to Kil'hala at the Crossroads.

name: Journey to the Marsh
description: Speak with Tabetha.

name: Items of Power
description: Bring 1 Jade and the Bolt Charged Bramble to Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: Hidden Secrets
description: Speak with Magus Tirth in the Shimmering Flats.

name: Get the Scoop
description: Find the phrase to Tirth's strongbox, then return to Tirth.

name: Rituals of Power
description: Bring the book Rituals of Power to Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: Mage's Wand
description: Speak with Tabetha after her ritual.

name: Return to the Marsh
description: Speak with Tabetha.

name: The Infernal Orb
description: Bring an Infernal Orb to Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: The Exorcism
description: Kill the Demon of the Orb, then speak with Tabetha.

name: Power in Uldaman
description: Retrieve an Obsidian Power Source and bring it to Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: Mana Surges
description: Kill 12 Mana Surges in the allowed time limit.

name: Report to Anastasia
description: Speak with Anastasia Hartwell.

name: Investigate the Alchemist Shop
description: Obtain a Cantation of Manifestation and a Chest of Containment Coffers from behind Anastasia Hartwell.  Bring 3 Filled Containment Coffers, the Chest of Containment Coffers and the Cantation of Manifestation to Anastasia in the Undercity.

name: Gathering Materials
description: Bring 10 Linen Cloth and 6 Dalaran Mana Gems to Josef Gregorian.

name: The Shattered Hand
description: Kill Tazan and bring his Satchel to Therzok in the Cleft of Shadow in Orgrimmar.

name: The Deathstalkers
description: Deliver Andron's Ledger to Varimathras in the Hall of the Dark Lady in the Undercity.

name: Fenwick Thatros
description: Kill Fenwick Thatros and bring his head back to Mennet Carkad in the Rogues' Quarter of the Undercity.

name: Tools of the Trade
description: Find the Dalaran Status Report and return it to Mennet Carkad in the Rogues' Quarter of the Undercity.

name: Bingles' Missing Supplies
description: Find and return Bingles' supplies:$B$BBingles' Wrench, Bingles' Screwdriver, Bingles' Hammer, and Bingles' Blastencapper.

name: Find Bingles
description: Find Bingles Blastenheimer in Loch Modan.

name: Underground Assault
description: Retrieve the Gnoam Sprecklesprocket from the Deadmines and return it to Shoni the Shilent in Stormwind.

name: Speak with Shoni
description: Speak with Shoni the Shilent in Stormwind.

name: Gyromast's Revenge
description: Find Gelkak's First Mate, the Threshwackonator 4100, and lead it back to Gelkak.

name: Gyromast's Retrieval
description: Find and return the three pieces of Gelkak's Key to Gelkak Gyromast.

name: Plagued Lands
description: Capture a living Rabid Thistle Bear and bring it back to Tharnariun.$B$BShould you fail to capture a Rabid Thistle Bear and lose your trap, return to Tharnariun Treetender and request another trap.

name: Cleansing of the Infected
description: Cleanse the forest of 20 Rabid Thistle Bears and return to Tharnariun Treetender in Darkshore.

name: Tharnariun's Hope
description: Find and kill the Den Mother.

name: Rest and Relaxation
description: Speak with Innkeeper Farley at the Lion's Pride Inn.

name: Dolanaar Delivery
description: Bring the Dolanaar Delivery to Innkeeper Keldamyr.

name: Supplies to Tannok
description: Deliver the Crate of Inn Supplies to Tannok Frosthammer in Kharanos.

name: A Peon's Burden
description: Bring Ukor's Burden to Innkeeper Grosk in Razor Hill.

name: Easy Strider Living
description: Bring back 5 Strider Meat to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine.

name: The Shattered Necklace
description: Search for the original creator of the shattered necklace to learn of its potential value.

name: Lore for a Price
description: Bring five silver bars to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.

name: Back to Uldaman
description: Search for clues as to the current disposition of Talvash's necklace within Uldaman.  The slain paladin he mentioned was the person who had it last.

name: Find the Gems
description: Find the ruby, sapphire, and topaz that are scattered throughout Uldaman.  Once acquired, contact Talvash del Kissel remotely by using the Phial of Scrying he previously gave you.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

name: Uldaman Reagent Run
description: Bring 12 Magenta Fungus Caps to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.

name: Badlands Reagent Run II
description: Use the empty thaumaturgy vessels on scorched guardian dragons found in the Badlands.  Once you have them filled, bring them to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.

name: Restoring the Necklace
description: Obtain a power source from the most powerful construct you can find in Uldaman, and deliver it to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.

name: Seek out SI: 7
description: Deliver Keryn Sylvius's package to Master Mathias Shaw at the Stormwind Barracks.

name: Snatch and Grab
description: Find the Defias Dockmaster and recover the Shipping Schedule for Master Mathias Shaw.

name: Road to Salvation
description: Speak with Hulfdan Blackbeard in Ironforge.

name: Simple Subterfugin'
description: Find Onin MacHammar by Gnomeregan.

name: Onin's Report
description: Take Onin's Report back to Hulfdan in Ironforge.

name: The Hidden Chamber
description: Read Baelog's Journal, explore the hidden chamber, then report to Prospector Stormpike.

name: The Apple Falls
description: Take Jannok's Rose to Syurna in Darnassus.

name: Destiny Calls
description: Find Sethir the Ancient and bring back any clues that you may discover to Syurna.

name: Badlands Reagent Run
description: Bring 5 Buzzard Gizzards, 10 Crag Coyote Fangs, and  5 Rock Elemental Shards to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath, Badlands.

name: Erion Shadewhisper
description: Contact Erion Shadewhisper in Darnassus.

name: Erion's Behest
description: Travel to Stormwind City and seek council with Renzik "The Shiv."

name: The Platinum Discs
description: Speak with stone watcher and learn what ancient lore it keeps.  Once you have learned what lore it has to offer, activate the Discs of Norgannon.

name: The Platinum Discs
description: Take the miniature version of the Discs of Norgannon to the Explorers' League in Ironforge.

name: The Platinum Discs
description: Take the miniature version of the Discs of Norgannon to the one of the sages in Thunder Bluff.

name: Redridge Rendezvous
description: Venture forth to Lakeshire in the Redridge Mountains and speak with Lucius.

name: Alther's Mill
description: Open Lucius's Lockbox, recover the Token of Thievery and return it to Lucius in Lakeshire.

name: Necklace Recovery
description: Look for a valuable necklace within the Uldaman dig site and bring it back to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.  The necklace may be damaged.

name: Necklace Recovery, Take 2
description: Find a clue as to the gems' whereabouts in the depths of Uldaman.

name: Kingly Shakedown
description: Travel to Stormwind and seek out Renzik "The Shiv."

name: To Hulfdan!
description: Travel to Ironforge and speak with Hulfdan Blackbeard.

name: SI:7
description: Travel to Stormwind and seek out Renzik "The Shiv."

name: Translating the Journal
description: Find someone who can translate the paladin's journal.  The closest location that might have someone is Kargath, in the Badlands.

name: Translating the Journal
description: Let Jarkal borrow the necklace.  In exchange, he will translate the journal for you.

name: Find the Gems and Power Source
description: Recover all three gems and a power source for the necklace from Uldaman, and then bring them to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.  Jarkal believes a power source might be found on the strongest construct present in Uldaman.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

name: Deliver the Gems
description: Deliver the Necklace and Gem Salvage to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.

name: Necklace Recovery, Take 3
description: Visit Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath to see if he was successful.

name: Reclaimed Treasures
description: Get Patrick Garrett's family treasure from their family chest in the South Common Hall of Uldaman, and bring it to him in the Undercity.

name: Horns of Nez'ra
description: Return the Horns of Nez'ra to Arantir's Shadow in Lakeshire.

name: Klaven's Tower
description: Steal the Defias Tower Key, break into the Defias Tower and uncover the contents of the Duskwood Chest. Take whatever information you find back to Mathias Shaw in Stormwind. Read Kearnen's Journal to gain insight about the tower.

name: Mathias and the Defias
description: Travel to Westfall and find Agent Kearnen for your debriefing.

name: Find the Shattered Hand
description: Journey to Orgrimmar and speak with Shenthul at the Cleft of Shadow.$B$B$B$B

name: Zando'zan
description: Speak with Zando'zan at the Cleft of Shadow.

name: To Orgrimmar!
description: Speak with Shenthul at the Cleft of Shadow in Orgrimmar.

name: Plundering the Plunderers
description: Bring the Southsea Treasure back to Wrenix the Wretched in Ratchet. Do not forget to get an E.C.A.C. and Thieves' Tools from Wrenix's Gizmotronic Apparatus. You will need both of these items to complete your mission.$B$BShould you be attacked by any unusually hostile parrots, use your E.C.A.C.!

name: Wrenix of Ratchet
description: Travel to Ratchet and speak with Wrenix the Wretched.

name: Simple Parchment
description: Read the Simple Parchment and speak to Frang in the Valley of Trials.

name: The Lost Dwarves
description: Find Baelog in Uldaman.

name: Power Stones
description: Bring 8 Dentrium Power Stones and 8 An'Alleum Power Stones to Rigglefuzz in the Badlands.

name: The Emerald Dreamcatcher
description: Bring the Emerald Dreamcatcher to Tallonkai Swiftroot in Dolanaar.

name: The Platinum Discs
description: Take your reward voucher to Dinita Stonemantle in the Vault of Ironforge.

name: The Platinum Discs
description: Take the reward voucher to Bena Winterhoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: Deep Cover
description: Travel to the Venture Co. Tower, north of the Sludge Fen and contact the Shattered Hand's covert operative, Taskmaster Fizzule.$B$BWhen the tower is in sight, use the Flare Gun to signal your arrival to Taskmaster Fizzule. Fire off TWO flares, then approach Taskmaster Fizzule and perform the Shattered /Salute.$B$BThese actions must be performed in the correct order, as Fizzule will attack and terminate any person he does not recognize.

name: Ferocitas the Dream Eater
description: Tallonkai Swiftroot in Dolanaar wants you to kill 7 Gnarlpine Mystics and find the Missing Jewel.

name: The Shattered Salute
description: Perform the Shattered Salute on Shenthul.

name: Hinott's Assistance
description: Travel to Tarren Mill in Hillsbrad Foothills and deliver the Sample of Zanzil's Mixture to Serge Hinott.$B$BTo get to Tarren Mill, take the Zeppelin to the Undercity and follow the road south through Silverpine and towards Hillsbrad. Follow the signs!

name: Hinott's Assistance
description: Wait for Serge Hinott to complete the cure.

name: Return to Denalan
description: Rellian Greenspyre wants you to speak with Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

name: Oakenscowl
description: Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth wants you to collect the Gargantuan Tumor from Oakenscowl.

name: Badlands Reagent Run
description: Acquire the reagents Ghak Healtouch needs from the Badlands, then return to him in Thelsamar.

name: Badlands Reagent Run II
description: Use the empty thaumaturgy vessels on scorched guardian dragons found in the Badlands.  Once you have them filled, bring them to Ghak Healtouch in Thelsamar.

name: Tears of the Moon
description: Priestess A'moora in the Temple of the Moon at Darnassus wants you to bring her Lady Sathrah's Silvery Spinnerets.

name: The Temple of the Moon
description: Sister Aquinne wants you to speak with Priestess A'moora in the Temple of the Moon.

name: Sathrah's Sacrifice
description: Priestess A'moora wants you to place Lady Sathrah's silvery spinnerets at the fountain inside the temple, and then return to her.

name: To Serve Kum'isha
description: In your journeys throughout the Blasted Lands, should you ever come across a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere, take the item back to Kum'isha the Collector.$B$BBe warned, this gem is one of the most rare crystals in all of Azeroth. Any creature in these lands could be holding a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere.$B$BYou will be rewarded for each Flawless Draenethyst Sphere you have collected.

name: Kum'isha's Endeavors
description: Find and return a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere to Kum'isha the Collector.

name: The Sleeping Druid
description: Bring a Shaman Voodoo Charm to Oben Rageclaw in the Ban'ethil Barrow Den.

name: Druid of the Claw
description: Oben Rageclaw wants you to kill his soulless body, and then use the Voodoo Charm.

name: Snickerfang Jowls
description: Bring three Snickerfang Jowls, two Blasted Boar Lungs, and one Scorpok Pincer to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: Rage of Ages
description: Bring three Snickerfang Jowls, two Blasted Boar Lungs, and one Scorpok Pincer to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: A Boar's Vitality
description: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: Spirit of the Boar
description: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: The Decisive Striker
description: Bring three Scorpok Pincers, two Vulture Gizzards, and one Blasted Boar Lung to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: Salt of the Scorpok
description: Bring three Scorpok Pincers, two Vulture Gizzards, and one Blasted Boar Lung to Bloodmage Drazial.

name: The Basilisk's Bite
description: Bring ten Basilisk Brains and two Vulture Gizzards to Bloodmage Lynnore.

name: Infallible Mind
description: Bring ten Basilisk Brains and two Vulture Gizzards to Bloodmage Lynnore.

name: Vulture's Vigor
description: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

name: Spiritual Domination
description: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

name: The Thirsty Goblin
description: Collect a Laden Dew Gland and bring it to Marin Noggenfogger in Gadgetzan.

name: In Good Taste
description: Marin Noggenfogger wants you to speak with Sprinkle in Gadgetzan.

name: The Touch of Zanzil
description: Speak with Doc Mixilpixil in the cellar of the Barracks.

name: The Touch of Zanzil
description: /Lay down to be examined by Doc Mixilpixil. How can he find the cure if he can't find the cause?

name: The Touch of Zanzil
description: Bring Doc Mixilpixil one bundle of Simple Wildflowers, one Leaded Vial, one Bronze Tube, and one Spool of Light Chartreuse Silk Thread. The 'itis' doesn't cure itself, young $g fella:lady;.

conditions.name: Spool of Light Chartreuse Silk Thread

name: The Disgraced One
description: Speak to Dispatch Commander Ruag in Stonard.

name: The Missing Orders
description: Speak to Bengor.

name: The Swamp Talker
description: Retrieve the Warchief's Orders and return them to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

name: Sprinkle's Secret Ingredient
description: Sprinkle in Gadgetzan wants you to collect a Violet Tragan and return it to her.

name: Delivery for Marin
description: Sprinkle wants to you take the Violet Powder to Marin Noggenfogger in Gadgetzan.

name: Noggenfogger Elixir
description: Marin Noggenfogger wants you to speak to him again after he creates his elixir.

name: The Stones That Bind Us
description: Free nine Servants of Razelikh, three Servants of Sevine, three Servants of Allistarj, and three Servants of Grol. Return to the Fallen Hero when your task is complete. You must remain within close proximity of the stones or the process will fail.

name: Heroes of Old
description: Open the chest and claim your reward.

name: Heroes of Old
description: Speak to Corporal Thund Splithoof.

name: Kirith
description: Find out what became of Lieutenant Kirith.

name: Rin'ji is Trapped!
description: Escort Rin'ji out of the Quel'Danil Lodge, then find his hidden secret at the Overlook Cliffs to the east.

name: The Cover of Darkness
description: Return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde with your findings.

name: The Demon Hunter
description: Speak with Loramus Thalipedes in Azshara.

name: Infiltrating the Castle
description: Speak to Tyrion in Stormwind Castle.

name: Items of Some Consequence
description: Bring 3 Silk Cloth and 2 of Clara's Fresh Apples to Tyrion in Stormwind.

name: Barbaric Battlements
description: Bring two Patterned Bronze Bracers, two Bronze Greatswords, and two Sharp Claws to Orokk Omosh in Orgrimmar.

name: On Iron Pauldrons
description: Bring four Bronze Battleaxes and four Bronze Warhammers to Orokk Omosh in Orgrimmar.

name: Trampled Under Foot
description: Bring four Green Iron Helms, four Green Iron Bracers, and two Green Iron Leggings to Orokk Omosh in Orgrimmar.

name: Horns of Frenzy
description: Bring two Solid Iron Mauls, two Silvered Bronze Boots, and two Silvered Bronze Gauntlets to Orokk Omosh in Orgrimmar.

name: Joys of Omosh
description: Watch and learn the Omosh Dance of Joy.

name: The Old Ways
description: Bring four Steel Breastplates and four Steel Plate Helms to Aturk the Anvil in Orgrimmar.

name: Booty Bay or Bust!
description: Speak with McGavan in Booty Bay.

name: The Origins of Smithing
description: Bring six Golden Scale Bracers to Hank the Hammer in Stormwind.

name: In Search of Galvan
description: Speak with McGavan in Booty Bay.

name: The Mithril Order
description: Speak with Galvan the Ancient in Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Smelt On, Smelt Off
description: Bring forty Mithril Bars and forty Iron Bars to Galvan the Ancient in Stranglethorn.

name: The Great Silver Deceiver
description: Bring forty Mithril Bars and five Truesilver Bars to Galvan the Ancient in Stranglethorn.

name: The Art of the Imbue
description: Bring forty Mithril Bars and four Citrines to Galvan the Ancient in Stranglethorn.

name: Galvan's Finest Pupil
description: Speak with Trenton Lighthammer in Gadgetzan.

name: Expert Blacksmith!
description: Claim your reward from Galvan the Ancient!

name: Find OOX-22/FE!
description: Take the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot in a cave near Feral Scar Vale.

name: Rescue OOX-22/FE!
description: Escort OOX-22/FE to the dock along the Forgotten Coast, then report to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

name: Divino-matic Rod
description: Bring the Divino-matic Rod to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan.

name: The Brassbolts Brothers
description: Speak with Wizzle Brassbolts in the Shimmering Flats.

name: Gahz'rilla
description: Bring Gahz'rilla's Electrified Scale to Wizzle Brassbolts in the Shimmering Flats.

name: A Good Head On Your Shoulders
description: Bring two Mithril Coifs and one Ornate Mithril Shoulder to Trenton Lighthammer.

name: The World At Your Feet
description: Bring two Heavy Mithril Boots and one Ornate Mithril Pants to Trenton Lighthammer.

name: The Mithril Kid
description: Bring two Heavy Mithril Breastplates and one Ornate Mithril Gloves to Trenton Lighthammer.

name: WANTED: Caliph Scorpidsting
description: Bring the head of Caliph Scorpidsting to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan.

name: Rin'ji's Secret
description: Oran Snakewrithe, a well known scholar on matters concerning the Witherbark trolls, may be able to decipher the tablet. She is known to reside within the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

name: Petty Squabbles
description: Speak with the Fallen Hero of the Horde at the border of the Blasted Lands and the swamp.

name: Fall From Grace
description: Listen to the Fallen Hero of the Horde tell his story.

name: A Tale of Sorrow
description: Listen to the Fallen Hero of the Horde tell his story.

name: The Mark of Quality
description: Bring 10 Thick Yeti Hides to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: The Mark of Quality
description: Bring 10 Thick Yeti Hides to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Rig Wars
description: Retrieve the Rig Blueprints and Thermaplugg's Safe Combination from Gnomeregan and bring them to Nogg in Orgrimmar.

name: Chief Engineer Scooty
description: Speak with Scooty in Booty Bay.

name: Gnomer-gooooone!
description: Wait for Scooty to calibrate the Goblin Transponder.

name: The Giant Guardian
description: Locate the lost night elf girl.

name: Wandering Shay
description: Pick up Shay's Bell from the chest.$B$BEscort Shay Leafrunner to Rockbiter's camp.

name: Tiara of the Deep
description: Bring the Tiara of the Deep to Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: Wild Leather Armor
description: Bring 10 Thick Leather to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Wild Leather Shoulders
description: Bring 6 Thick Armor Kits and a Wildvine to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Wild Leather Vest
description: Bring 2 Turtle Scale Breastplates, 2 Turtle Scale Gloves, and a Wildvine to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Wild Leather Helmet
description: Bring 2 Nightscape Tunics, 2 Nightscape Headbands, and a Wildvine to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Wild Leather Boots
description: Bring 2 Nightscape Pants, 2 Nightscape Boots, and 2 Wildvines to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Wild Leather Leggings
description: Bring 2 Turtle Scale Helms, 2 Turtle Scale Bracers, and 2 Wildvines to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Master of the Wild Leather
description: Give Pratt's Letter to Telonis, the master leatherworker of Darnassus.

name: Wild Leather Armor
description: Bring 10 Thick Leather to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Wild Leather Shoulders
description: Bring 6 Thick Armor Kits and a Wildvine to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Wild Leather Vest
description: Bring 2 Turtle Scale Breastplates, 2 Turtle Scale Gloves, and a Wildvine to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Wild Leather Helmet
description: Bring 2 Nightscape Tunics, 2 Nightscape Headbands, and a Wildvine to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Wild Leather Boots
description: Bring 2 Nightscape Pants, 2 Nightscape Boots, and 2 Wildvines to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Wild Leather Leggings
description: Bring 2 Turtle Scale Helms, 2 Turtle Scale Bracers, and 2 Wildvines to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Master of the Wild Leather
description: Give Jangdor's Letter to Una, the master leatherworker of Thunder Bluff.

name: Tabetha's Task
description: Speak with Tabetha in Dustwallow Marsh.

name: War on the Woodpaw
description: Bring 10 Woodpaw Gnoll Manes to Hadoken Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: Alpha Strike
description: Kill 5 Woodpaw Alphas and return to Hadoken Swiftstrider within one hour.

name: Tran'rek
description: Speak with Tran'rek in Gadgetzan.

name: Scarab Shells
description: Bring 5 Uncracked Scarab Shells to Tran'rek in Gadgetzan.

name: The Ruins of Solarsal
description: Explore the Ruins of Solarsal and investigate the presence of the naga there.

name: Return to Feathermoon Stronghold
description: Return to Shandris Feathermoon in the Feathermoon Stronghold and report your findings.

name: Against the Hatecrest
description: Bring 10 Hatecrest Naga Scales to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Against Lord Shalzaru
description: Eliminate Lord Shalzaru, and then bring the Mysterious Relic he uncovered to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Delivering the Relic
description: Deliver the Mysterious Relic to Vestia Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Stoley's Debt
description: Speak with Stoley in Steamwheedle Port.

name: Stoley's Shipment
description: Bring Stoley's Shipment to Stoley in Steamwheedle Port.

name: Deliver to MacKinley
description: Bring Stoley's Bottle to "Sea Wolf" MacKinley in Booty Bay.

name: WANTED: Andre Firebeard
description: Bring Andre's Head to Security Chief Bilgewhizzle in Steamwheedle Port.

name: Ship Schedules
description: Report the Ship Schedules to an authority in Steamwheedle Port.

name: Skulk Rock Clean-up
description: Kill 10 Green Sludges and 10 Jade Oozes, and then report back to Fraggar Thundermantle in Aerie Peak.

name: The Stave of Equinex
description: Energize Troyas' Stave and find the Equinex Monolith.

name: Troll Necklace Bounty
description: Bring 5 Troll Tribal Necklaces to Fraggar Thundermantle in Aerie Peak.

name: Cuergo's Gold
description: Find Cuergo's gold!

name: Woodpaw Investigation
description: Find the gnoll battle plans somewhere in the gnoll camps to the south of Camp Mojache.

name: The Battle Plans
description: Bring the Woodpaw Battle Plans to Hadoken Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

name: A Fine Mess
description: Escort Kernobee to the Clockwerk Run exit and then report to Scooty in Booty Bay.

name: Save Techbot's Brain!
description: Bring Techbot's Memory Core to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
description: Speak with Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Essential Artificials
description: Bring 12 Essential Artificials to Klockmort Spannerspan in Ironforge.

name: Klockmort's Essentials
description: Speak with Klockmort Spannerspan in Ironforge.

name: Gnogaine
description: Use the Empty Leaden Collection Phial on Irradiated Invaders or Irradiated Pillagers to collect radioactive fallout. Once it is full, take it back to Ozzie Togglevolt in Kharanos.

name: The Day After
description: Speak with Ozzie Togglevolt in Kharanos.

name: Gyrodrillmatic Excavationators
description: Bring twenty-four Robo-mechanical Guts to Shoni in Stormwind.

name: The Grand Betrayal
description: Venture to Gnomeregan and kill Mekgineer Thermaplugg. Return to High Tinker Mekkatorque when the task is complete.

name: Data Rescue
description: Bring a Prismatic Punch Card to Master Mechanic Castpipe in Ironforge.

name: Castpipe's Task
description: Speak with Master Mechanic Castpipe in Ironforge.

name: Grim Message
description: Gather Witherbark Skulls and place on Nimboya's Pike.  Place Nimboya's Laden Pike at one of the Witherbark Villages in the Hinterlands, then return to Nimboya in Stranglethorn.

name: Venom Bottles
description: Bring a Venom Bottle to an apothecary in Tarren Mill.

name: Undamaged Venom Sac
description: Bring an Undamaged Venom Sac to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

name: Consult Master Gadrin
description: Speak with Master Gadrin in Sen'jin Village.

name: The Spider God
description: Read from the Tablet of Theka to learn the name of the Witherbark spider god, then return to Master Gadrin.

name: Summoning Shadra
description: Defeat Shadra at the altar of Shadra'Alor, then bring her venom to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

name: Venom to the Undercity
description: Bring Faranell's Parcel to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

name: In Search of Knowledge
description: Talk to Daryn Lightwind in Rut'theran Village.

name: Feralas: A History
description: Ask Daryn Lightwind if you may borrow her book.

name: The Borrower
description: Take the letter to Curgle Cranklehop in Tanaris.

name: The Morrow Stone
description: Return the Sparkling Stone and the Stave of Equinex to Troyas Moonbreeze in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Return to Troyas
description: Deliver the book to Troyas Moonbreeze in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: The Super Snapper FX
description: Use the Super Snapper FX to take a snapshot of Gammerita, then return to Daryn Lightwind in Rut'theran Village.

name: Grime-Encrusted Ring
description: Figure out a way to remove the grime from the Grime-Encrusted Ring.

name: Seeing What Happens
description: Bring the miniature platinum discs to the gates of Uldum in Tanaris and look for clues as to the connection between the two.

name: Return of the Ring
description: You may either keep the ring, or you may find the person responsible for the imprint and engravings on the inside of the band.

name: Gnome Improvement
description: Bring the Brilliant Gold Ring, a Silver Bar, a Moss Agate, and 30 silver coins to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.

name: Return of the Ring
description: You may either keep the ring, or you may find the person responsible for the imprint and engravings on the inside of the band.

name: Nogg's Ring Redo
description: Bring the Brilliant Gold Ring, a Silver Bar, a Moss Agate, and 30 silver coins to Nogg in Orgrimmar.

name: The Sparklematic 5200!
description: Insert a Grime-Encrusted Item into the Sparklematic 5200, and be sure to have three silver coins to start the machine.

name: The Stone Watcher
description: Learn the purpose of the Stone Watcher of Norgannon, and then interact with the Uldum Pedestal in the Tanaris desert.

name: The Only Cure is More Green Glow
description: Travel to Gnomeregan and bring back High Potency Radioactive Fallout. Be warned, the fallout is unstable and will collapse rather quickly.$B$BOzzie will also require your Heavy Leaden Collection Phial when the task is complete.

name: Portents of Uldum
description: Speak with Historian Karnik in the Hall of Explorers within Ironforge.

name: A Future Task
description: Speak with High Explorer Magellas in Ironforge.

name: Portents of Uldum
description: Speak with Nara Wildmane on the Elder Rise in Thunder Bluff.

name: Seeing What Happens
description: Bring the miniature platinum discs to the gates of Uldum in Tanaris and look for clues as to the connection between the two.

name: Return to Thunder Bluff
description: Speak with Nara Wildmane in Thunder Bluff.

name: A Future Task
description: Speak with Sage Truthseeker in Thunder Bluff.

name: Freedom for All Creatures
description: Using the Bamboo Cage Key, free the Sprite Darters from the pen in the Grimtotem camp. At least 6 Sprite Darters and Kindal Moonweaver must survive.$B$BYou have 6 minutes before Kindal decides it is time to retreat and you fail the quest.

name: Doling Justice
description: Kill 12 Grimtotem Naturalists, 10 Grimtotem Raiders, and 6 Grimtotem Shamans before returning to Jer'kai Moonweaver in Feralas.

name: Doling Justice
description: Take Jer'kai's Signet Ring to High Priestess Tyrande Whisperwind in Darnassus.

name: A New Cloak's Sheen
description: Bring 10 Iridescent Sprite Darter Wings to Krueg Skullsplitter in Camp Mojache.

name: A Grim Discovery
description: Bring 20 Grimtotem Horns to Krueg Skullsplitter in Camp Mojache.

name: The Ogres of Feralas
description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to kill 10 Gordunni Ogres, 10 Gordunni Ogre-Magi, and 5 Gordunni Brutes.

name: A Grim Discovery
description: Bring the Crate of Grimtotem Horns to Belgrom Rockmaul in Orgrimmar.

name: Return to Ironforge
description: Speak with Historian Karnik in Ironforge.

name: The Gordunni Scroll
description: Bring the Gordunni Scroll to Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache.

name: Dark Ceremony
description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to find a Gordunni Orb.

name: The Ogres of Feralas
description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to kill 10 Gordunni Shaman, 10 Gordunni Warlocks, and 5 Gordunni Maulers.

name: A Threat in Feralas
description: Belgrom Rockmaul wants you to speak with Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache.

name: The High Wilderness
description: Angelas Moonbreeze wants you to kill 8 Gordunni Warlocks, 8 Gordunni Shaman, and 8 Gordunni Brutes.

name: Call of Fire
description: Find Kranal Fiss in the Barrens.

name: Call of Fire
description: Find Kranal Fiss in the Barrens.

name: Call of Water
description: Find Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

name: Call of Water
description: Find Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

name: Gordunni Cobalt
description: Orwin Gizzmick in Camp Mojache wants 12 samples of Gordunni Cobalt.

name: Witherbark Cages
description: Check the cages at the two Witherbark villages, then return to Gryphon  Master Talonaxe.

name: The Altar of Zul
description: Check the top of the Altar of Zul, then return to Gryphon Master Talonaxe.

name: Thadius Grimshade
description: Bring Sharpbeak's Feather to Thadius Grimshade in the Blasted Lands.

name: Nekrum's Medallion
description: Bring Nekrum's Medallion to Thadius Grimshade in the Blasted Lands.

name: The Divination
description: Wait until Grimshade performs the ritual of divination.

name: Return to the Hinterlands
description: Speak with Gryphon Master Talonaxe.

name: Saving Sharpbeak
description: Fight to the top of Jintha'Alor, kill Vile Priestess Hexx for the key to Sharpbeak's cage, and save Sharpbeak.

name: Lines of Communication
description: Oran Snakewrithe in Undercity wants you to travel to the Hinterlands and burn the Highvale Records, Highvale Report, and Highvale Notes.

name: Seeking Strahad
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

name: Tome of Divinity
description: Speak to Tiza Battleforge in Ironforge.

name: Tome of Divinity
description: Speak to Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

name: Tome of Divinity
description: Speak to Tiza Battleforge in Ironforge

name: Tome of Divinity
description: Speak to Tiza Battleforge in Ironforge.

name: Seeking Strahad
description: Find Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

name: The Gordunni Orb
description: Bring the Gordunni Orb to Uthel'nay in the Darkbriar Lodge in Orgrimmar.

name: Handle With Care
description: Bring the Carefully-packed Crate to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.

name: Troll Temper
description: Bring 20 Vials of Troll Temper to Trenton Lighthammer in Gadgetzan.

name: Dark Heart
description: Talo Thornhoof in Camp Mojache wants Edana Hatetalon's Dark Heart.

name: Vengeance on the Northspring
description: Talo Thornhoof wants you to kill 4 Northspring Harpies, 4 Northspring Roguefeathers, 4 Northspring Windcallers, and 4 Northspring Slayers.

name: Simple Tablet
description: Read the Simple Tablet and speak to Frang in the Valley of Trials.

name: Etched Tablet
description: Speak to Jen'shan in the Valley of Trials.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Hallowed Tablet
description: Read the Hallowed Tablet and speak to Ken'jai outside the Den in the Valley of Trials.

name: Glyphic Tablet
description: Read the Glyphic Tablet and speak with Mai'ah near the entrance to the Den in the Valley of Trials.

name: Etched Parchment
description: Read the Etched Parchment and speak to Jen'shan in the Valley of Trials.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Tainted Parchment
description: Read the Tainted Parchment and speak to Nartok inside the Den in the Valley of Trials.

name: Simple Note
description: Read the Simple Note and speak to Harutt Thunderhorn in Camp Narache.

name: Etched Note
description: Read the Etched Note and speak to Lanka Farshot in Red Cloud Mesa.

name: Rune-Inscribed Note
description: Read the Rune-Inscribed Note and speak to Meela Dawnstrider in Camp Narache.

name: Verdant Note
description: Read the Verdant Note and speak to Gart Mistrunner in Camp Narache.

name: Simple Scroll
description: Read the Simple Scroll and speak to Dannal Stern in Deathknell.

name: Encrypted Scroll
description: Read the Encrypted Scroll and speak to David Trias in Deathknell.

name: Hallowed Scroll
description: Read the Hallowed Scroll and speak to Dark Cleric Duesten in the church in Deathknell.

name: Glyphic Scroll
description: Read the Glyphic Scroll and speak to Isabella in the church in Deathknell.

name: Tainted Scroll
description: Read the Tainted Scroll and speak to Maximillion in Deathknell.

name: Simple Letter
description: Read the Simple Letter and speak to Llane Beshere in Northshire Abbey.

name: Consecrated Letter
description: Read the Consecrated Letter and speak to Brother Sammuel in Northshire Abbey.

name: Encrypted Letter
description: Read the Encrypted Letter and speak to Jorik Kerridan in the stable behind Northshire Abbey.

name: Hallowed Letter
description: Read the Hallowed Letter and speak to Priestess Anetta in Northshire Abbey.

name: Glyphic Letter
description: Read the Glyphic Letter and speak to Khelden Bremen inside Northshire Abbey.

name: Tainted Letter
description: Read the Tainted Letter and speak to Drusilla La Salle next to Northshire Abbey.

name: Simple Rune
description: Read the Simple Rune and speak to Thran Khorman in Coldridge Valley.

name: Consecrated Rune
description: Read the Consecrated Rune and speak to Bromos Grummner in Coldridge Valley.

name: Etched Rune
description: Read the Etched Rune and speak to Thorgas Grimson in Coldridge Valley.

name: Encrypted Rune
description: Read the Encrypted Rune and speak to Solm Hargrin in Coldridge Valley.

name: Hallowed Rune
description: Read the Hallowed Rune and speak to Branstock Khalder in Anvilmar.

name: Simple Memorandum
description: Read the Simple Memorandum and speak to Thran Khorman in Coldridge Valley.

name: Encrypted Memorandum
description: Read the Encrypted Memorandum and speak to Solm Hargrin in Coldridge Valley.

name: Glyphic Memorandum
description: Read the Glyphic Memorandum and speak to Marryk Nurribit inside Anvilmar above Coldridge Valley.

name: Tainted Memorandum
description: Read the Tainted Memorandum and speak to Alamar Grimm inside Anvilmar above Coldridge Valley.

name: Simple Sigil
description: Read the Simple Sigil and speak to Alyissia in Shadowglen.

name: Etched Sigil
description: Read the Etched Sigil and speak to Ayanna Everstride at the top of Aldrassil in Shadowglen.

name: Encrypted Sigil
description: Read the Encrypted Sigil and speak to Frahun Shadewhisper in Shadowglen.

name: Hallowed Sigil
description: Read the Hallowed Sigil and speak to Shanda in Aldrassil.

name: Verdant Sigil
description: Read the Verdant Sigil and speak to Mardant Strongoak, in the tree Aldrassil in Shadowglen.

name: A Strange Request
description: Take the Shrunken Head to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

name: Return to Witch Doctor Uzer'i
description: Deliver Neeru's Herb Pouch to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.

name: Testing the Vessel
description: Travel to the Hinterlands, and locate the Wildkin. Kill 10, and use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Wildkin.$B$BBring 10 Wildkin Muiseks and the Muisek Vessel to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.

name: Hippogryph Muisek
description: Kill 10 Frayfeather Hippogryphs of any type, then use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture them.

name: Faerie Dragon Muisek
description: Kill 8 Sprite Darters or Sprite Dragons. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Faerie Dragons.

name: Treant Muisek
description: Kill 3 Wandering Forest Walkers. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Treants.

name: Mountain Giant Muisek
description: Kill 7 Land Walkers or Cliff Giants. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Mountain Giants.
