name: Natural Materials
description: Bring 2 Splintered Logs, 6 Encrusted Minerals, 20 pieces of Resilient Sinew, and 40 Metallic Fragments to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Camp Mojache.

name: Weapons of Spirit
description: Witch Doctor Uzer'i wants you to wait for a moment while he prepares the weapons.

name: Against the Hatecrest
description: Report to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Loramus
description: Listen to Loramus Thalipedes tell his story.

name: Gahz'ridian
description: Marvon Rivetseeker in Tanaris wants you to collect 30 Gahz'ridian Ornaments.

name: The Horn of the Beast
description: Take Margol's Gigantic Horn to Mountaineer Pebblebitty.

name: Proof of Deed
description: Take Margol's Gigantic Horn to Curator Thorius in Ironforge.

name: At Last!
description: Take the Proof of Deed back to Mountaineer Pebblebitty.

name: Speak with Renferrel
description: Speak with Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

name: Jorn Skyseer
description: Speak with Jorn Skyseer at Camp Taurajo.

name: Stolen Silver
description: Bring the Stolen Silver to Gazrog in the Crossroads.

name: Mura Runetotem
description: Speak with Mura Runetotem in the Sepulcher.

name: Did You Lose This?
description: Wait for Trenton to finish his work.

name: Bring the End
description: Andrew Brownell wants you to kill Amnennar the Coldbringer and return his skull.

name: A Refugee's Quandary
description: Bring Felix's Box, Felix's Chest and Felix's Bucket of Bolts to Felix Whindlebolt in Anvilmar.

name: Thistleshrub Valley
description: Tran'rek in Gadgetzan wants you to kill 8 Gnarled Thistleshrubs and 8 Thistleshrub Rootshapers.

name: Scalding Mornbrew Delivery
description: Take a Scalding Mornbrew to Durnan Furcutter inside Anvilmar before it gets cold in five minutes!

name: Bring Back the Mug
description: Return Nori's Mug to Nori Pridedrift.

name: The Glowing Shard
description: Travel to Ratchet to find the meaning behind the Nightmare Shard.

name: Suntara Stones
description: Help Dorius get back to Ironforge.

name: Suntara Stones
description: Take the Singed Letter to Thorius in Ironforge. He is in the Hall of Explorers.

name: In Nightmares
description: Bring the Nightmare Shard to Hamuul Runetotem on Elder Rise.

name: In Nightmares
description: Bring the Nightmare Shard to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus.

name: Dwarven Justice
description: Return to the Searing Gorge and find Dorius's archaeology unit.

name: Release Them
description: Find the Mysterious Artifact being guarded by the Twilight's Hammer Idolaters in the northwest quadrant of the Searing Gorge and bring it to the Altar of Suntara in the Slag Pit.

name: The Essence of Eranikus
description: Place the Essence of Eranikus in the Essence Font located in this lair in the Sunken Temple.

name: The Essence of Eranikus
description: Bring the Oathstone of Ysera's Dragonflight and the Chained Essence of Eranikus to Itharius in the Swamp of Sorrows.  It is there that you will make your choice to aid Ysera's Dragonflight or not.

name: Replacement Phial
description: Bring a Mana Potion, Coal, and Sweet Nectar to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge to get a replacement for Talvash's Phial of Scrying.

name: Break Sharptusk!
description: Bring the head of Chief Sharptusk Thornmantle to Brave Windfeather in Red Cloud Mesa.

name: Prayer to Elune
description: Hear Zamael tell his tale.

name: Prayer to Elune
description: Find the Prayer to Elune and take it to Astarii Starseeker in Darnassus.

name: Shadoweaver
description: Kill the group of Shadow Silk Poachers that wander the Searing Gorge. Nilith has reason to believe that there are five of them that need to be exterminated. Return to Nilith in the Searing Gorge when this task is complete.

name: The Sunken Temple
description: Find Marvon Rivetseeker in Tanaris.

name: A Meeting with the Master
description: Bring 2 Undamaged Hippogryph Feathers to Sanath Lim-yo in Azshara if you wish to speak to his master.

name: A Crew Under Fire
description: Defend Captain Vanessa Beltis, her crew and the Horizon Scout's passengers against the naga attack. Captain Vanessa Beltis must survive.

name: The Undermarket
description: Slay Trade Master Kovic and his minion Clunk. Retrieve the Trader's Satchel from his corpse and return it to Nilith.

name: The Undermarket
description: Speak with Vizzklick in Gadgetzan.

name: Divine Retribution
description: Listen as Kalaran Windblade tells his story.

name: The Flawless Flame
description: Collect 4 Hearts of Flame and 4 globes of Golem Oil and return the items to Kalaran Windblade.

name: Forging the Shaft
description: Bring 8 Thorium Plated Daggers to Kalaran Windblade.

name: The Stone Circle
description: Retrieve the Stone Circle from Marvon Rivetseeker's workshop in Ratchet.

name: The Sunken Temple
description: Find Marvon Rivetseeker in Tanaris.

name: Into the Depths
description: Find the Altar of Hakkar in the Sunken Temple in Swamp of Sorrows.

name: Secret of the Circle
description: Travel into the Sunken Temple and discover the secret hidden in the circle of statues.

name: Passing the Burden
description: Speak to Tymor in Ironforge.

name: Arcane Runes
description: Using the Drawing Kit, make rubbings of the Rune of Beth'Amara, the Rune of Jin'yael, the Rune of Markri, and the Rune of Sael'hai before heading to the small island off of the southern peninsula of Azshara and signaling Pilot Xiggs Fuselighter to pick them up.

name: An Easy Pickup
description: Speak to Xiggs Fuselighter in Ironforge.

name: Signal for Pickup
description: Speak to Xiggs Fuselighter and get a Standard Issue Flare Gun from him in Ironforge.

name: The Flame's Casing
description: Find and return a Symbol of Ragnaros to Kalaran Windblade.

name: The Torch of Retribution
description: Wait for Kalaran Windblade to complete the Torch of Retribution.

name: The Torch of Retribution
description: Take the Torch of Retribution.

name: Return to Tymor
description: Return Tymor's Drawing Kit to him in Ironforge.

name: Squire Maltrake
description: Speak with Squire Maltrake.

name: Set Them Ablaze!
description: Set the North, South, East, and West Sentry Towers on fire by using the Torch of Retribution inside each of the buildings.

name: Trinkets...
description: Open the chest.

name: Everything Counts In Large Amounts
description: Bring Kum'isha Imperfect Draenethyst Fragments and be rewarded for each one you turn in.

name: One Draenei's Junk...
description: Bring Kum'isha Imperfect Draenethyst Fragments. Any form of monster in the Blasted Lands could be carrying a fragment.

name: Betrayed
description: Deliver the Sealed Letter to Ag'tor to Ag'tor Bloodfist in Azshara.

name: Betrayed
description: Kill 10 Blood Elf Reclaimers, and 10 Blood Elf Surveyors before seeking out Magus Rimtori's camp. Once you've found it, look for something that might be important to her that can be used to draw her into a fight.

name: Betrayed
description: Destroy the arcane focusing crystal tied to Magus Rimtori and then slay her. Afterwards, take the Head of Magus Rimtori to Ag'tor Bloodfist in Azshara.

name: Betrayed
description: Speak to Belgrom Rockmaul in Orgrimmar.

name: Breaking the Ward
description: Wait for Loramus to complete the enlightenment spell.

name: The Name of the Beast
description: Speak with Lord Arkkoroc in Azshara. Begin your search at the waters edge to find the Temple of Arkkoran.

name: The Name of the Beast
description: Slay Hetaera and bring back Hetaera's Bloodied Head, Hetaera's Beaten Head, and Hetaera's Bruised Head to Lord Arkkoroc.

name: The Name of the Beast
description: Take the temper back to Loramus Thalipedes.

name: In Eranikus' Own Words
description: Travel to the eastern part of Winterspring and speak with Umbranse the Spiritspeaker.

name: The Runed Scroll
description: Take the Runed Scroll to the northern guard tower in the Barrens.

name: Horde Presence
description: Kill the leader of the Talon Den, Rynthariel the Keymaster.

name: Stealing Knowledge
description: Find the Tablet of Beth'Amara, the Tablet of Jin'yael, the Tablet of Markri, and the Tablet of Sael'hai before returning to Jediga in Azshara.

name: Delivery to Magatha
description: Bring the Tablet of Beth'Amara to Magatha in Thunder Bluff.

name: A Friend in Need
description: Speak to Dirania Silvershine in Shadowglen.

name: Screecher Spirits
description: Capture the spirits of 3 screechers in Feralas, then return to Yeh'kinya in Steamwheedle Port.

name: Iverron's Antidote
description: Collect 7 Hyacinth Mushrooms, 4 Moonpetal Lilies, and 1 Webwood Ichor for Dirania Silveshine in Shadowglen.

name: Iverron's Antidote
description: Bring Iverron's Antidote to Iverron before the time limit is up. Iverron can be found by the cave to the north.

name: Scourge of the Downs
description: If you agree to aid Belnistrasz, speak with him again and hand the Oathstone he gave you back to him.

name: Washed Ashore
description: Recover Sea Creature Bones from the beached sea creature just south of Auberdine, and then return with it to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Extinguishing the Idol
description: Escort Belnistrasz to the Quilboar's idol in Razorfen Downs.$B$BProtect Belnistrasz while he performs the ritual to shut down the idol.

name: Goblin Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Goblin Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: The Prophecy of Mosh'aru
description: Bring the First and Second Mosh'aru Tablets to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.

name: The God Hakkar
description: Bring the Filled Egg of Hakkar to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.

name: Delivery to Jes'rimon
description: Bring the Tablet of Jin'yael to Jes'rimon in Orgrimmar.

name: Delivery to Andron Gant
description: Bring the Tablet of Markri to Andron Gant in Undercity.

name: Delivery to Archmage Xylem
description: Bring the Tablet of Sael'hai to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.

name: Magatha's Payment to Jediga
description: Deliver Magatha's Note to Jediga in Azshara.

name: Jes'rimon's Payment to Jediga
description: Deliver Jes'rimon's Note to Jediga in Azshara.

name: Andron's Payment to Jediga
description: Deliver Andron's Note to Jediga in Azshara.

name: Xylem's Payment to Jediga
description: Deliver Xylem's Note to Jediga in Azshara.

name: Rise, Obsidion!
description: Slay Lathoric the Black and Obsidion, and return to Thorius in Ironforge with the Head of Lathoric the Black and the Heart of Obsidion.

name: Seeping Corruption
description: Fill all 4 Empty Vials at the tide pools along the coast of the Ruins of Eldarath in Azshara before returning to Chemist Cuely.

name: Seeping Corruption
description: Give Cuely's Elixir to Thersa Windsong in Undercity.

name: Kim'jael Indeed!
description: Search the Thalassian Base Camp for Kim'jael's Compass, Scope, Stuffed Chicken and Wizzlegoober, then return them to him in Azshara.

name: Azsharite
description: Recover twenty Crystallized Azsharite from southern Azshara. You may use the Felhound to assist you in 'sniffing' out the location of cleverly hidden deposits.$B$BReturn to Loramus when the task is complete.

name: The Formation of Felbane
description: Take the Shipment to Galvan the Ancient in Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Enchanted Azsharite Fel Weaponry
description: Wait for Galvan to finish forging the weaponry.

name: Return to the Blasted Lands
description: Return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

name: Uniting the Shattered Amulet
description: Slay Grol the Destroyer, Lady Sevine, and Archmage Allistarj. From their corpses take the Amulet of Grol, the Amulet of Sevine, and the Amulet of Allistarj.$B$BRemember to USE your Enchanted Azsharite Fel Weaponry to weaken the triad. They cannot be killed otherwise - but use them wisely...

name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
description: Destroy Razelikh the Defiler and return the Severed Horn of the Defiler to the Fallen Hero of the Horde. You will also need to return the Ward of the Defiler so that the Fallen Hero can destroy it, preventing it from ever falling into the wrong hands.

name: Goblin Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Goblin Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: Gnome Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Gnome Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Summon Felsteed
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in the Barrens.

name: Gnome Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Gnome Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Goblin Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Goblin Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: Gnome Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Gnome Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Gnome Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Gnome Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

name: Bring the Light
description: Archbishop Bendictus wants you to slay Amnennar the Coldbringer in Razorfen Downs.

name: Gnome Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Gnome Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

name: The Pledge of Secrecy
description: If you agree to become a Goblin Engineer, then right-click on the Pledge of Secrecy and speak once more with Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: Show Your Work
description: Bring 20 Big Iron Bombs, 20 Solid Dynamite, and 5 Explosive Sheep to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: The Pledge of Secrecy
description: If you agree to become a Gnome Engineer, then right-click on the Pledge of Secrecy and speak once more with Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: Show Your Work
description: Bring 6 Mithril Tubes, an Accurate Scope, and 2 Advanced Target Dummies to Tinkmaster Overspark in Ironforge.

name: The Pledge of Secrecy
description: If you agree to become a Gnome Engineer, then right-click on the Pledge of Secrecy and speak once more with Oglethrope Obnoticus in Booty bay.

name: Show Your Work
description: Bring 6 Mithril Tubes, an Accurate Scope, and a 2 Advanced Target Dummies to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

name: Favored of Elune?
description: Collect 15 Wildkin Feathers from the Hinterlands for Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.

name: Tome of Divinity
description: Speak with Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

name: The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan
description: Venture to the Ruins of Thaurissan in the Burning Steppes and recover information from the Thaurissan Relics. Return to Royal Historian Archesonus when you have recovered the information.

name: The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan
description: Listen to Royal Historian Archesonus recant the history of Thaurissan.

name: Hilary's Necklace
description: Find Hilary's Necklace, and return it to Hilary in Lakeshire.

name: Un'Goro Soil
description: Bring 20 Un'Goro Soil samples to Ghede on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Un'Goro Soil
description: Bring 20 Un'Goro Soil samples to Jenal at the Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.

name: The Corruption Abroad
description: Travel to Gershala Nightwhisper in Auberdine.

name: Morrowgrain Research
description: Take the Arch Druid's Seed Voucher to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus.

name: Morrowgrain Research
description: Take the Seed Voucher to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: Are We There, Yeti?
description: Collect 10 Thick Yeti Furs for Umi Rumplesnicker in Everlook.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: Morrowgrain Research
description: Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus.

name: Morrowgrain Research
description: Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: Jonespyre's Request
description: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Jonespyre's Request
description: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: The Mystery of Morrowgrain
description: Bring 10 Morrowgrain to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Dark Iron Legacy
description: Speak with Franclorn Forgewright if you are interested in obtaining a key to the city major.

name: Dark Iron Legacy
description: Slay Fineous Darkvire and recover the great hammer, Ironfel. Take Ironfel to the Shrine of Thaurissan and place it on the statue of Franclorn Forgewright.

name: Dreadmaul Rock
description: Venture forth to the Burning Steppes and find out what became of Sha'ni Proudtusk.

name: Krom'Grul
description: Recover Sha'ni's Nose-Ring from Krom'Grul and return it to Thal'trak in Kargath. Search the various caves and mines in Dreadmaul Rock.

name: Extinguish the Firegut
description: Slay 15 Firegut Ogre-Mages, 7 Firegut Ogres, and 7 Firegut Ogre Brutes, and return to Oralius when you are finished.

name: Gor'tesh the Brute Lord
description: Find Gor'tesh, somewhere to the west of Dreadmaul Rock. Kill Gor'tesh and then take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head back to Oralius in Burning Steppes.

name: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
description: Take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head and place it at the top of Dreadmaul Rock. Look for a soft dirt mound to plant the pike.

name: An Orphan Looking For a Home
description: Speak to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

name: A Short Incubation
description: Bring 2 Elixir of Fortitudes to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

name: The Newest Member of the Family
description: Take your Fragile Sprite Darter Egg to the Hinterlands and speak to Agnar Beastamer, but hurry, you only have 1 hour to find him before the hatchling within the egg dies.

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
description: Look around in the pond for a clue about who this wrecked raft may belong to.

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
description: Examine the items inside the pack and bring them to their owner.

name: CLUCK!
description: Find some Special Chicken Feed and return to your befriended chicken. When you find it, /cheer at it before trying to give it the Special Chicken Feed.

name: Expedition Salvation
description: Bring a Crate of Foodstuffs and Research Equipment to Williden Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Roll the Bones
description: Bring 8 Dinosaur Bones to Spark Nilminer in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Alien Ecology
description: Use the Scraping Vial to collect a Hive Wall Sample from one of the Gorishi hive hatcheries in Un'Goro Crater.  Look for the chambers with the hanging larval spawns.$B$BBring the Hive Wall Sample to Hol'anyee Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Williden's Journal
description: Return the journal to Williden Marshal somewhere in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Rattling the Rattlecages
description: Kill 12 Rattlecage Skeletons, and then return to Shadow Priest Sarvis in Deathknell when you are done.

name: Scavenging Deathknell
description: Search Deathknell and the vicinity for 6 pieces of Scavenged Goods, and return them to Deathguard Saltain.

name: Milly Osworth
description: Speak with Milly Osworth.

name: Milly's Harvest
description: Bring 8 crates of Milly's Harvest to Milly Osworth at Northshire Abbey.

name: Grape Manifest
description: Bring the Grape Manifest to Brother Neals in Northshire Abbey.

name: Disharmony of Flame
description: Travel to the quarry in Blackrock Mountain and slay Overmaster Pyron. Return to Thunderheart when you have completed this assignment.

name: Disharmony of Fire
description: Enter Blackrock Depths and track down Lord Incendius. Slay him and return any source of information you may find to Thunderheart.

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
description: Take Linken's Sword to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

name: The Videre Elixir
description: Seek out Gregan Brewspewer in northern Feralas. From him, learn how you may acquire the Videre Elixir, then return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

name: Meet at the Grave
description: Go to the graveyard outside Gadgetzan, and use the Videre Elixir. Follow the rest of Donova's instructions to find Gaeriyan.

name: A Grave Situation
description: Resurrect, then look for the gravestone that Gaeriyan told you to find.

name: Linken's Sword
description: Deliver Linken's Superior Sword to Linken in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Wenikee Boltbucket
description: Bring the Broken Samophlange to Wenikee Boltbucket.

name: Nugget Slugs
description: Bring 15 Nugget Slugs to Wenikee Boltbucket in the Barrens.

name: Rilli Greasygob
description: Bring the Broken and Battered Samophlange to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.

name: Samophlange Manual
description: Bring the Samophlange Manual to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.

name: A Gnome's Assistance
description: Find J.D. Collie in the cave at Marshal's Refuge.

name: Linken's Memory
description: Find Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.

name: Linken's Adventure
description: Take the Silver Totem of Aquementas to Linken in Marshal's Refuge.

name: It's Dangerous to Go Alone
description: Travel to Fire Plume Ridge, south of Marshal's Refuge.$B$BFind Blazerunner and use the totem to remove his protective aura. Once he has been defeated, acquire the Golden Flame from the cave.

name: Commander Gor'shak
description: Find Commander Gor'shak in Blackrock Depths.$B$BYou recall that the crudely drawn picture of the orc included bars drawn over the portrait. Perhaps you should search for a prison of some sort.

name: What Is Going On?
description: Defend Gor'shak.

name: What Is Going On?
description: Speak with Kharan Mighthammer and gather information about Princess Moira Bronzebeard's kidnapping. Take that information to Thrall in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou recall Gor'shak mentioning that Kharan is being held in a cell nearby.

name: The Eastern Kingdom
description: Speak with Thrall if you are prepared to take on the mission he has planned.

name: The Royal Rescue
description: Slay Emperor Dagran Thaurissan and free Princess Moira Bronzebeard from his evil spell.

name: The Princess Saved?
description: Return to Thrall!

name: Aquementas
description: Take the Book of Aquor, the Silvery Claws, and the Irontree Heart to Tanaris.$B$BUse the Book of Aquor to summon Aquementas.$B$BAfter you have the completed totem, take it to J.D. Collie in Marshal's Refuge.

name: Counterattack!
description: Bring a Piece of Krom'zar's Banner to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

name: A Taste of Flame
description: Show Cyrus Therepentous the Black Dragonflight Molt you received from Kalaran Windblade.

name: A Taste of Flame
description: Show Cyrus Therepentous proof of your worth.$B$BYou have a feeling that Cyrus already knows that you are unworthy.

name: A Taste of Flame
description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay Bael'Gar.$B$BYou only know that the giant resides inside Blackrock Depths. Remember to use the Altered Black Dragonflight Molt on Bael'Gar's remains to capture the Fiery Essence.$B$BReturn the Encased Fiery Essence to Cyrus Therepentous.$B$B

name: The Rise of the Machines
description: Venture to the Burning Steppes and recover 10 Fractured Elemental Shards for Hierophant Theodora Mulvadania.$B$BYou recall Theodora mentioning the golems and elementals of that region as being a source for these shards.

name: The Rise of the Machines
description: Take the Elemental Shard Sample to Lotwil Veriatus.$B$BYou recall Theodora saying that Lotwil was stationed in a camp to the east.

name: The Rise of the Machines
description: Find and slay Golem Lord Argelmach. Return his head to Lotwil. You will also need to collect 10 Intact Elemental Cores from the Ragereaver Golems and Warbringer Constructs protecting Argelmach. You know this because you are psychic.

name: KILL ON SIGHT: Dark Iron Dwarves
description: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 15 Anvilrage Guardsmen, 10 Anvilrage Wardens and 5 Anvilrage Footmen. Return to him once your task is complete.$B$B

name: KILL ON SIGHT: High Ranking Dark Iron Officials
description: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 10 Anvilrage Medics, 10 Anvilrage Soldiers and 10 Anvilrage Officers. Return to him once your task is complete.

name: Silver Heart
description: Collect 11 Silvery Claws and 1 Irontree Heart for Eridan Bluewind in Felwood.

name: Cleansing Felwood
description: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Arathandris Silversky in Felwood.

name: Cleansing Felwood
description: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Maybess Riverbreeze in Felwood.

name: The Strength of Corruption
description: Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas wants you to kill 12 Angerclaw Grizzlies and 12 Felpaw Ravagers in Felwood.

name: Precarious Predicament
description: Escort your prisoner, Grark Lorkrub, through Burning Steppes and through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge.$B$BYou recall Lexlort mentioning that he would have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.$B$BYou will also be required to hand over your Thorium Shackles to Lexlort.

name: Grark Lorkrub
description: Travel to the Burning Steppes and find Grark Lorkrub. You recall Lexlort mentioning that he was last seen in a massive Blackrock fortress.$B$BWhen you find Grark Lorkrub, use the Thorium Shackles to bind him and then lead him back through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge. Lexlort will have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.

name: The Heart of the Mountain
description: Bring the Heart of the Mountain to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

name: The Missing Courier
description: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: The Missing Courier
description: Locate the courier's boat somewhere along the coast of Feralas.

name: Hurley Blackbreath
description: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Ragnar Thunderbrew in Kharanos.

name: Boat Wreckage
description: Return to Feathermoon Stronghold and show Ginro Hearthkindle the Discarded Knife you have found.

name: Ragnar Thunderbrew
description: Speak with Ragnar Thunderbrew.

name: The Knife Revealed
description: Take the Discarded Knife to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Psychometric Reading
description: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: The Woodpaw Gnolls
description: Search the Woodpaw Gnoll camps of southern Feralas for evidence of the courier's belongings or the courier himself.

name: Operation: Death to Angerforge
description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay General Angerforge! Return to Warlord Goretooth when the task is complete.

name: Vivian Lagrave
description: Speak with Shadowmaster Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

name: Lost Thunderbrew Recipe
description: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

name: The Writhing Deep
description: Now that Raschal's last known whereabouts have been discovered, continue your search for him or his remains in the Writhing Deep.  According to the note, it is located to the south of the Woodpaw gnoll camps.

name: Ribbly Screwspigot
description: Bring Ribbly's Head to Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

name: Muigin and Larion
description: Collect 15 Bloodpetals and return to Muigin.

name: A Visit to Gregan
description: Take a Bloodpetal to Gregan Brewspewer in Feralas.

name: Haze of Evil
description: Collect 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze, then return to Muigin in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Larion and Muigin
description: Hunt 5 Bloodpetal Lashers, 5 Bloodpetal Threshers, 5 Bloodpetal Flayers and 5 Bloodpetal Trappers for Larion at Marshal's Refuge.

name: Zapper Fuel
description: Deliver the Unloaded Zapper and 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze to Larion in Marshal's Refuge.

name: Marvon's Workshop
description: Travel to Marvon Rivetseeker's workshop in Ratchet.

name: Recipe of the Kaldorei
description: Collect 7 Small Spider Legs for Zarrin in Dolanaar.

name: Goblin Engineering
description: If you wish to learn more about Goblin Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

name: Dragonkin Menace
description: Slay 15 Black Broodlings, 10 Black Dragonspawn, 4 Black Wyrmkin and 1 Black Drake. Return to Helendis Riverhorn when the task is complete.

name: The True Masters
description: Travel to Lakeshire and deliver Helendis Riverhorn's Letter to Magistrate Solomon.

name: The True Masters
description: Travel to Stormwind and deliver Solomon's Plea to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon.$B$BBolvar resides in Stormwind Keep.

name: The True Masters
description: Speak with Highlord Bolvar Fordragon after speaking with Lady Katrana Prestor.

name: The True Masters
description: Take Bolvar's Decree to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.

name: The Love Potion
description: Bring 4 Gromsblood, 10 Giant Silver Veins and Nagmara's Filled Vial to Mistress Nagmara in Blackrock Depths.

name: The True Masters
description: Speak with Marshal Maxwell in the Burning Steppes.

name: The True Masters
description: Speak with Ragged John to learn of Marshal Windsor's fate and return to Marshal Maxwell when you have completed this task.$B$BYou recall Marshal Maxwell telling you to search for him in a cave to the north.

name: Marshal Windsor
description: Travel to Blackrock Mountain in the northwest and enter Blackrock Depths. Find out what became of Marshal Windsor.$B$BYou recall Ragged John talking about Windsor being dragged off to a prison.

name: Abandoned Hope
description: Give Marshal Maxwell the bad news.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
description: Find A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
description: Find a Mithril Casing and return to A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
description: Escort A-Me 01 back to Karna Remtravel in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Ancient Spirit
description: Escort Arei to safety, then speak with Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song, in eastern Ashenvale.

name: Overmaster Pyron
description: Slay Overmaster Pyron and return to Jalinda Sprig.$B$BYou recall Jalinda talking about Pyron guarding the quarry. Perhaps you should search there?

name: Incendius!
description: Find Lord Incendius in Blackrock Depths and destroy him!

name: A Crumpled Up Note
description: You may have just stumbled on to something that Marshal Windsor would be interested in seeing. There may be hope, after all.

name: Freed from the Hive
description: Free Raschal from the Zukk'ash hive.$B$BReturn to Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold and let him know that Raschal is alive and well.

name: A Hero's Welcome
description: Speak with Shandris Feathermoon in Feathermoon Stronghold.

name: Rise of the Silithid
description: Bring Raschal's Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

name: Thalanaar Delivery
description: Bring the Undelivered Parcel to Falfindel Waywarder in Thalanaar.

name: A Shred of Hope
description: Return Marshal Windsor's Lost Information.$B$BMarshal Windsor believes that the information is being held by Golem Lord Argelmach and General Angerforge.

name: FIFTY! YEP!
description: Oralius wants 50 Blackrock Medallions. Chances are high that these medallions can be found on the orcs in the Burning Steppes.

name: Crystals of Power
description: Collect 7 Power Crystals of each color: red, blue, yellow, and green. Bring them to J.D. Collie at Marshal's Refuge.

name: The Northern Pylon
description: Discover the location of the Northern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

name: The Good Stuff
description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 20 Dark Iron Fanny Packs. Return to Oralius when you have completed this task. You assume that the Dark Iron dwarves inside Blackrock Depths carry these 'fanny pack' contraptions.

name: The Eastern Pylon
description: Discover the location of the Eastern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

name: The Western Pylon
description: Discover the location of the Western Crystal Pylon.

name: The Apes of Un'Goro
description: Bring 2 Un'Goro Gorilla Pelts, 2 Un'Goro Stomper Pelts, and 2 Un'Goro Thunderer Pelts to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

name: The Fare of Lar'korwi
description: Find the carcass of Lar'korwi's freshest kill and steal a Piece of Threshadon Carcass before returning to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.

name: The Scent of Lar'korwi
description: Bring 2 Ravasaur Pheromone Glands to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

name: The Bait for Lar'korwi
description: Using the contents of Torwa's Pouch, summon Lar'korwi and defeat him. Then bring Lar'korwi's Head to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

name: A Sample of Slime...
description: Gather Felwood Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Felwood. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most corrupt. Bring 5 of the Corrupted Felwood Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

name: ... and a Batch of Ooze
description: Gather Un'Goro Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Un'Goro Crater. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most pure. Bring 5 of the Pure Un'Goro Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

name: Tablet of the Seven
description: Bring the Tablet Transcript to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

name: Food for Baby
description: Bring 5 Silvermane Stalker Flanks to Agnar Beastamer in Hinterlands.

name: Becoming a Parent
description: Speak to Agnar Beastamer in the Hinterlands.

name: Bone-Bladed Weapons
description: Bring 8 White Ravasaur Claws to Jes'rimon in Orgrimmar.

name: The Mighty U'cha
description: Bring U'cha's Pelt to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

name: Making Sense of It
description: Speak with J.D. Collie in a moment.

name: Jail Break!
description: Help Marshal Windsor get his gear back and free his friends. Return to Marshal Maxwell if you succeed.

name: Yuka Screwspigot
description: Speak with Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

name: Kharan Mighthammer
description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and find Kharan Mighthammer.$B$BThe King mentioned that Kharan was being held prisoner there - perhaps you should try looking for a prison.

name: Kharan's Tale
description: Listen as Kharan Mighthammer tells his story.

name: The Bearer of Bad News
description: Return to Ironforge and deliver the bad news to King Magni Bronzebeard.

name: The Fate of the Kingdom
description: Return to Blackrock Depths and rescue Princess Moira Bronzebeard from the evil clutches of Emperor Dagran Thaurissan.

name: The Princess's Surprise
description: Return to Ironforge and speak with King Magni Bronzebeard.

name: Galgar's Cactus Apple Surprise
description: Bring Galgar 10 Cactus Apples. You remember him saying that they could be found near cactuses.

name: The Corruption of the Jadefire
description: Kill 11 Jadefire Felsworns, 9 Jadefire Shadowstalkers, 9 Jadefire Rogues, and Xavathras. Return to Eridan Bluewind in Felwood when the task has been completed.

name: Felbound Ancients
description: Travel to Darnassus and use Eridan's Vial to collect a Vial of Blessed Water from the Temple of the Moon. Return to Eridan with the filled vial.

name: Purified!
description: Speak to Eridan again in a moment.

name: Caught!
description: Kill 8 Dark Iron Geologists and bring 15 pieces of Silk Cloth to the person locked in the outhouse in Searing Gorge.

name: Ledger from Tanaris
description: Take the copy of Goodsteel's Ledger and then find the items listed in it before seeking Krinkle Goodsteel in Tanaris.

name: The Key to Freedom
description: Search Searing Gorge and find a use for the Grimesilt Outhouse Key you have found.

name: The Tome of Nobility
description: Speak to Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

name: The Tome of Nobility
description: Speak to Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

name: Summon Felsteed
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

name: Summon Felsteed
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

name: Summon Felsteed
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

name: Summon Felsteed
description: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet to learn the ability to summon a Felsteed.

name: A Little Help From My Friends
description: Lead Ringo to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.$B$BIf Ringo faints, use Spraggle's Canteen to revive him.

name: Lost!
description: Find Ringo at Fire Plume Ridge.

name: March of the Silithid
description: Speak to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

name: March of the Silithid
description: Speak to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

name: A Good Friend
description: Find Iverron by the cave to the north.

name: Bungle in the Jungle
description: Bring a Gorishi Scent Gland and 5 Un'Goro Soil samples to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

name: Beware of Pterrordax
description: Kill 10 Pterrordax and 15 Frenzied Pterrordax, then speak to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.

name: Volcanic Activity
description: Collect 9 samples of Un'Goro Ash from the fire elementals around the volcano in Un'Goro Crater, and return them to Liv Rizzlefix in Ratchet.

name: Shizzle's Flyer
description: Collect 8 Webbed Diemetradon Scales and 8 Webbed Pterrordax Scales for Shizzle in Marshal's Refuge.

name: Super Sticky
description: Collect 12 samples of Super Sticky Tar for Tran'rek in Gadgetzan.

name: Well of Corruption
description: Collect a sample of corrupted water from the Jadefire Satyrs' moonwell and bring it to Winna Hazzard at Bloodvenom Post.

name: Corrupted Sabers
description: Take Winna's kitten to the corrupted moonwell, release it, then bring it back to Winna.$B$BOnce you have returned to Winna, click on the cat to release it to Winna.

name: Pawn Captures Queen
description: Defeat the Gorishi Hive Queen once she is summoned.$B$BBring the Gorishi Queen's Brain to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

name: Calm Before the Storm
description: Bring Pestlezugg's Un'Goro Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

name: Calm Before the Storm
description: Bring Pestlezugg's Un'Goro Report to Zilzibin Drumlore in Orgrimmar.

name: Calm Before the Storm
description: Bring the Bank Voucher to Idriana in the bank of Darnassus.

name: Calm Before the Storm
description: Bring the Bank Voucher to Karus in the bank of Orgrimmar.

name: A Little Slime Goes a Long Way
description: Bring 6 Filled Cursed Ooze Jars and 6 Filled Tainted Ooze Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.

name: A Little Slime Goes a Long Way
description: Bring 10 Filled Pure Sample Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.$B$BIf you have trouble finding them, perhaps try to get more clues from Laris.

name: Wild Guardians
description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to kill 15 Raging Owlbeasts and 15 Ragged Owlbeasts.

name: Message to Freewind Post
description: Bring the Urgent Message to Cliffwatcher Longhorn at Freewind Post.

name: Kayneth Stillwind
description: Take Shindrell's Note to Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song.

name: The Sparklematic 5200!
description: Insert a Grime-Encrusted Item into the Sparklematic 5200, and be sure to have three silver coins to start the machine.

name: The Sparklematic 5200!
description: Insert a Grime-Encrusted Item into the Sparklematic 5200, and be sure to have three silver coins to start the machine.

name: Avast Ye, Admiral!
description: Slay Fleet Master Seahorn and Baron Revilgaz of Booty Bay, and then return to Fleet Master Firallon aboard the Crimson Veil off the coast of Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Your Place In The World
description: Speak with Gornek. You recall Kaltunk marking your map with his location and mentioning that Gornek resided in the Den, a building to the west.

name: Melding of Influences
description: Bring a Merged Ooze Sample to Chemist Fuely in Undercity.

name: Washed Ashore
description: Recover the Sea Turtle Remains from the Skeletal Sea Turtle in the waters west of Auberdine, and then speak with Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde back in Auberdine.

name: Put Her Down
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy the source of the worg menace. As you left Helendis, he shouted a name: Halycon. It is what the orcs refer to in regards to the worg.

name: Wild Guardians
description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 10 Berserk Owlbeasts in Winterspring.

name: Beached Sea Turtle
description: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Beached Sea Creature
description: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: The Pack Mistress
description: Slay Halycon, pack mistress of the Bloodaxe worg.

name: Beached Sea Turtle
description: Take the Strangely Marked Box to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Broodling Essence
description: Bring 8 Broodling Essence and the Draco-Incarcinatrix 900 to Tinkee Steamboil at the Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

name: Beached Sea Turtle
description: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Beached Sea Creature
description: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Bloodaxe Worg Pups. Use the cage to carry the ferocious little beasts. Bring back a Caged Worg Pup to Kibler.

name: Beached Sea Creature
description: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Beached Sea Turtle
description: Take the Strangely Marked Box to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Beached Sea Turtle
description: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Beached Sea Creature
description: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

name: Egg Freezing
description: Use the Eggscilloscope Prototype on an egg in the Rookery.

name: Egg Collection
description: Bring 8 Collected Dragon Eggs and the Collectronic Module to Tinkee Steamboil at Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
description: Speak with Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: WANTED: Murkdeep!
description: Find and slay the murloc known as Murkdeep.  The creature is thought to be defending the murloc huts south of Auberdine along the water.$B$BReport the death of Murkdeep to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

name: Wild Guardians
description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 13 Moontouched Owlbeasts.

name: Seal of Ascension
description: Find the three gemstones of command: The Gemstone of Smolderthorn, Gemstone of Spirestone, and Gemstone of Bloodaxe. Return them, along with the Unadorned Seal of Ascension, to Vaelan.$B$BThe Generals, as told to you by Vaelan, are: War Master Voone of the Smolderthorn; Highlord Omokk of the Spirestone; and Overlord Wyrmthalak  of the Bloodaxe.

name: Seal of Ascension
description: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh. Find the ancient drake, Emberstrife and beat him without mercy until his will is broken.$B$BIt is at that moment which you must place the Unforged Seal of Ascension before the great beast. You must then be quick to use the Orb of Draconic Energy on his weakened form and claim dominion over his mental faculties. Control the beast and force the Flames of the Black Dragonflight upon the Unforged Seal of Ascension!

name: Thundris Windweaver
description: Speak with Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine.

name: The Cliffspring River
description: Travel north of Auberdine to the first waterfall along the Cliffspring River and draw a sample from the pool there.$B$BReturn to Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine with the Cliffspring River Sample.

name: The Blackwood Corrupted
description: Fill the Empty Cleansing Bowl at the Auberdine Moonwell.$B$BGather a sample of fruit, nut, and grain from the northern Blackwood furbolg camps.$B$BMix the bowl and place it near the bonfire closest to the Cliffspring River at the northern camp, thus summoning the satyr corruptor.$B$BTake the Talisman of Corruption and bring it to Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine.

name: Doomrigger's Clasp
description: Bring Doomrigger's Clasp to Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

name: Delivery to Ridgewell
description: Bring Ridgewell's Crate to Remington Ridgewell in Stormwind.

name: Mayara Brightwing
description: Speak with Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

name: Wind Rider
description: Bring 10 Highperch Wyvern Eggs to Elu in Freewind Post.

name: The Darkstone Tablet
description: Bring the Darkstone Tablet to Shadow Mage Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

name: Vivian Lagrave and the Darkstone Tablet
description: Speak with Shadowmage Vivian Lagrave.

name: Homeward Bound
description: Escort Pao'ka Swiftmountain from Highperch, and then talk to Motega Firemane in Whitereach Post.

name: Dawn's Gambit
description: Place Dawn's Gambit in the Viewing Room of the Scholomance.  Defeat Vectus, then return to Betina Bigglezink.

name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
description: Bring a Gold Bar to Xizk Goodstitch in Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
description: Return to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
description: Bring 10 Vials of Hatefury Blood and 1 Lesser Infernal Stone to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
description: Bring some Fine Gold Thread, 2 Smoldering Coals, and a Soul Shard to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: The Completed Robe
description: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete your robe and then speak to her again.

name: The Ancient Egg
description: Bring the Ancient Egg to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.

name: The Final Tablets
description: Bring the Fifth and Sixth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.

name: Felnok Steelspring
description: Give Tinkee's Letter to Felnok Steelspring.

name: Chillwind Horns
description: Bring 8 Uncracked Chillwind Horns to Felnok Steelspring.

name: Return to Tinkee
description: Bring Felnok's Package to Tinkee Steamboil in the Burning Steppes.

name: The Red Crystal
description: Travel east of Auberdine and look for a large, red crystal along Darkshore's eastern mountain range.  Report back what you find to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

name: As Water Cascades
description: Fill the Empty Water Tube at the Auberdine moonwell, and then investigate the red crystal along Darkshore's eastern mountain wall.

name: The Fragments Within
description: Report back what you have found to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

name: Alien Egg
description: Return the Alien Egg to Hagar Lightninghoof in Freewind Post.

name: You Scream, I Scream...
description: Get some Strawberry Ice Cream for your ward.  The lad seems to prefer Tigule and Foror's brand ice cream.

conditions.name: Tigule and Foror's Strawberry Ice Cream

name: Pacify the Centaur
description: Kill 12 Galak Scouts, 10 Galak Wranglers, and 6 Galak Windchasers, and then return to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.

name: Strange Sources
description: Follow Donova Snowden's instructions, then report back.

name: Enraged Wildkin
description: Locate Jaron Stoneshaper's wrecked camp and supplies in southern Winterspring.

name: En-Ay-Es-Tee-Why
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 15 Spire Spider Eggs for Kibler.$B$BBy the sound of it, these eggs could be found near spiders.

name: Enraged Wildkin
description: Find Jaron Stoneshaper's wrecked wagon.

name: Enraged Wildkin
description: Pick up Jaron's Supplies from the snow, then find the wildkin that stole the amulet Jaron spoke of.$B$BBring Jaron's Supplies and the Blue-feathered Amulet to Jaron Stoneshaper at the lodge in Winterspring.

name: Serpent Wild
description: Report your findings to Motega Firemane.

name: Mother's Milk
description: In the heart of Blackrock Spire you will find Mother Smolderweb. Engage her and get her to poison you. Chances are good that you will have to kill her as well. Return to Ragged John when you are poisoned so that he can 'milk' you.

name: Urok Doomhowl
description: Read Warosh's Scroll.  Bring Warosh's Mojo to Warosh.

name: Assassination Plot
description: Warn Kanati Greycloud at Whitereach Post of the plot to kill him.

name: Guarding Secrets
description: Take the Blue-feathered Necklace to Trull Failbane at Bloodvenom Post.

name: Guarding Secrets
description: Take the Blue-feathered Necklace to Nara Wildmane.

name: Guardians of the Altar
description: Protect Ranshalla while she attempts to reactivate the Altar of Elune. Report your findings to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.

name: Wildkin of Elune
description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Warlord's Command
description: Slay Highlord Omokk, War Master Voone, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Recover Important Blackrock Documents. Return to Warlord Goretooth in Kargath when the mission has been accomplished.

name: Free at Last
description: Escort Lakota Windsong from the Darkcloud Pinnacle, and then talk to Thalia Amberhide at Freewind Post.

name: Further Corruption
description: Eridan Bluewind in Felwood wants you to kill 8 Jadefire Hellcallers, 8 Jadefire Betrayers, 8 Jadefire Tricksters, and Xavaric. Return to Eridan when the task is completed.

name: Tinkee Steamboil
description: Speak with Tinkee Steamboil.

name: Lost in Battle
description: Find Mankrik's wife and then return to him in the Crossroads.

name: Eitrigg's Wisdom
description: Speak with Eitrigg in Orgrimmar. When you have discussed matters with Eitrigg, seek council from Thrall.$B$BYou recall having seen Eitrigg in Thrall's chamber.

name: Cleansing of the Orb of Orahil
description: Kill the Demon of the Orb, then speak with Tabetha.

name: Shard of a Felhound
description: Take the Felhas Ruby and use it on one of the Felhounds found in Desolace. After successful, bring the Felhas Ruby and the Imprisoned Felhound Spirit back to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Shard of an Infernal
description: Take the Infus Emerald and use it on one of the Infernals found in Desolace. After successful, bring the Infus Emerald and the Imprisoned Infernal Spirit back to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: The Completed Orb of Dar'Orahil
description: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete the Orb of Dar'Orahil and then speak to her again.

name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Protect Kanati Greycloud
description: Protect Kanati Greycloud from the centaur attack.

name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
description: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Frostsaber Provisions
description: Collect 5 Shardtooth Meats and 5 Chillwind Meats for Rivern Frostwind in Winterspring.

name: A Matter of Time
description: Use the Temporal Displacer near one of Andorhal's silos and uncover Temporal Parasites.$B$BSlay 10 Temporal Parasites, and then return the Temporal Displacer to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

name: Counting Out Time
description: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches, found in lockboxes amongst the rubble of the city.  Return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

name: Counting Out Time
description: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches amongst the rubble of the city, and return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

name: For The Horde!
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Warchief Rend Blackhand. Take his head and return to Orgrimmar.

name: The Completed Orb of Noh'Orahil
description: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete the Orb of Noh'Orahil and then speak to her again.

name: Returning the Cleansed Orb
description: Return the Cleansed Infernal Orb to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

name: Operative Bijou
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find out what happened to Bijou.

name: Bijou's Belongings
description: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. You recall her mentioning that she stashed them on the bottom floor of the city.

name: Bijou's Reconnaissance Report
description: Take Bijou's Reconnaissance Report back to Grandmaster Lexlort in Kargath.

name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
description: Destroy 8 Diseased Wolves, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
description: Destroy 8 Diseased Grizzlies, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
description: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Darnassus is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
description: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Thunder Bluff is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

name: Bijou's Belongings
description: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. Good luck!

name: Message to Maxwell
description: Travel to the Burning Steppes and give Bijou's Information to Marshal Maxwell.

name: Better Late Than Never
description: The ramblings of the ghostly woman indicated that she needed a package delivered.  She claimed that it was where her horse was.  As to where the horse is or where the package was to be delivered - the ghost remains incomprehensible.

name: Better Late Than Never
description: Check with the Royal Factors of Stormwind to learn the whereabouts of an Emma Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located in City Hall.

name: Better Late Than Never
description: Check with the Royal Overseers of the Undercity to learn the whereabouts of a Jeremiah Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located near guild and tabard registration.

name: Supplies for the Crossroads
description: Find and return Crossroads' Supply Crates to Thork in the Barrens.

name: Finkle Einhorn, At Your Service!
description: Talk to Malyfous Darkhammer in Everlook.

conditions.name: Glowing Hunk of the Beast's Flesh

name: Good Natured Emma
description: Find Ol' Emma in Stormwind and see if she is in fact Emma Felstone.  If she is, then perhaps she'd like the package Janice Felstone made for her.

name: The Jeremiah Blues
description: Find Jeremiah Payson in the Undercity and see if he is in fact Jeremiah Felstone.  If he is, then perhaps he'd like the package Janice Felstone made for him.

name: Good Luck Charm
description: Return to Janice Felstone in Western Plaguelands her Good Luck Half-Charm.

name: Two Halves Become One
description: Locate the other half of the Good Luck Charm somewhere on the Felstone Farm in Western Plaguelands and reassemble it.$B$BGive the Good Luck Charm to Janice Felstone on the Felstone Farm, Western Plaguelands.

name: Blood Shards of Agamaggan
description: Bring a Blood Shard to Mangletooth in Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.$B$BCollect more Blood Shards if you want him to bless you with Agamaggan's power.

name: Ursius of the Shardtooth
description: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Ursius.

name: Brumeran of the Chillwind
description: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Brumeran.

name: Shy-Rotam
description: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to defeat Shy-Rotam.

name: Past Endeavors
description: Bring Storm Shadowhoof's Marker to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: Sacred Fire
description: Gather 10 bushels of Incendia Agave, and then consult Magatha Grimtotem on Elder Rise in Thunderbluff.

name: Cap of the Scarlet Savant
description: In order to create the Cap of the Scarlet Savant, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 8 Arcane Crystals; 5 Enchanted Scarlet Thread. $B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

name: Grimtotem Spying
description: Locate and retrieve the three Secret Notes in Darkcloud Pinnacle.

name: The Lost Tablets of Mosh'aru
description: Bring the Third and Fourth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

name: Leggings of Arcana
description: In order to create the Leggings of Arcana, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Frostwhisper's Embalming Fluid.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

name: Breastplate of Bloodthirst
description: In order to create the Breastplate of Bloodthirst, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Skin of Shadow.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

name: Maxwell's Mission
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy War Master Voone, Highlord Omokk, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

name: Threat of the Winterfall
description: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Pathfinders, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Totemics.

name: Winterfall Firewater
description: Bring the Empty Firewater Flask to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

name: Falling to Corruption
description: Search the Deadwood furbolg camp in northern Felwood for a clue.

name: Mystery Goo
description: Report back to Donova Snowden with your findings.

name: Toxic Horrors
description: Collect 3 Toxic Horror Droplets for Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

name: Winterfall Runners
description: Find the Winterfall Runners and stop them from delivering their shipment to Winterfall Village.

name: Arikara
description: Slay Arikara. Bring her remains and the Incendia powder to Motega Firemane in Whitereach Post as proof of your deed.

name: General Drakkisath's Command
description: Take General Drakkisath's Command to Marshal Maxwell in Burning Steppes.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

name: Clear the Way
description: Kill 10 Skeletal Flayers and 10 Slavering Ghouls in Sorrow Hill.$B$BReturn to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glades and the Undercity.

name: Scarlet Diversions
description: Proceed to the Scarlet Crusade's base camp between Felstone Field and Dalson's Tears and destroy their command tent.$B$BPlace the Scourge banner at the camp, and then return to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: All Along the Watchtowers
description: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to Commander Ashlam Valorfist in Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: All Along the Watchtowers
description: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: General Drakkisath's Demise
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy General Drakkisath. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

name: Hot Fiery Death
description: Someone in this world must know what to do with these gauntlets. Good luck!

name: High Chief Winterfall
description: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to defeat High Chief Winterfall.

name: The Final Piece
description: Bring the Crudely-written Log to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

name: Fiery Plate Gauntlets
description: Bring Malyfous Darkhammer 6 Enchanted Thorium Bars, 2 Essence of Fire, and 4 Star Rubies. You will also need to turn in your Unfired Plate Gauntlets.

name: Lorax's Tale
description: Speak with Lorax. Listen to what he has to say.

name: The Demon Forge
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Goraluk Anvilcrack. Slay him and then use the Blood Stained Pike upon his corpse. After his soul has been siphoned, the pike will be Soul Stained.$B$BYou must also find the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate.$B$BReturn both the Soul Stained Pike and the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate to Lorax in Winterspring.

name: Words of the High Chief
description: Take the Crudely-written Log to Kelek Skykeeper in southern Felwood.

name: Dragonscale Leatherworking
description: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Peter Galen in Azshara.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Little Pamela
description: Find Pamela Redpath.

name: Tribal Leatherworking
description: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Caryssia Moonhunter in Feralas.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Elemental Leatherworking
description: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Sarah Tanner in Searing Gorge.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Dragonscale Leatherworking
description: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Thorkaf Dragoneye in the Badlands.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Elemental Leatherworking
description: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Brumn Winterhoof in the Arathi Mountains.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Wanted - Arnak Grimtotem
description: Slay Arnak Grimtotem and bring proof of your deed to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.

name: Tribal Leatherworking
description: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Se'Jib in Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

name: Pamela's Doll
description: Find Pamela's doll.

name: Hypercapacitor Gizmo
description: Slay the beast and bring back the Hypercapacitor Gizmo and Panther Cage Key to Wizlo Bearingshiner.

name: Auntie Marlene
description: Speak with Marlene, south of the Ruins of Andorhal.

name: A Strange Historian
description: Bring Joseph's Wedding Ring to Chromie.

name: The Annals of Darrowshire
description: Bring the Annals of Darrowshire to Chromie in Andorhal.

name: Forces of Jaedenar
description: Enter Jaedenar and slay 4 Jaedenar Hounds, 4 Jaedenar Guardsmen, 6 Jaedenar Adepts, and 6 Jaedenar Cultists before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

name: Verifying the Corruption
description: Seek out and destroy 2 Entropic Beasts and 2 Entropic Horrors while exploring Shatter Scar Vale. After checking to see if the craters there are still filled with corrupt fel water, return to Taronn Redfeather in Felwood.

name: Collection of the Corrupt Water
description: Take the Empty Canteen to the Moon Well in the center of Jaedenar and fill it before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

name: Seeking Spiritual Aid
description: Take the Corrupt Moon Well Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

name: Cleansed Water Returns to Felwood
description: Take the Purified Moon Well Water to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

name: The Matron Protectorate
description: Travel to Winterspring and find Haleh. Give her Awbee's scale.

name: Wrath of the Blue Flight
description: Speak with Haleh if you wish to continue.

name: Wrath of the Blue Flight
description: Speak with Jeziba in the Plaguelands. He resides in Andorhal.

name: Are We There, Yeti?
description: Take Umi's Mechanical Yeti and scare her friends with it:$B$BLegacki in Everlook (Winterspring)$BSprinkle in Gadgetzan (Tanaris)$BQuixxil in Marshal's Refuge (Un'Goro Crater)$B$BWhen you are done, bring the Mechanical Yeti back to Umi.

name: Catalogue of the Wayward
description: Read from the Catalogue of the Wayward.

name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
description: Using the Purified Moon Well Water, douse the flames of the four braziers of protection within Shadow Hold in Felwood, then return to Greta Mosshoof in the Emerald Sanctuary.

name: Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight
description: To forge the Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings.

name: Legplates of the Chromatic Defier
description: To forge the Legplates of the Chromatic Defier, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B5 Skin of Shadow.

name: Heroes of Darrowshire
description: Bring Davil's Libram and Redpath's Shield to Carlin Redpath.

name: Villains of Darrowshire
description: Bring the Skull of Horgus and the Shattered Sword of Marduk to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel.

name: Winterfall Intrusion
description: Rivern Frostwind wants you to slay 5 Winterfall Shaman and 5 Winterfall Ursa.

name: A Strange Red Key
description: Search through Jaedenar to discover what the Blood Red Key is used for.

name: Rescue From Jaedenar
description: Escort Arko'narin to where Lightforge and her equipment are being held, and then protect her as you escape Shadow Hold. Afterwards, seek out Jessir Moonbow in Felwood to let her know what's happened to her friends.

name: Retribution of the Light
description: Return to Jaedenar and kill the succubus Rakaiah before finding the Remains of Trey Lightforge.

name: Marauders of Darrowshire
description: Bring 5 Resonating Skulls and the Mystic Crystal to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Brother Carlin
description: Bring the Extended Annals of Darrowshire to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Defenders of Darrowshire
description: Free 15 Darrowshire Spirits and return to Carlin Redpath.

name: The Flesh Does Not Lie
description: Recover 10 Plagued Flesh Samples from Stratholme and return them to Betina Bigglezink. You suspect that any creature in Stratholme would have said flesh sample.

name: The Active Agent
description: Travel to Stratholme and search the ziggurats. Find and return new Scourge Data to Betina Bigglezink.

name: The Great Fras Siabi
description: Find Fras Siabi's smoke shop in Stratholme and recover a box of Siabi's Premium Tobacco. Return to Smokey LaRue when the job is done.

name: The Scourge Cauldrons
description: Speak with High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Felstone Field
description: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to Chillwind Camp
description: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Target: Dalson's Tears
description: Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to Chillwind Camp
description: Bring the Filled Dalson's Tears Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Target: Writhing Haunt
description: Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to Chillwind Camp
description: Bring the Filled Writhing Haunt Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Gahrron's Withering
description: Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to Chillwind Point
description: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: The Scourge Cauldrons
description: Speak with Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Felstone Field
description: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to the Bulwark
description: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Dalson's Tears
description: Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to the Bulwark
description: Bring the Filled Dalson's Tears Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Writhing Haunt
description: Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to the Bulwark
description: Bring the Filled Writhing Haunt Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at The Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Target: Gahrron's Withering
description: Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

name: Return to the Bulwark
description: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Uncle Carlin
description: Find Carlin Redpath.

name: A Final Blow
description: Kill Moora and Salia, and bring Shadow Lord Fel'dan's Head to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

name: Houses of the Holy
description: Travel to Stratholme, in the north. Search the supply crates that litter the city and recover 5 Stratholme Holy Water. Return to Leonid Barthalomew the Revered when you have collected enough of the blessed fluid.

name: The Ruins of Kel'Theril
description: Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper in Starfall Village.

name: Troubled Spirits of Kel'Theril
description: Use Jaron's Pick to find the four Highborne Relic Fragments. Bring them to Aurora Skycaller in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Fragments of the Past
description: Find the Sacred Highborne Writings in the Temple of Zin-Malor in Azshara, and bring them to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Fragments of the Past
description: Bring an Enchanted Thorium Bar, 5 Crystal Restore, and a Vial of Dire Water to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Tormented By the Past
description: Take the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Lake Kel'Theril in Winterspring and find a highborne spirit that will speak to you.

name: To Winterspring!
description: Find Starfall Village in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

name: Starfall
description: Find Starfall in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

name: The Archivist
description: Travel to Stratholme and find Archivist Galford of the Scarlet Crusade. Destroy him and burn down the Scarlet Archive.

name: Remorseful Highborne
description: Speak with Wynd Nightchaser in Starfall Village, and ask about the proper place for the Crystal of Zin-Malor.

name: The Crystal of Zin-Malor
description: Deliver the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

name: Eagan Peltskinner
description: Speak with Eagan Peltskinner.

name: The Truth Comes Crashing Down
description: Take the Head of Balnazzar to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff in the Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Above and Beyond
description: Venture to Stratholme and destroy Baron Rivendare. Take his head and return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff.

name: Lord Maxwell Tyrosus
description: Speak with Lord Maxwell Tyrosus. He is inside the church.

name: The Argent Hold
description: Open the Argent Hold and claim your reward.

name: The Restless Souls
description: Find Egan. You only know that he was last seen around Stratholme.

name: The Restless Souls
description: Use Egan's Blaster on the ghostly and spectral citizens of Stratholme. When the restless souls break free from their ghostly shells, use the blaster again - freedom will be theirs!$B$BFree 15 Restless Souls and return to Egan.

name: The Art of the Armorsmith
description: To become an Armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Grumnus: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.

name: The Way of the Weaponsmith
description: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Ironus: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.

name: The Art of the Armorsmith
description: To become an armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Okothos: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.

name: The Way of the Weaponsmith
description: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Borgosh: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.

name: Sweet Serenity
description: Travel to Stratholme and kill the Crimson Hammersmith. Recover the Crimson Hammersmith's Apron and return to Lilith.

name: Snakestone of the Shadow Huntress
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Shadow Hunter Vosh'gajin. Recover Vosh'gajin's Snakestone and return to Kilram.

name: Corruption
description: Find the Black Guard Swordsmith in Stratholme and destroy him. Recover the Insignia of the Black Guard and return to Seril Scourgebane.

name: The Sleeper Has Awakened
description: Escort Kerlonian Evershade to Liladris Moonriver at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.

name: Barov Family Fortune
description: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Alexi Barov when you have completed this task.

name: The Last Barov
description: Travel to Chillwind Camp - Alliance territory - and assassinate Weldon Barov. Take his head and return to Alexi Barov.$B$BBe warned, Weldon will probably be well protected by Alliance scum.

name: Barov Family Fortune
description: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Weldon Barov when you have completed this task.

name: The Last Barov
description: Travel to the Bulwark - Horde territory - and assassinate Alexi Barov. Take his head and return to Weldon Barov.$B$BBe warned, Alexi will probably be well protected by Horde filth.

name: Family Tree
description: Deliver Cliffwatcher Longhorn Report to Nataka Longhorn at Ghost Walker Post in Desolace.

name: Hand of Iruxos
description: Retrieve the Demon Box from Thunder Axe Fortress, and return it, along with the Demon Pick to Taiga Wisemane in Shadowprey Village.

name: Doctor Theolen Krastinov, the Butcher
