description: Find Doctor Theolen Krastinov inside the Scholomance. Destroy him, then burn the Remains of Eva Sarkhoff and the Remains of Lucien Sarkhoff. Return to Eva Sarkhoff when the task is complete.

name: Kirtonos the Herald
description: Return to the Scholomance with the Blood of Innocents. Find the porch and place the Blood of Innocents in the brazier. Kirtonos will come to feast upon your soul.$B$BFight valiantly, do not give an inch! Destroy Kirtonos and return to Eva Sarkhoff.

name: The Remains of Trey Lightforge
description: Return the Remains of Trey Lightforge to Jessir Moonbow in Felwood.

name: Catch of the Day
description: Talk to Jinar'Zillen at Shadowprey Village, and then bring Nataka Longhorn 2 Bloodbelly fish.

name: Lazy Peons
description: Use the Foreman's Blackjack on Lazy Peons when they're sleeping.  Wake up 5 peons, then return the Foreman's Blackjack to Foreman Thazz'ril in the Valley of Trials.

name: The Human, Ras Frostwhisper
description: Travel to the Arathi Highlands, to the ruins of Stromgarde. Search Stromgarde for a Keepsake of Remembrance. If you find such an item, return with it to Magistrate Marduke.

name: The Dying, Ras Frostwhisper
description: Travel to Light's Hope in Eastern Plaguelands and seek out Leonid Barthalomew the Revered. Show him the Keepsake of Remembrance and tell him all that you have discovered.

name: Menethil's Gift
description: Travel to Stratholme and find Menethil's Gift. Place the Keepsake of Remembrance upon the unholy ground.

name: Menethil's Gift
description: Take the Soulbound Keepsake to Leonid Barthalomew in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Soulbound Keepsake
description: Return to Magistrate Marduke in Caer Darrow. Show him the Soulbound Keepsake.

name: The Lich, Ras Frostwhisper
description: Find Ras Frostwhisper in the Scholomance. When you have found him, use the Soulbound Keepsake on his undead visage. Should you succeed in reverting him to a mortal, strike him down and recover the Human Head of Ras Frostwhisper. Take the head back to Magistrate Marduke.

name: Gordo's Task
description: Collect 3 Gloom Weed and deliver them to Junior Apothecary Holland in the Brill graveyard.

name: Doom Weed
description: Collect 10 Doom Weed and deliver them back to Junior Apothecary Holland.

name: Bone Collector
description: Bring 10 Kodo Bones from the Kodo Graveyard to Bibbly F'utzbuckle at Kormek's Hut.

name: Mantles of the Dawn
description: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark or Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands or Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Mantles of the Dawn
description: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Mantles of the Dawn
description: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Mold Rhymes With...
description: Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.

name: Krastinov's Bag of Horrors
description: Locate Jandice Barov in the Scholomance and destroy her. From her corpse recover Krastinov's Bag of Horrors. Return the bag to Eva Sarkhoff.

name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
description: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

name: The Gordok Ogre Suit
description: Bring 4 Bolts of Runecloth, 8 Rugged Leather, 2 Rune Threads, and Ogre Tannin to Knot Thimblejack.  He is currently chained inside the Gordok wing of Dire Maul.

name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
description: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: Leonid Barthalomew
description: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Leonid Barthalomew in the Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
description: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark or Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands or Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Shards of the Felvine
description: Find the Felvine in Dire Maul and acquire a shard from it.  Chances are you'll only be able to procure one with the demise of Alzzin the Wildshaper.  Use the Reliquary of Purity to securely seal the shard inside, and return it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: A Reliquary of Purity
description: Travel to Silithus and search for a Reliquary of Purity within the ruins of Southwind Village.  If you are able to find it, return with it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Plagued Hatchlings
description: Kill 20 Plagued Hatchlings, then return to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel.

name: Betina Bigglezink
description: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Betina Bigglezink.

name: Scholomance
description: Speak with Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

name: Kim'jael's "Missing" Equipment
description: Find Some Rune that the naga have in their possession in the Ruins of Eldarath and return it to Kim'jael in Azshara.

name: Spiritual Unrest
description: Destroy 6 Highborne Apparitions and 6 Highborne Lichlings before returning to Loh'atu in Azshara.

name: A Land Filled with Hatred
description: Kill 6 Haldarr Satyr, 2 Haldarr Tricksters, 2 Haldarr Felsworn and then return to Loh'atu on the border of Ashenvale.

name: Skeletal Fragments
description: Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

name: Mold Rhymes With...
description: Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.

name: Ammo for Rumbleshot
description: Bring Rumbleshot's Ammo to Hegnar Rumbleshot in Dun Morogh.

name: Demon Dogs
description: Slay 20 Plaguehound Runts, 5 Plaguehounds and 5 Frenzied Plaguehounds. Return to Tirion Fordring when the task is complete.

name: Blood Tinged Skies
description: Slay 30 Plaguebats and return to Tirion Fordring.

name: Carrion Grubbage
description: Seek out the Carrion Grubs and Devourers of the region. Slay them and harvest their meat. Return to Tirion Fordring when you have gathered 15 Slabs of Carrion Worm Meat.

name: A Bundle of Trouble
description: Bring 8 Bundles of Wood to Raelen at the Eastvale Logging Camp.

name: Kodo Roundup
description: Bring five Tamed Kodos and the Kodo Kombobulator back to Smeed Scrabblescrew at Scrabblescrew's Camp.

name: Portals of the Legion
description: Banish 6 Portals at Mannoroc Coven and return to Taiga Wisemane at Shadowprey Village.

name: Healthy Dragon Scale
description: Bring the Healthy Dragon Scale to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Sister Pamela
description: Find Pamela Redpath in Darrowshire.

name: Garments of the Moon
description: Find Sentinel Shaya and heal her wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant her Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Laurna Morninglight in Dolanaar.

name: In Favor of Elune
description: Speak to Laurna Morninglight in Teldrassil.

name: In Favor of the Light
description: Speak to Priestess Josetta in Elwynn Forest.

name: Garments of the Light
description: Find Guard Roberts and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Priestess Josetta in Goldshire.

name: Garments of the Light
description: Find Mountaineer Dolf and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Maxan Anvol in Kharanos.

name: In Favor of the Light
description: Speak to Maxan Anvol in Dun Morogh.

name: Returning Home
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Returning Home
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Returning Home
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

name: A Lack of Fear
description: Speak to High Priest Rohan in Ironforge.

name: Shadowguard
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Shadowguard
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Devouring Plague
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: A Lack of Fear
description: Speak to High Priest Rohan in Ironforge.

name: Devouring Plague
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Garments of Spirituality
description: Find Grunt Kor'ja and heal her wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant her Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Tai'jin at Razor Hill.

name: In Favor of Spirituality
description: Speak to Tai'jin in Durotar.

name: Garments of Darkness
description: Find Deathguard Kel and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Dark Cleric Beryl in Brill.

name: In Favor of Darkness
description: Speak to Dark Cleric Beryl in Tirisfal Glades.

name: Hex of Weakness
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Hex of Weakness
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Hex of Weakness
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Hex of Weakness
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Hex of Weakness
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Orgrimmar.

name: Touch of Weakness
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Touch of Weakness
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Touch of Weakness
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Touch of Weakness
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Touch of Weakness
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Elune's Grace
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Elune's Grace
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Elune's Grace
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Elune's Grace
description: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

name: Arcane Feedback
description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

name: Arcane Feedback
description: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

name: Devouring Plague
description: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

name: Shadowguard
description: Speak to Ur'kyo in Ogrimmar.

name: One Shot. One Kill.
description: Protect Sentinel Aynasha, then speak with Onaeya at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.

name: The Battle of Darrowshire
description: Place the Relic Bundle at the Darrowshire town square.$B$BPrevent Davil Lightfire's death until the death of Horgus.$B$BPrevent Captain Redpath's death until Redpath the Corrupted appears.$B$BDefeat Redpath the Corrupted.$B$BSpeak with the spirit of Joseph Redpath when he appears at the town square, then speak with Pamela at her home.

name: Searching for the Lost Satchel
description: Search Ragefire Chasm for Maur Grimtotem's corpse and search it for any items of interest.

name: Testing an Enemy's Strength
description: Search Orgrimmar for Ragefire Chasm, then kill 8 Ragefire Troggs and 8 Ragefire Shaman before returning to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

name: Returning the Lost Satchel
description: Take the Grimtotem Satchel to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

name: The Power to Destroy...
description: Bring the books Spells of Shadow and Incantations from the Nether to Varimathras in Undercity.

name: Hidden Enemies
description: Bring a Lieutenant's Insignia to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

name: Hidden Enemies
description: Take the Lieutenant's Insignia to Neeru Fireblade and speak to him. Gauge if he believes you are a member of the Burning Blade and then return to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

name: Hidden Enemies
description: Kill Bazzalan and Jergosh the Invoker before returning to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

name: Hidden Enemies
description: Speak to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

name: Hidden Enemies
description: Speak to Thrall in Orgrimmar and tell him what you've learned.

name: Sceptre of Light
description: Get the Sceptre of Light and then return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.

name: Redemption
description: Listen to what Tirion Fordring has to say.

name: Slaying the Beast
description: Enter Ragefire Chasm and slay Taragaman the Hungerer, then bring his heart back to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

name: Hemet Nesingwary
description: Take Kravel's Crate to Hemet Nesingwary in Stranglethorn.

name: Hunting in Stranglethorn
description: Bring Roon's Kodo Horn to Hemet Nesingwary in Stranglethorn.

name: Of Forgotten Memories
description: Travel to the Undercroft - at the southernmost section of the Eastern Plaguelands - and recover Taelan's Hammer. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

name: Fire Plume Forged
description: Take the Skeleton Key Mold and 2 Thorium Bars to the top of Fire Plume Ridge in Un'Goro Crater.  Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

name: Fire Plume Forged
description: Take the Skeleton Key Mold and 2 Thorium Bars to the top of Fire Plume Ridge in Un'Goro Crater.  Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Araj's Scarab
description: Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

name: Araj's Scarab
description: Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Northshire Gift Voucher to Merissa Stilwell.

name: Bodyguard for Hire
description: Escort the Gizelton Caravan past the Kolkar Centaur village. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Coldridge Valley Gift Voucher to Yori Crackhelm.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Shadowglen Gift Voucher to Orenthil Whisperwind.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Valley of Trials Gift Voucher to Magga.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Camp Narache Gift Voucher to Vorn Skyseer.

name: Of Lost Honor
description: Travel to Northdale, in the northeastern region of the Eastern Plaguelands, and recover the Symbol of Lost Honor. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

name: Of Love and Family
description: Travel to island of Caer Darrow, in the south-central region of the Plaguelands, and look for any clues as to the whereabouts of the painting.

name: Welcome!
description: Bring the Deathknell Gift Voucher to Claire Willower in Deathknell.

name: Of Love and Family
description: Travel to Stratholme, in the northern part of the Plaguelands. It is in the Scarlet Bastion that you will find the painting 'Of Love and Family,' hidden behind another painting depicting the twin moons of our world.$B$BReturn the painting to Tirion Fordring.

name: Find Myranda
description: Travel to Uther's Tomb, located in the southern Plaguelands. Show Myranda the Hag Tirion's Gift.

name: Scarlet Subterfuge
description: Speak to Myranda to gain the Scarlet Illusion. Travel to Hearthglen while under the Scarlet Illusion and deliver Tirion's Gift to Highlord Taelan Fordring.$B$BHearthglen is to the north, Taelan should be inside of Mardenholde Keep.

name: The Dunemaul Compound
description: Andi Lynn in Gadgetzan wants you to destroy the Dunemaul Compound by killing 10 Dunemaul Brutes, 10 Dunemaul Enforcers, and Gor'marok the Ravager.

name: Calling in the Reserves
description: Maggran wishes you to deliver a letter to Grish Longrunner at the Great Lift in the Barrens.

name: Irondeep Supplies
description: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

name: Coldtooth Supplies
description: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Horde Quatermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Nathaniel Dumah at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.

name: Moonglade
description: Use the spell "Teleport: Moonglade" to travel to Moonglade.  When you arrive, speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

name: Moonglade
description: Use the spell "Teleport: Moonglade" to travel to Moonglade.  When you arrive, speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

name: Heeding the Call
description: Speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

name: Great Bear Spirit
description: Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Great Bear Spirit
description: Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Back to Darnassus
description: Return to Darnassus and speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave.

name: Back to Thunder Bluff
description: Return to Thunder Bluff and speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise.

name: Return to Chromie
description: Take the Bundle of Relics to Chromie in Andorhal.

name: Hidden Treasures
description: Bring Joseph's Key to Joseph's Chest.

name: Gizelton Caravan
description: Escort the Gizelton Caravan through Mannoroc Coven. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.

name: In Dreams
description: Escort Taelan Fordring out of Hearthglen.

name: The Champion of the Banshee Queen
description: Speak with Nathanos Blightcaller in the Eastern Plaguelands. He is said to have taken up residence at the Marris Stead.

name: Rampaging Giants
description: Rivern Frostwind wants you to kill 4 Frostmaul Giants and 4 Frostmaul Preservers.

name: Body and Heart
description: Use the Cenarion Moondust on the Moonkin Stone of Auberdine to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus when you are done.

name: Body and Heart
description: Use the Cenarion Lunardust on the Moonkin Stone between Mulgore and the Barrens to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Turak Runetotem in Thunder Bluff when you are done.

name: Unfinished Business
description: Kill 2 Scarlet Medics, 2 Scarlet Hunters, 2 Scarlet Magi and 2 Scarlet Knights before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

name: Zaeldarr the Outcast
description: Bring Zaeldarr's Head to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel.

name: To Kill With Purpose
description: Travel to Corin's Crossing to the east and slaughter the Scourge that inhabit the town. Collect 7 pieces of Living Rot in under 10 minutes. Use the Mortar and Pestle to grind the Living Rot into Coagulated Rot.

name: Unfinished Business
description: Kill Huntsman Radley and Cavalier Durgen before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

name: Hameya's Plea
description: Kill Infiltrator Hameya.  Use his key on the Mound of Dirt behind the Undercroft.

name: Unfinished Business
description: Enter Hearthglen and find a high vantage point from which you can see the town and gauge the Scarlet Crusade's forces, then return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

name: That's Asking A Lot
description: Smokey LaRue wants you to get 2 Thorium Bars, 1 Golden Rod, 8 Hi-Explosive Bombs, and 8 Unstable Triggers.$B$BYou will have to find a blacksmith and an engineer for these items.

name: Book of the Ancients
description: Get the Book of the Ancients and return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.

name: The Everlook Report
description: Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Pureheart at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

name: The Everlook Report
description: Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Garush at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

name: Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
description: Deliver the book, "Studies in Spirit Speaking", to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Runecloth
description: Bring 30 Runecloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

name: Sacred Cloth
description: Bring 2 Mooncloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

name: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
description: Travel to Plaguewood, northwest of Light's Hope. Destroy 8 Scourge Structures by using Smokey's Special Compound at the Mark of Detonation planted inside each building. Smokey has had the Ziggurats and Slaughterhouses marked.$B$BOnce you plant the bomb, leave the building and marvel at your handiwork.$B$BBy the way, Smokey's Special Compound is rather... unstable.

name: Un-Life's Little Annoyances
description: Slay 20 Noxious Plaguebats and 10 Monstrous Plaguebats. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when you are finished.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Adult Plainstrider. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Dire Mottled Boar. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Thotar in Razor Hill.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Webwood Lurker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Large Crag Boar. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Thotar at Razor Hill.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Thotar at Razor Hill.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Thotar at Razor Hill.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: Training the Beast
description: Speak with Ormak Grimshot in Orgrimmar.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Armored Scorpid. Practice your skills, then return to Thotar at Razor Hill.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Surf Crawler. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Thotar at Razor Hill.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Snow Leopard. Practice your skills, then return to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Ice Claw Bear. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

name: Training the Beast
description: Speak with Belia Thundergranite in Ironforge.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Prairie Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Swoop. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

name: Training the Beast
description: Speak with Holt Thunderhorn on Hunter Rise in Thunder Bluff.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Nightsaber Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: Taming the Beast
description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Strigid Screecher. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: Training the Beast
description: Speak to Jocaste in the Cenarion Enclave, in Darnassus.

name: Lessons Anew
description: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

name: The Principal Source
description: Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler to draw a sample of water from the mouth of the cave by the falls.$B$BDeliver the Filled Cliffspring Falls Sampler to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine, Darkshore.

name: Gathering the Cure
description: Bring 5 Earthroot and 12 Lunar Funguses to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine so she may make a curative salve.

name: Curing the Sick
description: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Deer that are located throughout Darkshore; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Deer have been reported starting south of the Cliffspring River to the north of Auberdine and extending all the way into southern Darkshore where the edge of Ashenvale begins.

name: Power over Poison
description: Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

name: Lessons Anew
description: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

name: The Principal Source
description: Use the Empty Dreadmist Peak Sampler to draw a sample of water from a pool at the top of the peak.$B$BDeliver the Filled Dreadmist Peak Sampler to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads, Barrens.

name: Gathering the Cure
description: Bring 5 Earthroot and 5 Kodo Horns to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads so he may make a curative salve.

name: Curing the Sick
description: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Gazelles that are located throughout the northern part of the Barrens; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Gazelles have been reported north of the east-west road that runs through the Crossroads.

name: Power over Poison
description: Return to Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise, Thunder Bluff.

name: Get Me Out of Here!
description: Escort Melizza Brimbuzzle, then speak with Hornizz Brimbuzzle at the Kodo Graveyard in Desolace.

name: The Ranger Lord's Behest
description: Travel to the northern borders of the Eastern Plaguelands and recover the Quel'Thalas Registry. The item is somewhere in the Quel'Lithien lodge.$B$BYou must also slay 8 Rangers, 8 Pathstriders, and 8 Woodsmen.

name: Ghost-o-plasm Round Up
description: Bring 8 Ghost-o-plasms and the Crate of Ghost Magnets to Hornizz Brimbuzzle in Desolace.

name: Duskwing, Oh How I Hate Thee...
description: Find Duskwing and slay him. From the corpse, recover a Patch of Duskwing's Fur and return it to Nathanos Blightcaller.$B$BIt is said that Duskwing roams the countryside to the north of Marris Stead.

name: The Corpulent One
description: Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when the mission is complete.

name: Brother Anton
description: Speak with Brother Anton in Desolace.

name: Clam Bait
description: Find 10 pieces of Soft-shelled Clam Meat and bring it back to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village.

name: Other Fish to Fry
description: Slay 7 Slitherblade Myrmidon, 7 Slitherblade Naga, and 5 Slitherblade Sorceresses, and then talk to Drulzegar at Shadowprey in Desolace.

name: The Call to Command
description: Travel to the Undercity and speak with Varimathras.

name: The Crimson Courier
description: Return to Eastern Plaguelands and track down the Crimson Courier. Kill the Courier and recover the Grand Crusader's Command.$B$BTake the command to Nathanos Blightcaller for further instruction.

name: Nathanos' Ruse
description: Travel to Tyr's Hand, southeast of the Marris Stead. Once there, take a bite of the Rotten Apple. While under the guise of the Scarlet Crusade, deliver the Grand Crusader's Command to Crusader Lord Valdelmar.

name: Return to Nathanos
description: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller with the new information.

name: The Scarlet Oracle, Demetria
description: The Scarlet Crusade is on the move. Somewhere along the road from Tyr's Hand to Stratholme you will find the Oracle, Demetria, and her entourage. Hunt her down and slay her. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller should you succeed.

name: Claim Rackmore's Treasure!
description: Find Rackmore's Silver Key.  Find Rackmore's Golden Key.  Find and open Rackmore's Chest.

name: A Husband's Last Battle
description: Kill Overlord Ror and return his claw to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post in Felwood.

name: Ramstein
description: Travel to Stratholme and slay Ramstein the Gorger. Take his head as a souvenir for Nathanos.

name: Augustus' Receipt Book
description: Bring Augustus' Receipt Book to Augustus the Touched in Terrordale.

name: A Swift Message
description: Bring Lewis' Note to Thor the gryphon master.

name: The First and the Last
description: Speak with Mathias Shaw in Old Town Stormwind. He resides in the Barracks.

name: Honor the Dead
description: Speak with Mathias Shaw again if you wish to accept his task.

name: Flint Shadowmore
description: Travel to Chillwind Camp in the Western Plaguelands and meet up with your contact, Flint Shadowmore.

name: The Eastern Plagues
description: Scour the Eastern Plaguelands for clues as to the "Blightcaller" and the missing SI:7 agents. If you find any SI:7 Insignias, return them to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp.

name: The Blightcaller Cometh
description: Return to Stormwind and inform Highlord Bolvar Fordragon of the fate of Nathanos Marris.

name: Order Must Be Restored
description: Assemble an army and travel to the Eastern Plaguelands. Launch a full assault on Nathanos Blightcaller and any Horde filth that may attempt to protect him.$B$BKeep your wits about you, $N. The Horde will defend the ranger lord with their very lives.

name: Timbermaw Ally
description: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 5 Deadwood Warriors, 5 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 5 Deadwood Gardeners.

name: Dungar Longdrink
description: Bring Osric's Crate to Dungar Longdrink the gryphon master.

name: Continue to Stormwind
description: Buy a gryphon ride from the gryphon master Thor, then bring Lewis' Note to Osric Strang, in the shop Limited Immunity, in the Old Town of Stormwind.

name: Harpies Threaten
description: Maggran Earthbinder in Sun Rock Retreat wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

name: Bloodfury Bloodline
description: Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat wishes you to slay Bloodfury Ripper and bring her remains as proof of your deed.

name: Arachnophobia
description: Kill Besseleth and bring Besseleth's Fang to Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat.

name: Return to Lewis
description: Buy a gryphon ride to Sentinel Hill from the gryphon master Dungar Longdrink, then take Osric's Crate to Lewis at Sentinel Hill.

name: Cycle of Rebirth
description: Tammra Windfield at Sun Rock Retreat wants you to gather 10 Gaea Seeds.

name: Supplying the Sepulcher
description: Bring Podrig's Order to Karos Razok.

name: Michael Garrett
description: Bring Gordon's Crate to Michael Garrett.

name: Ride to the Undercity
description: Buy a bat ride to the Undercity from the bat master Karos Razok, then take Podrig's Order to Gordon Wendham in the Undercity.

name: Return to Podrig
description: Buy a bat ride to the Sepulcher from the bat master Michael Garrett, then bring Gordon's Crate to Deathguard Podrig in the Sepulcher.

name: The Bounty of Teldrassil
description: Bring Nessa's Collection to Vesprystus.

name: Flight to Auberdine
description: Ride a hippogryph to Auberdine from the hippogryph master Vesprystus, then bring Nessa's Collection to Laird.

name: Return to Nessa
description: Bring Laird's Response to Nessa Shadowsong.

name: Nessa Shadowsong
description: Speak with Nessa Shadowsong.

name: A Bundle of Hides
description: Bring the Bundle of Hides to the wind rider master Devrak in the Crossroads.

name: Ride to Thunder Bluff
description: Buy a wind rider to Thunder Bluff from the wind rider master Devrak, then bring the Bundle of Hides to Ahanu in Thunder Bluff.

name: Tal the Wind Rider Master
description: Bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Tal in Thunder Bluff.

name: Return to Jahan
description: Buy a wind rider to the Crossroads from the wind rider master Tal, then bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Jahan Hawkwing.

name: Meats to Orgrimmar
description: Bring Zargh's Meats to Devrak in the Crossroads.

name: New Life
description: Plant 10 Gaea Seeds in Gaea Dirt Mounds, and then return the remaining Enchanted Gaea Seeds to Tammra at Sun Rock Retreat.

name: The Ashenvale Hunt
description: Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

name: Ride to Orgrimmar
description: Buy a wind rider to Orgrimmar from the wind rider master Devrak, then bring Zargh's Meats to Gryshka in Orgrimmar.

name: Doras the Wind Rider Master
description: Bring Gryshka's Letter to Doras in Orgrimmar.

name: Return to the Crossroads.
description: Buy a wind rider to the Crossroads from the wind rider master Doras, then bring Gryshka's Letter to Zargh at the Crossroads.

name: Honor Students
description: Bring Brock's List to Thorgrum Borrelson in Thelsamar.

name: Gryth Thurden
description: Bring the Honorary Picks to Gryth Thurden in Ironforge.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Release the Plagueland Termites in the Northridge Lumber Mill, then return with the Barrel of Plagueland Termites to Nathaniel Dumah at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

name: A Plague Upon Thee
description: Release the Plagueland Termites in the Northridge Lumber Mill, then return with the Barrel of Plagueland Termites to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

name: Ride to Ironforge
description: Buy a gryphon to Ironforge from the gryphon master Thorgrum Borrelson, then bring Brock's List to Golnir Bouldertoe in Ironforge.

name: Return to Brock
description: Buy a gryphon to Thelsamar from the gryphon master Gryth Thurden, then bring the Honorary Picks to Brock Stoneseeker in Thelsamar.

name: Elemental War
description: Bring 10 Incendrites to Tsunaman at Sun Rock Retreat.

name: Thazz'ril's Pick
description: Bring Thazz'ril's Pick to Foreman Thazz'ril.

name: Marla's Last Wish
description: Bring Samuel Fipps' Remains to Marla's Grave, then return to Novice Elreth.

name: Kaya's Alive
description: Tell Tammra Windfield in Sun Rock Retreat the good news.

name: Stormwind Rendezvous
description: Travel to Stormwind City and venture to the city gates. Speak with Squire Rowe so that he may let Marshal Windsor know that you have arrived.

name: The Great Masquerade
description: Follow Reginald Windsor through Stormwind. Protect him from harm!

name: Boulderslide Ravine
description: Explore deep into the cave at Boulderslide Ravine and bring back 10 Resonite Crystals for Mor'rogal at Sun Rock Retreat to investigate.

name: Satyr Horns
description: Collect 16 Satyr Horns for Pixel in Splintertree Post.

name: Naga at the Zoram Strand
description: Bring 20 Wrathtail Heads to Marukai along the Zoram Strand.

name: Blood Feeders
description: Xen'zilla at Malaka'Jin needs you to kill 10 Deepmoss Creepers and 7 Deepmoss Venomspitters.

name: The Darkreaver Menace
description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.

name: Troll Charm
description: Bring 8 Troll Charms to Mitsuwa at the Zoram'gar Outpost.

name: Earthen Arise
description: Open the Resonite cask with the Enchanted Resonite Crystal, and then slay Goggeroc. Return to Mor'rogal with the news and Enchanted Resonite Crystal.

name: Freedom to Ruul
description: Escort Ruul, then speak with Yama Snowhoof in Splintertree Post.

name: The Dragon's Eye
description: You must search the world for a being capable of restoring the power to the Fragment of the Dragon's Eye. The only information you possess about such a being is that they exist.

name: Drakefire Amulet
description: You must retrieve the Blood of the Black Dragon Champion from General Drakkisath. Drakkisath can be found in his throne room behind the Halls of Ascension in Blackrock Spire.

conditions.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

name: Ashenvale Outrunners
description: Kill 9 Ashenvale Outrunners, then return to Kuray'bin at Splintertree Outpost.

name: The Lost Pages
description: Find the 12 missing pages of the Shredder Operating Manual, and put them together to form Chapters 1, 2, and 3. Return the pages to Gurda Ragescar near Splintertree Post.

name: An Unholy Alliance
description: Bring Ambassador Malcin's Head to Varimathras in the Undercity.

name: An Unholy Alliance
description: Take the Small Scroll to Varimathras in the Undercity.

name: Protect Kaya
description: Escort Kaya Flathoof to Camp Aparaje, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

name: Report to Kadrak
description: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

name: Report to Kadrak
description: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

name: The Warsong Reports
description: Open the Bundle of Reports.  Take the Warsong Reports to the Warsong Scout, Warsong Runner, and Warsong Outrider. Bring back the updates they give you to Kadrak at the northern watch tower in the barrens.

name: Torek's Assault
description: Escort Torek on his attack against Silverwing Outpost and Duriel Moonfire, then report to Ertog Ragetusk at Splintertree Post.

name: Avenge My Village
description: Kill 8 Grimtotem Ruffians and 6 Grimtotem Mercenaries, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

name: Blackfathom Villainy
description: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

name: Trouble in the Deeps
description: Speak to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

name: The Essence of Aku'Mai
description: Bring 20 Sapphires of Aku'Mai to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
description: Bring the Damp Note to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
description: Kill Lorgus Jett in Blackfathom Deeps and then return to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

name: What the Wind Carries
description: Listen to Thrall.

name: The Champion of the Horde
description: Seek out Rexxar. The Warchief has instructed you as to his whereabouts. Search the paths of Desolace, between the Stonetalon Mountains and Feralas.

name: The Testament of Rexxar
description: Deliver Rexxar's Testament to Myranda the Hag in the Western Plaguelands.

name: Oculus Illusions
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 20 Black Dragonspawn Eyes. Return to Myranda the Hag when the task is complete.

name: Emberstrife
description: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh and seek out Emberstrife's Den. Once inside, wear the Amulet of Draconic Subversion and speak with Emberstrife.

name: Warsong Supplies
description: Collect the Warsong Supplies: Warsong Saw Blades, Logging Rope, Warsong Oil, and the Warsong Axe Shipment for Locke Okarr in Splintertree Post.

name: The Test of Skulls, Scryer
description: You must find the blue dragonflight drake champion, Scryer, and slay him. Pry his skull from his corpse and return it to Emberstrife.$B$BYou know that Scryer can be found in Winterspring.

name: The Test of Skulls, Somnus
description: Destroy the drake champion of the Green Flight, Somnus. Take his skull and return it to Emberstrife.

name: The Test of Skulls, Chronalis
description: Guarding the Caverns of Time in the Tanaris Desert is Chronalis, child of Nozdormu. Destroy him and return his skull to Emberstrife.

name: The Test of Skulls, Axtroz
description: Travel to Grim Batol and track down Axtroz, drake champion of the Red Flight. Destroy him and take his skull. Return the skull to Emberstrife.

name: Ascension...
description: It would appear as if the charade is over. You know that the Amulet of Draconic Subversion that Myranda the Hag created for you will not function inside Blackrock Spire. Perhaps you should find Rexxar and explain your predicament. Show him the Dull Drakefire Amulet. Hopefully he will know what to do next.

name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion
description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay General Drakkisath. Gather his blood and return it to Rexxar.

conditions.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

name: Trouble in Winterspring!
description: Find Donova Snowden near the hot springs in Winterspring.

name: Enraged Wildkin
description: Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper at Starfall Village.

name: A Strange One
description: Speak with Winna Hazzard in Felwood.

name: A Little Luck
description: Speak with Witch Doctor Mau'ari in Everlook.

name: Nat Pagle, Angler Extreme
description: Nat Pagle wants you to catch the following fish:$B$BMisty Reed Mahi Mahi from the Misty Reed Strand in the Swamp of Sorrows.$B$BA Sar'theris Striker from the Sar'theris Strand in Desolace.$B$BFeralas Ahi from the Verdantis River of Feralas.$B$BSavage Coast Blue Sailfin from the Savage Coast of Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BReturn to Nat Pagle when you have reeled them all in!

name: You Too Good!
description: You think Lumak is trying to tell you that he can no longer help you improve your fishing skill. You may want to try to find his friend, Nat Pagle, a human fishing off one of the islands south of Theramore (at least that's what you think Lumak said).

name: I Got Nothin' Left!
description: Travel to Kalimdor, to the coastal city of Theramore. From there you must search for an island, south of the main town. Nat Pagle awaits your arrival!

name: Clamlette Surprise
description: Dirge Quikcleave wants you to get the following items:$B$B12 Giant Eggs. You will find those on the Rocs wandering Tanaris or any other species of large bird.$B$B10 pieces of Zesty Clam Meat. You can find those in clams, naturally!$B$B20 pieces of Alterac Swiss. Get thee to a cheesery!$B$BGather all of the items and return to Dirge.

name: To Gadgetzan You Go!
description: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

name: I Know A Guy...
description: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

name: King of the Foulweald
description: Place Karang's Banner on the Foulweald Totem Mound.  Do not let the furbolgs destroy the banner.  Defeat Chief Murgut and bring Murgut's Totem to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar.

name: Alliance Trauma
description: Travel to Theramore in the Dustwallow Marsh and speak with Doctor Gustaf VanHowzen about joining the ranks of Alliance Trauma.

name: Triage
description: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

name: Horde Trauma
description: Travel to Hammerfall in the Arathi Highlands and speak with Doctor Gregory Victor about joining the ranks of Horde Trauma.

name: Triage
description: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

name: A Host of Evil
description: Kill 8 Razorfen Battleguard, 8 Razorfen Thornweavers, and 8 Death's Head Cultists and return to Myriam Moonsinger near the entrance to Razorfen Downs.

name: Test of Lore
description: Answer Braug Dimspirit's question successfully and then speak to him again. He will remain in Stonetalon Mountains when you are ready.

name: Test of Lore
description: Answer Parqual Fintallas' question successfully and then speak to him again. He will remain in the Undercity until you are ready.

name: Kill Grundig Darkcloud
description: Kill Grundig Darkcloud and 6 Grimtotem Brutes, and return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

name: Vorsha the Lasher
description: Keep Muglash safe as he travels to the brazier. Help him by putting the brazier out, then protect him as you fight against the Naga.$B$BIf you are successful, return to the Zoram'gar Outpost and inform the Warsong Runner of the death of Vorsha the Lasher.

name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Dark Iron Ore
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery Core
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Lava Core
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core Leather
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Blood of the Mountain
Deeprun Rat Roundup
description: Capture 5 Deeprun Rats by using the Rat Catcher's Flute. Lead the rats back to Monty. Don't forget to turn in the flute when you're finished.

name: Me Brother, Nipsy
description: Take the Carton of Mystery Meat to Nipsy at the Stormwind Deeprun Tram Depot.

name: The Manor, Ravenholdt
description: Take the Seal of Ravenholdt to Fahrad at Ravenholdt Manor, hidden away in the hills of Hillsbrad.$B$BYour cunning will be tested along the way. Be prepared.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Speak with Dazalar in Dolanaar.

name: The New Frontier
description: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus.

name: Rabine Saturna
description: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.  Moonglade lies between Felwood and Winterspring, accessible through a path out of Timbermaw Hold.

name: Poisoned Water
description: Use the Aspect of Neptulon on poisoned elementals of Eastern Plaguelands.  Bring 12 Discordant Bracers and the Aspect of Neptulon to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: Stormers and Rumblers
description: Kill 15 Dust Stormers and 15 Desert Rumblers and then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: Eye of the Emberseer
description: Bring the Eye of the Emberseer to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: The Molten Core
description: Kill 1 Fire Lord, 1 Molten Giant, 1 Ancient Core Hound and 1 Lava Surger, then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: Agent of Hydraxis
description: Earn an Honored faction with the Hydraxian Waterlords, then talk to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: Hands of the Enemy
description: Bring the Hands of Lucifron, Sulfuron, Gehennas and Shazzrah to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

name: Umber, Archivist
description: Take the Encrusted Silithid Object to Umber - the Cenarion Circle's archivist - in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Uncovering Past Secrets
description: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
description: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
description: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

name: Amongst the Ruins
description: Bring the Fathom Core to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: Baron Aquanis
description: Bring the Strange Water Globe to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

name: Great-father Winter is Here!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

name: Treats for Great-father Winter
description: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Orgrimmar.

name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
description: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Reason for the Season
description: Speak with Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom of Orgrimmar about the Feast of Winter Veil.

name: The Glowing Shard
description: Travel to Ratchet to find someone that can tell you more about the glowing shard.$B$BThen, deliver the shard as you are directed.

name: Coldtooth Supplies
description: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

name: You're a Mean One...
description: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
description: Speak with Great-father Winter in Orgrimmar.

name: Irondeep Supplies
description: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Horde Quartermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

name: Empty Stables
description: Locate a Frostwolf in Alterac Valley. Use the Frostwolf Muzzle when you are near the Frostwolf to 'tame' the beast. Once tamed, the Frostwolf will follow you back to the Frostwolf Stable Master. Speak with the Frostwolf Stable Master to earn credit for the capture.

name: Ram Hide Harnesses
description: null

name: Zapped Giants
description: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 15 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

name: Great-father Winter is Here!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

name: Great-father Winter is Here!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

name: Treats for Greatfather Winter
description: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

name: Ram Riding Harnesses
description: null

name: Empty Stables
description: Locate an Alterac Ram in Alterac Valley. Use the Stormpike Training Collar when you are near the Alterac Ram to 'tame' the beast. Once tamed, the Alterac Ram will follow you back to the Stable Master. Speak with the Stable Master to earn credit for the capture.

name: Twisted Evils
description: Collect 15 Theradric Crystal Carvings for Willow in Desolace.

name: Vyletongue Corruption
description: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Vark Battlescar in Shadowprey Village.

name: Vyletongue Corruption
description: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Talendria in Nijel's Point.

name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
description: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

name: You're a Mean One...
description: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Wulmort Jinglepocket in Ironforge.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

name: Legends of Maraudon
description: Recover the two parts of the Scepter of Celebras: the Celebrian Rod and the Celebrian Diamond.$B$BFind a way to speak with Celebras.

name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

name: The Scepter of Celebras
description: Assist Celebras the Redeemed while he creates the Scepter of Celebras.$B$BSpeak with him when the ritual is complete.

name: The Feast of Winter Veil
description: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.

name: The Reason for the Season
description: Speak with Historian Karnik at the Explorer's League in Ironforge about the Feast of Winter Veil.

name: The Feast of Winter Veil
description: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
description: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Selendra near Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
description: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Keeper Marandis at Nijel's Point in Desolace.

name: Seed of Life
description: Seek out Remulos in Moonglade and give him the Seed of Life.

name: The Pariah's Instructions
description: Read the Pariah's Instructions. Afterwards, obtain the Amulet of Union from Maraudon and return it to the Centaur Pariah in southern Desolace.

name: Shadowshard Fragments
description: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Uthel'nay in Orgrimmar.

name: Shadowshard Fragments
description: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Archmage Tervosh in Theramore on the coast of Dustwallow Marsh.

name: Alterac Valley Graveyards
description: Assault a graveyard, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Graveyards of Alterac
description: Assault a graveyard, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

name: Towers and Bunkers
description: Capture an enemy tower, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

name: Towers and Bunkers
description: Destroy the banner at an enemy tower or bunker, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Quartermaster
description: Speak with the Stormpike Quartermaster.

name: Capture a Mine
description: Capture a mine that the Stormpike does not control, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

name: Speak with our Quartermaster
description: Speak with the Frostwolf Quartermaster.

name: Capture a Mine
description: Capture a mine, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Battle of Alterac
description: Enter Alterac Valley, defeat the Horde general Drek'thar, and then return to Prospector Stonehewer in the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Battle for Alterac
description: Enter Alterac Valley and defeat the dwarven general, Vanndar Stormpike.  Then, return to Voggah Deathgrip in the Alterac Mountains.

name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: The Last Element
description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 10 Essence of the Elements. Your first inclination is to search the golems and golem makers. You remember Vivian Lagrave also muttering something about elementals.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Armor Scraps
description: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Murgot Deepforge in Dun Baldar.

name: Enemy Booty
description: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Smith Regzar in Frostwolf Village.

name: In Defense of Frostwolf
description: Venture to Alterac Valley, located in the Alterac Mountains. Find and speak with Warmaster Laggrond - who stands outside the tunnel entrance - to begin your career as a soldier of Frostwolf. You will find Alterac Valley north of Tarren Mill at the base of the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Sovereign Imperative
description: Travel to Alterac Valley in the Hillsbrad Foothills. Outside of the entrance tunnel, find and speak with Lieutenant Haggerdin.$B$BFor the glory of Bronzebeard!

name: Brotherly Love
description: Travel into Stormpike territory and slay Commander Karl Philips. Return to Commander Louis Philips when the task is complete.

name: Brotherly Love
description: Travel into Frostwolf territory and slay Commander Louis Philips. Return to Commander Karl Philips when the task is complete.

name: Fallen Sky Lords
description: Travel to Frostwolf territory and search for Wing Commander Slidore, Wing Commander Vipore, and Wing Commander Ichman. Return to Commander Duffy should you complete your mission.

name: Fallen Sky Lords
description: Find out what became of Wing Commander Guse, Wing Commander Jeztor, and Wing Commander Mulverick. Return to Commander Mulfort should you complete your mission.

name: Soothing Turtle Bisque
description: Bring 10 pieces of Turtle Meat and some Soothing Spices to Christoph Jeffcoat in Tarren Mill.

name: Favor Amongst the Darkspear
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing night elf players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a night elf and return to Najak Hexxen at Frostwolf Keep with a Severed Night Elf Head.

name: Ally of the Tauren
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing gnome players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a gnome and return to Ravak Grimtotem at Frostwolf Keep with a Tuft of Gnome Hair.

name: The Human Condition
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing human players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a human and return to Commander Louis Philips (who wanders between the front lines and Frostwolf keep) with a  Human Bone Chip.$B$BA cure for the human condition is close at hand!

name: Gnomeregan Bounty
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing tauren players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a tauren and return to Dirk Swindle at Dun'Baldar with a  Tauren Hoof.

name: Staghelm's Requiem
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing troll players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a troll and return to Athramanis at Dun'Baldar with Darkspear Troll Mojo.

name: The Archbishop's Mercy
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Forsaken players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a Forsaken and return to Commander Karl Philips (who wanders between the lumber mill and the mine) with a Forsaken Heart.

name: Defusing the Threat
description: Find the Frostwolf Explosives Expert and kill him. Return to the Stormpike Explosives Expert when the task is complete.

name: Defusing the Threat
description: Find the Stormpike Explosives Expert and kill him. Return to the Frostwolf Explosives Expert when the task is complete.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Claiming Arathi Basin
description: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: A Gallon of Blood
description: null

name: Crystal Cluster
description: null

name: Wanted: DWARVES!
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Dwarf players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a Dwarf and rip out their spine. Take the Dwarf Spine to Sergeant Yazra Bloodsnarl at Frostwolf Keep.

name: Wanted: ORCS!
description: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Orc players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill an Orc and take their Orc Tooth back to Corporal Noreg Stormpike at Dun Baldar.

name: I've Got A Fever For More Bone Chips
Pusillin and the Elder Azj'Tordin
description: Travel to Dire Maul and locate the Imp, Pusillin. Convince Pusillin to give you Azj'Tordin's Book of Incantations through any means necessary.$B$BReturn to Azj'Tordin at the Lariss Pavilion in Feralas should you recover the Book of Incantations.

name: The Madness Within
description: You must destroy the guardians surrounding the 5 Pylons that power the Prison of Immol'thar. Once the Pylons have powered down, the force field surrounding Immol'thar will have dissipated.$B$BEnter the Prison of Immol'thar and eradicate the foul demon that stands at its heart. Finally, confront Prince Tortheldrin in Athenaeum.$B$BReturn to the Shen'dralar Ancient in the courtyard should you complete this quest.

name: The Treasure of the Shen'dralar
description: Return to the Athenaeum and find the Treasure of the Shen'dralar. Claim your reward!

name: Arcane Refreshment
description: Travel to the Warpwood Quarter of Dire Maul and slay the water elemental, Hydrospawn. Return to Lorekeeper Lydros in the Athenaeum with the Hydrospawn Essence.

name: Elven Legends
description: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Sage Korolusk at Camp Mojache with whatever information that you may find.

name: Elven Legends
description: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Scholar Runethorn at Feathermoon with whatever information that you may find.

name: Libram of Rapidity
description: Bring a Libram of Rapidity, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Blood of Heroes to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Rapidity.

name: Libram of Focus
description: Bring a Libram of Focus, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 4 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Skin of Shadow to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Focus.

name: Libram of Protection
description: Bring a Libram of Protection, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 1 Frayed Abomination Stitching to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Protection.

name: A Hero's Reward
description: Claim your reward from Hydraxis' Coffer.

name: Attunement to the Core
description: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

name: Lethtendris's Web
description: Bring Lethtendris' Web to Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.

name: Lethtendris's Web
description: Bring Lethtendris's Web to Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas.

name: Victory for the Horde
description: Take the Head of Onyxia to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

name: For All To See
description: Seek out Overlord Runthak in the Valley of Strength.

name: Camp Mojache
description: Speak with Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas.

name: Feathermoon Stronghold
description: Speak with Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.

name: Victory for the Alliance
description: Take the Head of Onyxia to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

name: Celebrating Good Times
description: Seek out Major Mattingly in the Valley of Heroes.

name: The Emerald Dream...
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Frost Shock and You
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Holy Bologna: What the Light Won't Tell You
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

conditions.name: Holy Bologna: What the Light Won't Tell You

name: The Greatest Race of Hunters
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Harnessing Shadows
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: The Light and How To Swing It
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

conditions.name: The Light and How to Swing It

name: The Arcanist's Cookbook
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Codex of Defense
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Garona: A Study on Stealth and Treachery
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

conditions.name: Garona: A Study on Stealth and Treachery

name: Foror's Compendium
description: Return Foror's Compendium of Dragon Slaying to the Athenaeum.

name: The Forging of Quel'Serrar
description: Give the Dull and Flat Elven Blade to Lorekeeper Lydros.

conditions.name: A Dull and Flat Elven Blade

name: The Forging of Quel'Serrar
description: You must get Onyxia to breathe fire on the Unfired Ancient Blade. Once this is done, pick up the now Heated Ancient Blade. Be warned, a Heated Ancient Blade will not remain heated forever - time is of the essence.$B$BThe last step before returning to me is to slay the beast and drive the Heated Ancient Blade into her corpse.$B$BDo this and Quel'Serrar will be yours.

name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
description: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Wind Seeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian.

name: Mor'zul Bloodbringer
description: Speak with Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

name: Rage of Blood
description: Bring 30 bottles of Raging Beast's Blood to Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

name: Wildeyes
description: Bring the Case of Blood to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

name: The Prison's Bindings
description: Travel to Dire Maul in Feralas and recover 15 Satyr Blood from the Wildspawn Satyr that inhabit the Warpwood Quarter. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when this is done.

name: The Prison's Casing
description: Travel to Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring and recover 5 Tears of the Hederine from the Hederine demons that occupy the gorge. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when you have completed this task.

name: Suppression
description: Venture forth into the Tainted Scar and locate a Doomguard Commander.$B$BUse the Glowing Crystal Prison on the Doomguard Commander. Be prepared for a ferocious onslaught of attacks, as the demon attempts to escape capture.$B$BShould you succeed, return the Imprisoned Doomguard to Daio in the Tainted Scar.

name: What Niby Commands
description: Speak with Impsy in Felwood.

name: Flawless Fel Essence
description: Impsy in Felwood has asked that you bring him three Flawless Fel Essences originating from three distinct locations.$B$BThe Legashi Satyrs of Azshara hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Jaedenar Legionnaires of Jaedenar hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Felguard Sentries of the Blasted Lands hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region.$B$BRecover the Flawless Fel Essences and return  to Impsy in Felwood.

name: Kroshius' Infernal Core
description: Search Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood for the remains of Kroshius. When you locate the remains, use the Fel Fire near them and await Kroshius' return. When the infernal has awoken, slay him and take from his corpse Kroshius' Infernal Core.$B$BReturn Kroshius' Infernal Core to Niby the Almighty in Felwood.

name: A Binding Contract
description: Turn the Thorium Brotherhood Contract in to Lokhtos Darkbargainer if you would like to receive the plans for Sulfuron.

name: The Balance of Light and Shadow
description: Save 50 Peasants before 15 are slain. Speak with Eris Havenfire should you accomplish this task.$B$BYou may view the Death Post to view how many Peasants have been slain.

name: Lord Banehollow
description: Purchase Shadowy Potions from Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.$B$BUse the potions to travel through Jaedenar, and speak with Lord Banehollow.

name: Ulathek the Traitor
description: Confront Ulathek, then bring The Traitor's Heart to Lord Banehollow in Jaedenar.

name: Xorothian Stardust
description: Purchase Xorothian Stardust from Ur'dan.  Bring it to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

name: Bell of Dethmoora
description: Bring 10 Elixirs of Shadow Power to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

name: Wheel of the Black March
description: Bring 6 Large Brilliant Shards and 25 Dark Iron Ore to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

name: Doomsday Candle
description: Bring 35 Black Dragonscales to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

name: Imp Delivery
description: Bring the Imp in a Jar to the alchemy lab in the Scholomance.  After the parchment is created, return the jar to Gorzeeki Wildeyes.

name: Arcanite
description: Bring 3 Arcanite Bars to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
description: Read Mor'zul's Instructions.  Summon a Xorothian Dreadsteed, defeat it, then bind its spirit to you.

name: The Ancient Leaf
description: Find the owner of the Ancient Petrified Leaf. Good luck, $N; It's a big world.

name: Ancient Sinew Wrapped Lamina
description: Hastat the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Blue Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Hastat in Felwood.

name: A Proper String
description: Stoma the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Black Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Stoma in Felwood.

name: Stave of the Ancients
description: You must find and destroy these four demonic corrupters:$B$BSimone the Seductress.$B$BKlinfran the Crazed.$B$BSolenor the Slayer.$B$BArtorius the Doombringer.$B$BDestroy these creatures and return to Vartrus the Ancient in Felwood with their heads.$B$BRefer to the Petrified Bark in your inventory for clues as to their whereabouts.$B$BYou MUST complete this task by yourself.

name: Emphasis on Sacrifice
description: Travel to Ironforge and get High Priest Rohan's Exorcism Censer.  You will need to make a donation of 150 gold in order to secure it.

name: Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker
description: Speak with Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District.

name: To Show Due Judgment
description: Return the Exorcism Censer to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

name: Exorcising Terrordale
description: Use the Exorcism Censer to drive out the spirits that torment Terrordale.  When you have slain 25 Terrordale Spirits, return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

name: The Work of Grimand Elmore
description: Speak with Grimand Elmore in Stormwind's Dwarven District.

name: Collection of Goods
description: Bring 40 Runecloth, 6 Arcanite Bars, 10 Arthas' Tears, 5 Stratholme Holy Water vials, and 150 gold to Grimand Elmore in the Dwarven District of Stormwind.

name: Ancient Equine Spirit
description: Acquire special horse feed used for feeding a spirit horse.  Merideth Carlson in Southshore apparently is the source for such food.$B$BTravel to the Dire Maul dungeon in Feralas and slay Tendris Warpwood.  Doing so will free the Ancient Equine Spirit.  Feed it the special horse feed, thereby soothing the spirit.  Finally, give it the Arcanite Barding so it may bless it.

name: Blessed Arcanite Barding
description: Return with the Blessed Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

name: Manna-Enriched Horse Feed
description: Retrieve 20 Enriched Manna Biscuits - the key ingredient in making Manna-Enriched Horse Feed - for Merideth Carlson at Southshore in the Hillsbrad Foothills.  The Argent Dawn is known as the sole purveyor of the biscuits.$B$BYou also need to give her 50 gold to soothe her ruffled sensibilities.

name: The Divination Scryer
description: Bring an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

name: Judgment and Redemption
description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth the spirits you must judge.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver.  Defeat him and reclaim the lost soul of the fallen charger.$B$BGive the Charger's Redeemed Soul and the Blessed Enchanted Barding to Darkreaver's Fallen Charger.

name: Grimand's Finest Work
description: Take the Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District for his inspection.

name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume I
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume II
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume III
description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

name: Wolf Swapping - Arctic Wolf
rewardssss: Horn of the Swift Brown Wolf
Horn of the Swift Gray Wolf
Horn of the Swift Timber Wolf

name: Wolf Swapping - Red Wolf
rewardssss: Horn of the Swift Brown Wolf
Horn of the Swift Gray Wolf
Horn of the Swift Timber Wolf

conditions.name: Whistle of the Mottled Red Raptor

name: Material Assistance
description: If you are interested in helping Sagorne Crestrider in Orgrimmar's Valley of Wisdom, bring him an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond.

name: WANTED: Overseer Maltorius
description: Deep within the Slag Pit of the Cauldron, in the Searing Gorge, you will find the traitorous Dark Iron dwarf named Overseer Maltorius.$B$BSlay Overseer Maltorius and take his head. Return the head to Lookout Captain Lolo Longstriker in the Searing Gorge for your reward.

name: Unfinished Gordok Business
description: Find the Gauntlet of Gordok Might and return it to Captain Kromcrush in Dire Maul.$B$BAccording to Kromcrush, the "old timey story" says that Tortheldrin - a "creepy" elf who called himself a prince - stole it from one of the Gordok kings.

name: Fuel for the Zapping
description: Collect 10 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

name: What the Flux?
description: Somewhere in the Slag Pit of the Cauldron you will find the Secret Plans: Fiery Flux that Overseer Maltorius stole. Find those plans and return them to Master Smith Burninate in the Searing Gorge.

name: Curse These Fat Fingers
description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Heavy War Golems.$B$BThe Heavy War Golems wander the areas surrounding the Cauldron in the Searing Gorge. When you've killed enough, return to Hansel in Searing Gorge.

name: Fiery Menace!
description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Greater Lava Spiders in the Searing Gorge. You can find Greater Lava Spiders in the plateaus and lava pools of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Greater Lava Spiders.

name: Again With the Zapped Giants
description: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 10 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

name: Refuel for the Zapping
description: Collect 6 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

name: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Incendosaurs.$B$BYou will find Incendosaurs occupying the lava pools inside the Slag Pit. The Slag Pit can be found in the Cauldron of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Incendosaurs.

name: STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass
description: Find and return the Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge.$B$BThe only information you have about these items is the following: They were definitely stolen by Dark Iron dwarves. The Smithing Tuyere is a blacksmithing tool used by blacksmiths and the Lookout's Spyglass is an invaluable monitoring tool to lookouts.

name: JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
description: Slay 15 Dark Iron Taskmasters and 15 Dark Iron Slavers. Return to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge once you have accomplished this task.

name: Zukk'ash Infestation
description: Bring 20 Zukk'ash Carapaces to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

name: Stinglasher
description: Defeat Stinglasher in the Writhing Deep, bringing its glands back to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

name: Zukk'ash Report
description: Deliver the Camp Mojache Zukk'ash Report to Zilzibin Drumlore.  He resides in the Drag of Orgrimmar.

name: Improved Quality
description: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Pratt McGrubben at Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

name: Improved Quality
description: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

name: Pristine Yeti Hide
description: Bring the Pristine Yeti Hide to Pratt McGrubben at the Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

name: Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Iron
Perfect Yeti Hide
description: Bring the Perfect Yeti Hide to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

name: Blackhand's Command
description: That is one stupid orc. It would appear as if you need to find this brand and gain the Mark of Drakkisath in order to access the Orb of Command.$B$BThe letter indicates that General Drakkisath guards the brand. Perhaps you should investigate.
