description: Return the Head of Nefarian to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

name: The Lord of Blackrock
description: Venture to the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind City and speak with Field Marshal Afrasiabi.

name: The Lord of Blackrock
description: Return the Head of Nefarian to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

name: The Lord of Blackrock
description: Speak with High Overlord Saurfang in Orgrimmar. He stands waiting for you in the Valley of Strength.

description: Present the Dormant Wind Kissed Blade to Highlord Demitrian.
rewardssss: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

description: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

description: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Stalking the Stalkers
description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 10 Silvermane Stalkers and 10 Silvermane Howlers. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the wolves hide in the wilds of the Hinterlands.

name: Hunt the Savages
description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 20 Savage Owlbeasts. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Savage Owlbeasts occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

name: Avenging the Fallen
description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill a Razorbeak Skylord and retrieve its Skylord Plume. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Razorbeak Skylord are a rare breed that tend to occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

name: Remember Alterac Valley!
description: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Claiming Arathi Basin
description: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
description: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

name: Arena Grandmaster
description: Avast Lubber! Bring me 12 trinkets of the Arena Master.

name: Vilebranch Hooligans
description: Smith Slagtree at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Slagtree's Lost Tools. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BYou recall Smith Slagtree mentioning that the tools might be at one of the Vilebranch temples in the northeastern region of the Hinterlands. You should also check Skulk Rock.

name: Lard Lost His Lunch
description: Lard at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Lard's Lunch. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BLard mentioned that he left it on the island to the north. Watch out for Vilebranch trolls.

name: Message to the Wildhammer
description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to slaughter 15 Highvale Outrunners, 15 Highvale Scouts, 15 Highvale Marksman and 15 Highvale Rangers. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BYou can find the Highvale high elves at the Quel'Danil Lodge in the northwestern region of the Hinterlands.

name: Another Message to the Wildhammer
description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to bring him 10 Long Elegant Feathers from the gryphons that inhabit the Hinterlands. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BGryphons are known to inhabit every region of the Hinterlands.

name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to travel to Aerie Peak in the western region of the Hinterlands and place the Final Message to the Wildhammer by the well in the center of town. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BBeware of angry Wildhammer dwarves and unruly members of the Alliance.

name: Cannibalistic Cousins
description: Mystic Yayo'jin at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 15 Vilebranch Scalpers and 10 Vilebranch Soothsayers. Return to her when this task is complete.$B$BYayo'jin indicated that these trolls could be found near the Shaol'watha and Agol'watha temples in the north by northeastern region of the Hinterlands.

name: Kidnapped Elder Torntusk!
description: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to rescue her mate, Elder Torntusk, from Jintha'alor.$B$BYou have been told that he is being held prisoner atop Jintha'alor, the Vilebranch capital city located in the southern region of the Hinterlands.

name: Recover the Key!
description: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to kill Hitah'ya the Keeper to get the Shackle Key to his bindings. Return to Elder Torntusk when you have recovered the key.

name: Return to Primal Torntusk
description: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village with news of his rescue.

name: Attunement to the Core
description: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

name: Separation Anxiety
description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover his twin brother's remains. Find and return Huntsman Malkhor's Skull and Huntsman Malkhor's Bones to Huntsman Markhor.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that his brother's remains were fed to the oozes and wolves of the Vilebranch. He also mentioned that there is a refuse pit filled with oozes in Jintha'alor as well as a wolf den. Both of these places are near the top of the temple.

name: Dark Vessels
description: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover 10 Vessels of Tainted Blood from Jintha'alor. Return to Primal Torntusk when this task is complete.

name: Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her Minions
description: You have been ordered to slay Vile Priestess Hexx and 10 Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guards. See Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands once this task is complete.$B$BVile Priestess Hexx and the Aman'zasi Guards can be found atop Jintha'alor in the Hinterlands.

name: Job Opening: Guard Captain of Revantusk Village
description: You have been tasked with the decimation of 20 Vilebranch Berserkers, 20 Vilebranch Shadow Hunters, 20 Vilebranch Blood Drinkers, and 20 Vilebranch Soul Eaters.$B$BShould you complete this task, return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands.

description: Win the battle for Arathi Basin, get an Arathi Resource Crate, and return it to Sergeant Maclear at Refuge Pointe.

name: Mark of Honor
description: You obtained a Warsong Mark of Honor for your last task, talk to me again, and you gain your reward.

description: Travel to Grom's Monument in the Demon Fall Canyon of Ashenvale and use Grom's Tribute at the base of the monument.  Return to Javnir Nashak outside Orgrimmar before the Harvest Festival is over.

description: Speak with Yeh'kinya.

description: Speak with Molthor in Stranglethorn.

description: String 5 Channeler's Heads, then return the Collection of Troll Heads to Exzhal on Yojamba Isle.

Could I get a Fishing Flier?
Wavethrashing
description: Bring 6 Wavethrasher Scales to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

name: The Green Drake
description: Bring the Tooth of Morphaz to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

description: Speak with Lord Jorach Ravenholdt in Ravenholdt Manor.

name: Sealed Azure Bag
description: Retrieve the Sealed Azure Bag from the Timbermaw Shaman in Azshara.  Then take the bag to Archmage Xylem, also found in Azshara.

name: Encoded Fragments
description: Bring 10 Encoded Fragments to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.

name: The Azure Key
description: Return the Azure Key to Lord Jorach Ravenholdt.

name: A Bijou for Zanza
description: Destroy any one of the Hakkari Bijous found in Zul'Gurub at the Altar of Zanza on Yojamba Isle.  When done, speak with Vinchaxa nearby.

name: Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Heavy Leather
Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Kingsblood
description: Deliver 2 Incendosaur Scales, 4 Kingsblood and one Coal to Master Smith Burninate.

name: Magecraft
description: Seek out Sanath Lim-yo and gain passage to see Archmage Xylem.

name: Magic Dust
description: Bring 10 Glittering Dust to Archmage Xylem.

description: Collect 6 Enchanted Coral and return them to Archmage Xylem.

name: Destroy Morphaz
description: Retrieve the Arcane Shard from Morphaz and return to Archmage Xylem.

description: Seek out Ogtinc in Azshara.

description: Acquire 4 Healthy Courser Glands and bring them to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

name: The Ichor of Undeath
description: Acquire an Ichor of Undeath for Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

name: Blood of Morphaz
description: Kill Morphaz in the sunken temple of Atal'Hakkar, and return his blood to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.  The entrance to the sunken temple can be found in the Swamp of Sorrows.

name: The Darkreaver Menace
description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.

name: Vanquish the Invaders!
description: Enter Warsong Gulch and defeat the Horde, obtain a Silverwing Talisman of Merit, and return to Sentinel Farsong at the Silverwing Grove.

description: Talk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

description: Enter Warsong Gulch and defeat the Alliance, gain a Warsong Mark of Honor, and bring it to Captain Shatterskull at the Mor'shan Base Camp.

name: Vanquish the Invaders!
description: Enter Warsong Gulch and defeat the Horde, obtain a Silverwing Talisman of Merit, and return to Sentinel Farsong at the Silverwing Grove.

name: The Path of the Righteous
description: Collect 200 Silithid Carapace Fragments and return to Baristolth.

name: The Hand of the Righteous
description: Collect 200 Silithid Carapace Fragments and return to Baristolth.

name: Anachronos
description: Seek out Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

name: Dearest Natalia
description: Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to question the inhabitants of Bronzebeard's Encampment. You will find Bronzebeard's Encampment south of Cenarion Hold.$B$BOnce you have gathered the requested information, return to Commander Mar'alith.

name: Long Forgotten Memories
description: Locate the Crystalline Tear in Silithus and gaze into its depths.

name: Into The Maw of Madness
description: Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to find his beloved Natalia. The information that you gathered points to Hive'Regal in the south as being the area in which you may find Mistress Natalia Mar'alith.$B$BDo not forget to visit the dwarves at Bronzebeard's camp before venturing into the hive. They might have some additional work and advice for you.$B$BAnd $N, remember the Commander's words: "Do what you must..."

name: Desert Recipe
description: Look for information about cooking Sandworm Meat at the Twilight's Hammer camp west of Cenarion Hold.

name: Brann Bronzebeard's Lost Letter
description: Take Brann Bronzebeard's Letter to Bronzebeard's Encampment in southern Silithus.

name: Glyph Chasing
description: Rutgar Glyphshaper at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to venture to Hive'Ashi, Hive'Zora, and Hive'Regal and recover Glyphed Rubbings from the Glyphed Crystals of each hive.$B$BUse the Geologist's Transcription Kit to make a reasonable facsimile of the ancient glyphs. Return to Rutgar Glyphshaper when you complete this task.

name: Breaking the Code
description: Frankal Stonebridge at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to recover a Hive'Zora Silithid Brain, Hive'Ashi Silithid Brain, and a Hive'Regal Silithid Brain. Return to Frankal when you have completed this task.

name: Hallow's End Treats for Jesper!
description: Speak with the innkeepers of Stormwind, Ironforge, and Darnassus, as well as Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.  Perform the tricks they ask of you in exchange for the treats they offer.$B$BReturn to Jesper at the Stormwind Orphanage with a Darnassus Marzipan, Gnomeregan Gumdrop, Stormwind Nougat, and Ironforge Mint.

name: Hallow's End Treats for Spoops!
description: Speak with the innkeepers of Orgrimmar, Undercity, and Thunder Bluff, as well as Kali Remik in Sen'jin Village.  Perform the tricks they ask of you in exchange for the treats they offer.$B$BReturn to Spoops at the Orgrimmar Orphanage with a Thunder Bluff Marzipan, Darkspear Gumdrop, Orgrimmar Nougat, and Undercity Mint.

name: Sharing the Knowledge
description: Bring the Torn Recipe Page to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold.

name: Unraveling the Mystery (Elite)
description: Rutgar Glyphshaper at Bronzebeard's Encampment wants you to deliver the Glyphed Crystal Prism to Geologist Larksbane at the Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

name: The Calling
description: Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism from the Qiraji Emissary.$B$BYou have been instructed to take the Glyphs of Calling to the Bones of Grakkarond, south of Cenarion Hold, and draw them in the sand. Should the Qiraji Emissary appear, slay it and recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism. Return to Geologist Larksbane if you succeed.$B$BAssemble an army for this task, $N!

name: Kitchen Assistance
description: Calandrath at Cenarion Hold needs a batch of 10 Smoked Desert Dumplings.

name: Secret Communication
description: Bring 10 Encrypted Twilight Texts to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Twilight Geolords
description: Kill 10 Twilight Geolords, then return to Huum Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Vyral the Vile
description: Bring Vyral's Signet Ring to Huum Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Rotten Eggs
description: Place the Rotten Eggs in the main brew keg located inside the Southshore Inn.

name: True Believers
description: Hermit Ortell wants you to bring him 10 Encrypted Twilight Texts

name: Aurel Goldleaf
description: Speak with Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

name: Dukes of the Council
description: Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard and 3 Abyssal Crests to Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

name: Lords of the Council
description: Bring 5 Large Brilliant Shards and 3 Abyssal Signets to Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

name: Goldleaf's Discovery
description: Speak with Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

name: Signet of the Dukes
description: Bring the Abyssal Signet to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Bor Wildmane
description: Speak with Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Bor Wishes to Speak
description: Speak with Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Scepter of the Council
description: Bring an Abyssal Scepter to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

name: Abyssal Contacts
description: Bor Wildmane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to destroy an Abyssal Templar and bring him an Abyssal Crest as proof of the deed.

name: Pirate Hats Ahoy!
description: Haughty Modiste wants you to collect 20 Southsea Pirate Hats and return them to her at Steamwheedle Port in Tanaris.

name: Southsea Shakedown
description: Security Chief Bilgewhizzle of Steamwheedle Port in Tanaris wants you to kill 10 Southsea Pirates, 10 Southsea Freebooters, 10 Southsea Dock Workers and 10 Southsea Swashbucklers.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the mine, the lumber mill, the blacksmith and the farm, then return to Field Marshal Oslight in Refuge Pointe.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the Arathi Basin mine, lumber mill, blacksmith and stable, and then return to Deathmaster Dwire in Hammerfall.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the mine, the lumber mill, the blacksmith and the farm, then return to Field Marshal Oslight in Refuge Pointe.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the mine, the lumber mill, the blacksmith and the farm, then return to Field Marshal Oslight in Refuge Pointe.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the Arathi Basin mine, lumber mill, blacksmith and stable, and then return to Deathmaster Dwire in Hammerfall.

name: The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the mine, the lumber mill, the blacksmith and the farm, then return to Field Marshal Oslight in Refuge Pointe.

name: Korrak the Everliving
description: Should Korrak the Bloodrager make a return to the Field of Strife, seek him out and destroy him.$B$BReturn the Skull of Korrak to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

name: The Return of Korrak
description: Should Korrak the Bloodrager make a return to the Field of Strife, seek him out and destroy him.$B$BReturn the Skull of Korrak to Warmaster Laggrond in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

name: Korrak the Bloodrager
description: According to legend, the leader of the mighty Winterax trolls appears at will to wreak havoc on the denizens of Alterac Valley.$B$BShould Korrak make himself known, destroy him and return to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Alterac Mountains.

name: The Legend of Korrak
description: According to legend, the leader of the mighty Winterax trolls appears at will to wreak havoc on the denizens of Alterac Valley.$B$BShould Korrak make himself known, destroy him and return to Warmaster Laggrond.

name: Ruined Kegs
description: Return to Darkcaller Yanka at the Wickerman Festival in Tirisfal Glade.

name: Elemental Mastery
description: Collect a sample of air, fire, earth and water for Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

name: Mastering the Elements
description: Bring the elements earth, air, fire and water to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

name: Spirit Totem
description: Bring the pieces for the spirit totem to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

name: Da Voodoo
description: Bring the voodoo feathers to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

name: Dispelling Evil
description: Collect 20 Minion's Scourgestones and bring them to High Priest Thel'danis in the Western Plaguelands.

name: Chillwind Point
description: Speak to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp.

name: Inert Scourgestones
description: Bring the Inert Scourgestone to Commander Ashlan Valorfist in Chillwind Point.

name: A Troubled Spirit
description: Speak with the Fallen Hero of the Horde at the entrance to the Blasted Lands.

name: Forging the Mightstone
description: Bring the voodoo feathers to Ashlam Valorfist.

name: An Imp's Request
description: Bring a piece of felcloth to Impsy in Felwood.

name: Hot and Itchy
description: Bring a piece of felcloth to Impsy in Felwood.

name: The Wrong Stuff
description: Bring 10 Rotting Wood and 4 Bloodvenom Essence to Impsy in Felwood.

name: Trolls of a Feather
description: Bring a total of 6 Voodoo Feathers from the trolls in sunken temple.

name: Warrior Kinship
description: Kill 7 Helboar in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

name: War on the Shadowsworn
description: Slaughter the Shadowsworn in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

name: Voodoo Feathers
description: Bring the Voodoo Feathers from the trolls in the Sunken Temple to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

name: Proving Grounds
description: Travel to the Icewing Caverns located southwest of Dun Baldar in Alterac Valley and recover the Stormpike Banner. Return the Stormpike Banner to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Alterac Mountains.

name: Proving Grounds
description: Travel to the Wildpaw cavern located southeast of the main base in Alterac Valley and find the Frostwolf Banner. Return the Frostwolf Banner to Warmaster Laggrond.

name: Rune-Inscribed Parchment
description: Read the Rune-Inscribed Parchment and speak to Shikrik in the Valley of Trials.

name: Encrypted Parchment
description: Read the Encrypted Parchment and speak to Rwag in the Valley of Trials.

name: Rune-Inscribed Tablet
description: Read the Rune-Inscribed Tablet and speak to Shikrik in the Valley of Trials.

name: Encrypted Tablet
description: Read the Encrypted Tablet and speak to Rwag in the Valley of Trials.

name: The Demon Seed
description: Grab a Flawed Power Stone.  Bring it to the Altar of Fire before the stone expires, then return to Ak'Zeloth.

name: Shrouded in Nightmare
description: Find someone capable of deciphering the meaning behind the Nightmare Engulfed Object.$B$BPerhaps a druid of great power could assist you.

name: Waking Legends
description: Wait for Keeper Remulos at the Moonglade to cleanse the Nightmare Engulfed Object.

name: Deadwood of the North
description: Grazle would like you to kill 6 Deadwood Den Watchers, 6 Deadwood Avengers, and 6 Deadwood Shamans.

name: Speak to Nafien
description: Travel north along the main road in Felwood and speak with the furbolg named Nafien.  He stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

name: Speak to Salfa
description: Travel through Timbermaw Hold and exit into Winterspring.  Speak with Salfa, who stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

name: Feathers for Grazle
description: Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

name: Beads for Salfa
description: The Winterfall are known to carry spirit beads to ward against foul spirits. These beads have clearly failed in their purpose, as the Winterfall themselves are the agents of corruption. Bring to me these spirit beads from fallen Winterfall furbolgs; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

name: Deadwood Ritual Totem
description: Take the Deadwood Ritual Totem inside Timbermaw Hold and see if one of the furbolgs there will find a use for the item.  The Timbermaw will not speak with you unless you are of Neutral reputation or greater with them.

name: Winterfall Ritual Totem
description: Take the Winterfall Ritual Totem inside Timbermaw Hold and see if one of the furbolgs there will find a use for the item.  The Timbermaw will not speak with you unless you are of Neutral reputation or greater with them.

name: The Root of All Evil
description: Plant the Demon Summoning Torch in the mouth of High Chief Winterfall's cave in the Winterfall furbolg village.  Defeat the demon and retrieve the Essence of Xandivious for Gorn One Eye in Timbermaw Hold.

name: The Brokering of Peace
description: Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs Copper Bars!
description: Bring 20 Copper Bars to Sergeant Stonebrow at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Copper Bars!
description: Bring 20 copper bars to Sergeant Stonebrow at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Iron Bars!
description: Bring 20 Iron Bars to Corporal Carnes at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Iron Bars!
description: Bring 20 iron bars to Corporal Carnes at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: Bandages for the Field
description: Bring 30 Heavy Runecloth Bandages, 30 Heavy Silk Bandages and 30 Heavy Mageweave Bandages to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

name: Desert Survival Kits
description: Bring 4 Globes of Water, 4 Powerful Anti-Venom and 4 Smoked Desert Dumplings to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

name: Twilight Battle Orders
description: Obtain the Twilight Battle Orders and bring them Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

name: The Alliance Needs Thorium Bars!
description: Bring 20 Thorium Bars to Dame Twinbraid at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Thorium Bars!
description: Bring 20 thorium bars to Dame Twinbraid at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: Target: Hive'Ashi Stingers
description: Kill 30 Hive'Ashi Stingers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing XII in order to complete this quest.

name: Target: Hive'Ashi Workers
description: Slay 30 Hive'Ashi Workers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

name: The Alliance Needs Stranglekelp!
description: Bring 20 Stranglekelp to Private Draxlegauge at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Stranglekelp!
description: Bring 20 stranglekelp to Private Draxlegauge at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Purple Lotus!
description: Bring 20 Purple Lotus to Master Nightsong at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Purple Lotus!
description: Bring 20 purple lotus to Master Nightsong at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: Field Duty
description: Report for duty at the Ironforge Brigade post near Hive'Zora.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers and obtain Signed Field Duty Papers from Captain Blackanvil and return to Windcaller Kaldon at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Ironforge Brigade will flag you for PvP.

name: The Alliance Needs Arthas' Tears!
description: Bring 20 Arthas' Tears to Sergeant Major Germaine at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Arthas' Tears!
description: Bring 20 arthas' tears to Sergeant Major Germaine at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Light Leather!
description: Bring 10 Light Leather to Bonnie Stoneflayer at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Light Leather!
description: Bring 10 light leather to Bonnie Stoneflayer at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Medium Leather!
description: Bring 10 Medium Leather to Private Porter at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Medium Leather!
description: Bring 10 medium leather to Private Porter at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Thick Leather!
description: Bring 10 Thick Leather to Marta Finespindle at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Thick Leather!
description: Bring 10 thick leather to Marta Finespindle at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Linen Bandages!
description: Bring 20 Linen Bandages to Sentinel Silversky at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Linen Bandages!
description: Bring 20 linen bandages to Sentinel Silversky at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: A Pawn on the Eternal Board
description: Learn all that you can of the past, then speak with Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

name: The Alliance Needs Silk Bandages!
description: Bring 20 Silk Bandages to Nurse Stonefield at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Silk Bandages!
description: Bring 20 silk bandages to Nurse Stonefield at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Runecloth Bandages!
description: Bring 20 Runecloth Bandages to Keeper Moonshade at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Runecloth Bandages!
description: Bring 20 runecloth bandages to Keeper Moonshade at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Rainbow Fin Albacore!
description: Bring 20 Rainbow Fin Albacore to Slicky Gastronome at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Rainbow Fin Albacore!
description: Bring 20 rainbow fin albacore to Slicky Gastronome at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Roast Raptor!
description: Bring 20 Roast Raptor to Sarah Sadwhistle at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Roast Raptor!
description: Bring 20 roast raptor to Sarah Sadwhistle at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Alliance Needs Spotted Yellowtail!
description: Bring 20 Spotted Yellowtail to Huntress Swiftriver at the Military Ward in Ironforge.

name: The Alliance Needs More Spotted Yellowtail!
description: Bring 20 spotted yellowtail to Huntress Swiftriver at the airfield in Dun Morogh.

name: The Horde Needs Copper Bars!
description: Bring 20 Copper Bars to Miner Cromwell at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Copper Bars!
description: Bring 20 copper bars to Miner Cromwell in Durotar.

name: Hive'Zora Scout Report
description: Contact Cenarion Scout Azenel inside Hive'Zora and return the Hive'Zora Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

name: Hoary Templar
description: Summon and slay a Hoary Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

name: Earthen Templar
description: Summon and slay an Earthen Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

name: Crimson Templar
description: Summon and slay a Crimson Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

name: The Four Dukes
description: Find a way to summon and slay the Duke of Cynders, the Duke of Fathoms, the Duke of Zephyrs and the Duke of Shards and report back to Commander Mar'alith in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

name: Target: Hive'Zora Hive Sisters
description: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Hive Sisters and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

name: Boots for the Guard
description: Bring 3 Ornate Mithril Boots to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

name: Grinding Stones for the Guard
description: Bring 10 Dense Grinding Stones, 10 Solid Grinding Stones and 10 Heavy Grinding Stones to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

name: The Horde Needs Tin Bars!
description: Bring 20 Tin Bars to Grunt Maug at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Tin Bars!
description: Bring 20 tin bars to Grunt Maug in Durotar.

name: Conqueror's Spaulders
description: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of Night, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Neutral reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: The Horde Needs Mithril Bars!
description: Bring 20 Mithril Bars to Senior Sergeant T'kelah at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Mithril Bars!
description: Bring 20 Mithril Bars to Senior Sergeant T'kelah at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: Volunteer's Battlegear
description: Bring 5 Cenarion Combat Badges, 3 Cenarion Logistics Badges and 7 Cenarion Tactical Badges to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

name: The Horde Needs Peacebloom!
description: Bring 20 Peacebloom to Herbalist Proudfeather at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Peacebloom!
description: Bring 20 Peacebloom to Herbalist Proudfeather at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Monogrammed Sash
description: Return the Monogrammed Sash to its owner.

name: The Captain's Cutlass
description: Speak with Sprogger.

name: Facing Negolash
description: Bring 10 Barbecued Buzzard Wings and 5 bottles of Junglevine Wine to Captain Smotts' Lifeboat.$B$BKill Negolash, and bring Smotts' Cutlass to Captain Smotts in Stranglethorn.

name: Scythe of the Unseen Path
description: Bring 1 Qiraji Spiked Hilt, 2 Azure Idols, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

name: Blade of Eternal Justice
description: Bring 1 Qiraji Spiked Hilt, 2  Amber Idols, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

name: Kris of Unspoken Names
description: Bring 1 Qiraji Ornate Hilt, 2  Onyx Idols, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

name: Conqueror's Greaves
description: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of War, 5 Ivory Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

name: Conqueror's Legguards
description: Bring Ouro's Intact Hide, 2 Idols of Death, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Conqueror's Crown
description: Bring Vek'nilash's Circlet, 2 Idols of the Sun, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Conqueror's Breastplate
description: Bring the the Carapace of the Old God, 2 Idols of War, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Veteran's Battlegear
description: Bring 7 Cenarion Combat Badges, 4 Cenarion Logistics Badges and 4 Cenarion Tactical Badges to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Honored reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

name: Champion's Battlegear
description: Bring 15 Cenarion Combat Badges, 20 Cenarion Logistics Badges, 20 Cenarion Tactical Badges and 1 Mark of Cenarius to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

name: Stewvul, Ex-B.F.F.
description: Narain Soothfancy wants you to find his ex-best friend forever (BFF), Stewvul, and take back the scrying goggles that Stewvul stole from him.

name: Scrying Goggles? No Problem!
description: Find Narain's Scrying Goggles and return them to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: The Horde Needs Firebloom!
description: Bring 20 Firebloom to Batrider Pele'keiki at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Firebloom!
description: Bring 20 Firebloom to Batrider Pele'keiki at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs Purple Lotus!
description: Bring 20 Purple Lotus to Apothecary Jezel at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Purple Lotus!
description: Bring 20 Purple Lotus to Apothecary Jezel at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: Never Ask Me About My Business
description: Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to speak with Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan.

name: The Isle of Dread!
description: Recover Lakmaeran's Carcass and 20 Chimaerok Tenderloins for Dirge Quikcleave in Tanaris.

name: Dirge's Kickin' Chimaerok Chops
description: Dirge Quikcleave in Gadgetzan wants you to bring him 20 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 20 Deeprock Salt.

name: Return to Narain
description: Deliver the 500 Pound Chicken to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: The Horde Needs Heavy Leather!
description: Bring 10 Heavy Leather to Skinner Jamani at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Heavy Leather!
description: Bring 10 Heavy Leather to Skinner Jamani at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs Thick Leather!
description: Bring 10 Thick Leather to Sergeant Umala at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Thick Leather!
description: Bring 10 Thick Leather to Sergeant Umala at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: Tiara of the Oracle
description: Bring Vek'nilash's Circlet, 2 Idols of the Sage, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Trousers of the Oracle
description: Bring Ouro's Intact Hide, 2 Idols of Life, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Mantle of the Oracle
description: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of Rebirth, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Neutral reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

name: Footwraps of the Oracle
description: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of Death, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

name: Draconic for Dummies
description: Find Narain Soothfancy's book, buried on an island in the South Seas.

name: rAnS0m
description: Return the Ransom Letter to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: The Horde Needs Rugged Leather!
description: Bring 10 Rugged Leather to Doctor Serratus at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: The Horde Needs More Rugged Leather!
description: Bring 10 Rugged Leather to Doctor Serratus at the Valley of Spirits in Orgrimmar.

name: Stormcaller's Pauldrons

name: Field Duty
description: Report to Krug Skullsplit at the Orgrimmar Legion post in front of Hive'Regal.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers, obtain Signed Field Duty Papers and bring them to Windcaller Kaldon in Cenarion Hold.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Orgrimmar Legion will flag you for PvP.

name: Eranikus, Tyrant of the Dream
description: Travel to the continent of Teldrassil and find Malfurion's agent somewhere outside the walls of Darnassus.

name: Tyrande and Remulos
description: Travel to the Moonglade and speak to Keeper Remulos.

name: The Nightmare's Corruption
description: Travel to the four Emerald Dream portals in Azeroth and collect a Fragment of the Nightmare's Corruption from each. Return to Keeper Remulos in the Moonglade when you have completed this task.

name: The Nightmare Manifests
description: Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.

name: Azure Templar
description: Summon and slay an Azure Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

name: Hive'Regal Scout Report
description: Contact Cenarion Scout Landion inside Hive'Regal and return the Hive'Regal Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

name: Hive'Ashi Scout Report
description: Contact Cenarion Scout Jalia inside Hive'Ashi and return the Hive'Ashi Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

name: Twilight Marauders
description: Slay Twilight Marauder Morna and 2 Twilight Marauders.  Report to Windcaller Proudhorn when your task is finished.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

name: The Path of the Protector
rewardssss: Signet Ring of the Bronze Dragonflight

description: Bring 6 Oils of Immolation, 5 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 10 Dense Blasting Powder to Arcanist Nozzlespring near Hive'Zora in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

name: Scrying Materials
description: Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard, 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

description: Bring 8 Rugged Armor Kits and 8 Heavy Armor Kits to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost near Hive'Zora in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

name: Arms for the Field
description: Bring 2 Moonsteel Broadswords to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost outside of Hive'Zora.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

name: Uniform Supplies
description: Bring 1 Mooncloth, 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

name: Extraordinary Materials
description: Bring 2 Enchanted Thorium Bars and 2 Enchanted Leather to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

name: Secrets of the Qiraji
description: Take the Ancient Qiraji Artifact to the dragons hiding near the entrance of the temple.

name: The Orgrimmar Legion Needs Mojo!
description: Bring 6 Powerful Mojo, 6 Flasks of Big Mojo and 8 Oils of Immolation to Shadow Priestess Shai near Hive'Regal in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

name: Arms for the Field
description: Bring 3 Massive Iron Axes to Merok Longstride at the Orgrimmar Legion camp outside of Hive'Regal.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

name: Armor Kits for the Field

name: Imperial Qiraji Armaments

name: Imperial Qiraji Regalia
description: Merithra of the Dream in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring her Imperial Qiraji Regalia and 3 Elementium Ore.

name: The Savior of Kalimdor

name: New Year Celebrations!
description: Bring the Smokywood Supplies to Innkeeper Pala in Thunder Bluff.

name: The Lunar Festival

description: Deliver Lieutenant Heldric's Carefully Penned Note to Colara Dean outside the bank in Stormwind.

Slay Theldren and his gladiators and return to Anthion Harmon in the Eastern Plaguelands with the first piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet.

name: Five Signets for War Supplies
description: Well then, it's settled; here are your supplies, $c. If you wish to do an additional exchange, then I am prepared to authorize it. Just give me the word and I'll make it happen.$B$BKeep up the good work, $N. We need all the materiel we can muster if we're going to win this thing. If we all do our part, then victory shall be ours for the taking!

name: Stinking Up Southshore
description: Toss three Forsaken Stink Bombs into the heart of Southshore in Hillsbrad, and return to Darkcaller Yanka at the Wickerman Festival in Tirisfal Glade.

name: The Darkmoon Faire
description: Deliver the Free Ticket Voucher to Gelvas Grimgate, located inside the Darkmoon Faire carnival.

name: Presence of Might
description: Bring me these things and I will create a powerful enchantment for you!

name: Rare Fish - Brownell's Blue Striped Racer
The Battle for Arathi Basin!
description: Assault the Arathi Basin mine, lumber mill, blacksmith and stable, and then return to Deathmaster Dwire in Hammerfall.

name: The Power of Pine
description: Use a Stink Bomb Cleaner to remove any Forsaken Stink Bomb that's been dropped on Southshore.  Return to Sergeant Hartman in Southshore when you're done.

name: Feathers for Nafien
description: Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

name: Stalwart's Battlegear
description: Bring 15 Cenarion Combat Badges, 20 Cenarion Logistics Badges, 17 Cenarion Tactical Badges and 1 Mark of Remulos to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

name: The Good News and The Bad News
description: Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris wants you to bring him 20 Arcanite Bars, 10 Elementium Ore, 10 Azerothian Diamonds, and 10 Blue Sapphires.

name: The Wrath of Neptulon
description: Use the Arcanite Buoy at the Swirling Maelstrom at the Bay of Storms in Azshara.

name: The Champion Returns
description: Take the Green Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

name: The Might of Kalimdor
rewardssss: The Scepter of the Shifting Sands

name: Metzen the Reindeer
description: Find Metzen the Reindeer.  Use the notes provided to you for clues as to where he is being held.$B$BWhen you find Metzen, have the Pouch of Reindeer Dust in your possession so you can sprinkle some of the dust on him; this should free Metzen from his bonds of captivity.$B$BReturn the Pouch of Reindeer Dust to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar once Metzen is freed.

description: Talk to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

name: Winter's Presents
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter. He is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

name: Ten Signets for War Supplies
description: Well then, it's settled; here are your supplies, $c. If you wish to do an additional exchange, then I am prepared to authorize it. Just give me the word and I'll make it happen.$B$BKeep up the good work, $N. We need all the materiel we can muster if we're going to win this thing. description: Speak with Witch Doctor Unbagwa.

name: Bodleys Unfortunate Fate
description: Travel to Blackrock Mountain and use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer to find Bodley near Blackrock Spire.

name: Nefarius's Corruption
description: Slay Nefarian and recover the Red Scepter Shard. Return the Red Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris. You have 5 hours to complete this task.

name: Investigate the Scourge of Undercity
description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Undercity and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

name: Investigate the Scourge of Thunder Bluff
description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Thunder Bluff and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

name: Light's Hope Chapel
description: Deliver the Call to Arms Announcement to the Keeper of the Rolls at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

name: Libram of Protection
description: Bring a Libram of Protection, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 1 Frayed Abomination Stitching to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Protection.

name: Libram of Rapidity
description: Bring a Libram of Rapidity, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Blood of Heroes to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Rapidity.

name: Libram of Focus
description: Bring a Libram of Focus, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 4 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Skin of Shadow to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Focus.

name: Deadwood of the North
description: Nafien would like you to kill 6 Deadwood Den Watchers, 6 Deadwood Avengers, and 6 Deadwood Shamans.  Return to him in northern Felwood near the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
description: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Windseeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian in Silithus.

name: Azuregos's Magical Ledger
description: Deliver Azuregos's Magical Ledger to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: Love Song for Narain
description: Take Meridith's Love Letter to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: Incoming Gumdrop
description: Do a train emote at Talvash del Kissel, and in exchange you'll receive a Gnomeregan Gumdrop!

name: The Only Prescription
description: Recover the 8 lost chapters of Draconic for Dummies and combine them with the Magical Book Binding and return the completed book of Draconic for Dummies: Volume II to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

name: Chicken Clucking for a Mint
description: Do a chicken emote at Innkeeper Firebrew, and in exchange you'll receive an Ironforge Mint!

name: Chicken Clucking for a Mint
description: Do a chicken emote at Innkeeper Norman, and in exchange you'll receive an Undercity Mint!

name: Flexing for Nougat
description: Do a flex emote at Innkeeper Allison, and in exchange you'll receive Stormwind Nougat!

name: Dancing for Marzipan
description: Do a dance emote at Innkeeper Saelienne, and in exchange you'll receive Darnassus Marzipan!

name: Incoming Gumdrop
description: Do a train emote at Kali Remik, and in exchange you'll receive a Darkspear Gumdrop!

name: Flexing for Nougat
description: Do a flex emote at Innkeeper Gryshka, and in exchange you'll receive Orgrimmar Nougat!

name: Dancing for Marzipan
description: Do a dance emote at Innkeeper Pala, and in exchange you'll receive Thunder Bluff Marzipan!

description: Win the battle for Arathi Basin, get an Arathi Basin Mark of Honor, and return it to Deathstalker Mortis at Hammerfall.

description: Bring the Ribbons of Sacrifice to Captain Shatterskull so that the Outriders may reward you for acting on our behalf.

description: Bring the Ribbons of Sacrifice to Sentinel Farsong so that the Sentinels may reward you for acting on our behalf.

name: Vanquish the Invaders!
description: Enter Warsong Gulch and defeat the Horde, obtain a Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor, and return to Sentinel Farsong at the Silverwing Grove.

name: Quell the Silverwing Usurpers
description: Enter Warsong Gulch and defeat the Alliance, gain a Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor, and bring it to Captain Shatterskull at the Mor'shan Base Camp.

name: Arathi Basin Mark of Honor!
description: Win the battle for Arathi Basin, get an Arathi Basin Mark of Honor, and return it to Sergeant Maclear at Refuge Pointe.

name: More Arathi Basin Marks of Honor
Cut Arathor Supply Lines
description: Win the battle for Arathi Basin, get an Arathi Basin Mark of Honor, and return it to Deathstalker Mortis at Hammerfall.

name: More Arathi Basin Marks of Honor
The Lunar Festival
description: Talk to the Lunar Festival Harbinger in the entrance to the Undercity. You can also talk to Lunar Festival Harbingers in other capital cities.

name: Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
description: Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris wants you to take Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian to Stratholme and use it on Consecrated Earth. Defeat the entity that is exorcised from the staff and return to him.

name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
description: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
description: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

name: Winter's Presents
description: Speak with Greatfather Winter. He is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

name: Dangerous Love
description: Get a Guardian's Moldy Card and bring it to Fenstad Argyle in the Undercity.

name: The Binding
description: Using the Heartswood Core, summon and subdue a succubus, then return the Heartswood Core to Gakin the Darkbinder in the Slaughtered Lamb.

name: Crown of the Earth
description: Fill the Amethyst Phial and bring it back to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

name: The Captain's Chest
description: Bring Smotts' Chest to Hecklebury Smotts in Booty Bay.

name: Watcher Callahan
description: Speak with Watcher Callahan.

name: A Warden of the Horde
description: Return your ward to the Orgrimmar orphanage by handing in the Orcish Orphan Whistle to Orphan Matron Battlewail in the Valley of Honor.

name: Paragons of Power: The Predator's Mantle
description: Bring the following Paragons of Power from Zul'Gurub to Falthir the Sightless: A Primal Hakkari Aegis.  You must also have a reputation equal to or greater than Revered with the Zandalar Tribe.$B$BFalthir the Sightless is located on Yojamba Isle, Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Paragons of Power: The Illusionist's Mantle
description: Bring Al'tabim the All-Seeing a Primal Hakkari Shawl.  You must also have a reputation equal to or greater than Honored with the Zandalar Tribe.$B$BAl'tabim the All-Seeing is located on Yojamba Isle, Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Paragons of Power: The Illusionist's Robes
description: Bring Al'tabim the All-Seeing a Primal Hakkari Kossack.  You must also have a reputation equal to or greater than Revered with the Zandalar Tribe.$B$BAl'tabim the All-Seeing is located on Yojamba Isle, Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Paragons of Power: The Confessor's Bindings

description: Bring Jin'rokh the Breaker a Primal Hakkari Kossack.  You must also have a reputation equal to or greater than Revered with the Zandalar Tribe.$B$BJin'rokh the Breaker is located on Yojamba Isle, Stranglethorn Vale.

name: Mission: Possible But Not Probable
description: Steal Silixiz's Tower Key from Foreman Silixiz, then kill two Mutated Venture Co. Drones, two Venture Co. Patrollers, and two Venture Co. Lookouts.$B$BAssassinate Grand Foreman Gallywix and take his head, then pick the lock on Gallywix's lockbox and steal the Cache of Zanzil's Altered Mixture. Take the Cache and Gallywix's Head back to Shenthul in Orgrimmar for further instruction.

name: Timbermaw Ally
description: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 6 Deadwood Warriors, 6 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 6 Deadwood Gardeners.  Return to him in southern Felwood near the Emerald Sanctuary when you are done.

name: Winterfall Activity
description: Salfa wants you to kill 6 Winterfall Totemics, 6 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 6 Winterfall Pathfinders.

name: Winterfall Activity
description: Salfa wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Totemics, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Pathfinders.

name: The Stolen Tome
description: Retrieve the Powers of the Void for Drusilla La Salle.
